T02D2510-1:32b-12: padma'i rigs kyi bdag po'i rang bzhin yin par ston to //
T02D2510-1:32b-13: de ni padma'i rigs kyi sprul pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D2510-1:32b-14: de kho na nyid kyi gdul bya'i spyod pa'i gzhung
T02D2510-1:32b-15: gis sems can gyi don mdzad par ston pa ni
T02D2510-1:32b-16: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa zhes bya
T02D2510-1:32b-17: ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:32b-18: de ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa yang yin la /
T02D2510-1:32b-19: gzugs thams cad du yang dag par bstan pa yang yin pas de skad ces bya sba dang /
T02D2510-1:32b-20: de mkhyen pa ni nger nges pa'o //
T02D2510-1:32b-21: des sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa
T02D2510-1:32b-22: med pa rnams 'dul ba ni phan pa ma yin
T02D2510-1:32b-23: pa las bzlog nas phan pa la nges par sbyor
T02D2510-1:32b-24: ba'o // de nyid ni spyod pa'o //
T02D2510-1:32b-25: de'i mchog tu gyur pa ni zla med pa'o ;
T02D2510-1:32b-26: /'dis ni bcom ldan 'das padma'i rigs kyi rang bzhin yin par ston to //
T02D2510-1:32b-27: las kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du gyur pas kyang /
T02D2510-1:32b-28: de nam mkha' thams cad khyab par bstan pa ni /
T02D2510-1:32b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:32b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'i bka' ste /
T02D2510-1:32b-31: sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig / mchod
T02D2510-1:32b-32: pa thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:32b-33: cad la mchod cig ces bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33a-0: de mdzad pa'i dang tshul gang la yod @33a * //
T02D2510-1:33a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i don yod par mdzad pa ste /
T02D2510-1:33a-3: de'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:33a-4: cad kyi bka' don yod par mdzad pa nyid do
T02D2510-1:33a-5: // des thams cad mnyam pa med pa yi la
T02D2510-1:33a-6: mnyam pa med pa nyid kyis na bla na med
T02D2510-1:33a-8: rnam par thams cad pa'i phrin las 'di mnga' bas
T02D2510-1:33a-9: na thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na
T02D2510-1:33a-10: med pa'i phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:33a-11: 'dis ni 'di na sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams shing
T02D2510-1:33a-12: las kyi rigs su las kyi dkyil 'khor lo sa
T02D2510-1:33a-13: rgyur ba yin par ston to //
T02D2510-1:33a-14: de bzhin du sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams te der
T02D2510-1:33a-15: sems can sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad do zhes
T02D2510-1:33a-16: bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:33a-17: kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:33a-18: dpa' la sogs pa snying po'i don bstan pa'i sgo
T02D2510-1:33a-19: nas de'i snying po rnams bstan pa dang ;
T02D2510-1:33a-20: tshul des rnam par snang mdzad chen po yin par gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:33a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:33a-22: byang chub chen po ni mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2510-1:33a-23: du gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung
T02D2510-1:33a-24: ba rnams te ; de'i ngo bo nyid du sems
T02D2510-1:33a-25: dpa' brtan pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni de
T02D2510-1:33a-26: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por
T02D2510-1:33a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:33a-29: yang na de nyid ni brtan zhing mi gyo ba ste /
T02D2510-1:33a-30: de las sprul pa'i sems dpa' ni brtan pa'i sems dpa' ste /
T02D2510-1:33a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba ni spyan 'dren pa'o //
T02D2510-1:33a-33: de'i dam tshig ni 'da' bar mi bya ste /
T02D2510-1:33a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgom pa ni de'i rjes su mnyes par bya ba ste ;
T02D2510-1:33a-36: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
T02D2510-1:33a-37: de'i dbang phyug ni gtso bo ste /
T02D2510-1:33a-38: badzra r'a ga zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes
T02D2510-1:33a-40: bya ba ni phyin ci ma log cing yang dag
T02D2510-1:33a-41: pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyis te /
T02D2510-1:33a-42: badzra s'a dhu zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @33b thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i
T02D2510-1:33b-1: pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag
T02D2510-1:33b-2: pa'i ngo bo nyid rin chen 'byung ldan gyi tshul
T02D2510-1:33b-3: gyis ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni dbang bskur
T02D2510-1:33b-4: ba chen po de'i don gyis rin po ni bcom
T02D2510-1:33b-5: ldan 'das badzra ratna zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa'i de nyid yin no //
T02D2510-1:33b-7: de'i ye shes ni mun pa thams cad sel ba'i
T02D2510-1:33b-8: tshul gyis nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur
T02D2510-1:33b-9: pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:33b-10: thams cad kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:33b-11: 'khor te / de ni badzra te dza zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33b-12: sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes de nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D2510-1:33b-13: de rnams kyi bsam pa ni chos rtogs pa byed par bzhed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:33b-15: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams brnyes pa
T02D2510-1:33b-16: ni 'bar zhing mdzes pas na bsam ba'i rgyal po'o
T02D2510-1:33b-17: // de las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che des nye bar mtshan pa'i dpal te /
T02D2510-1:33b-18: rgyal mtshan gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2510-1:33b-19: badzra ke tu zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33b-20: chos thams cad brnyes pa'i dgyes pa'i tshul skyes pas
T02D2510-1:33b-21: na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-1:33b-23: bzhad pa chen po ni dgyes pa las byung ba'i
T02D2510-1:33b-24: 'dzum pa gang yin pa de ni bzhad pa chen
T02D2510-1:33b-25: po'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la bzhad pa chen po yang yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:33b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po ste /
T02D2510-1:33b-27: badzra h'a sa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2510-1:33b-29: gyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i 'od dpag tu
T02D2510-1:33b-30: med pa'i tshul ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:33b-31: do // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag
T02D2510-1:33b-32: pa'i chos chen po gang yin pa de ni de
T02D2510-1:33b-33: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen
T02D2510-1:33b-34: do // po ste / badzra dharma zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:33b-35: gang gi ye shes de de bzhin bshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:33b-36: cad kyi shes rab chen po nyid gang yin pa
T02D2510-1:33b-37: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes
T02D2510-1:33b-38: rab chen po'i ye shes te /
T02D2510-1:34a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i @34a * //
T02D2510-1:34a-1: dkyil 'khor chen po gang la yod pa de ni
T02D2510-1:34a-2: da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ste
T02D2510-1:34a-3: badzra he tu zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:34a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pas drang
T02D2510-1:34a-5: ba'i don gyi gsung ston pa gang yin pa de
T02D2510-1:34a-6: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
T02D2510-1:34a-7: 'chad pa ste / badzra bh'a sha zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:34a-8: don yod par grub pa'i rang bzhin 'khor gsum yongs
T02D2510-1:34a-9: su dag pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2510-1:34a-10: pa'i tshul gyis sems la sogs pa de ni de
T02D2510-1:34a-11: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02D2510-1:34a-12: de rnams kyi gdon me za zhing thams cad de /
T02D2510-1:34a-13: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:34a-14: sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dgongs
T02D2510-1:34a-15: pa mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
T02D2510-1:34a-16: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams
T02D2510-1:34a-17: cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa ste /
T02D2510-1:34a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2510-1:34a-20: chub tu 'jug pa'i sems bsrung bar spro ba ni
T02D2510-1:34a-21: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:34a-22: de nyid kyi go cha shin tu brtan bo gang
T02D2510-1:34a-23: la yod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:34a-24: cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu
T02D2510-1:34a-25: brtan po ste / badzra raksha zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:34a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:34a-27: de rnams kyi bsrung ba ni gang chos thams cad
T02D2510-1:34a-28: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar so sor rtogs pas
T02D2510-1:34a-29: yongs su skyong ba rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa
T02D2510-1:34a-30: gang yin pa de ni de gnod sbyin te /
T02D2510-1:34a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni ji skad du bshad pa ste /
T02D2510-1:34a-33: de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2510-1:34a-34: de bcing ba ni ma skyes pa'i sbyor bas gcig tu byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:34a-35: de nyid ni phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:34a-36: de'i ye shes gang la yod pa de ni de
T02D2510-1:34a-37: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
T02D2510-1:34a-38: thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i ye shes rnams te /
T02D2510-1:34a-40: 'dis ni badzras tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-1:34a-41: snying po'i don gyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2510-1:34a-42: la sogs pa'i snying po'i tshul gang yin pa de
T02D2510-1:34a-43: bstan nas / gzhan yang de nyid rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:34a-44: dpa' la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sku'i dbye ba bstan
T02D2510-1:34a-45: pa ni kun du ba zang zhes bya ba la
T02D2510-1:34a-46: sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:34b-0: 'di las kun nas bzang zhing dge bar gyur pas na kun du @34b bzang po yin pa 'am /
T02D2510-1:34b-1: rnam pa thams cad du bzang bas na kun du bzang po ste /
T02D2510-1:34b-2: snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //
T02D2510-1:34b-3: gang phyir sems can don gyur pas /
T02D2510-1:34b-4: des na 'di ni kun du bzang //
T02D2510-1:34b-5: byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o //
T02D2510-1:34b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas rab tu
T02D2510-1:34b-8: spyan 'dren pa la gdon mi za zhing don yod
T02D2510-1:34b-9: pas rab tu gdon mi za ba'o //
T02D2510-1:34b-10: gdul bya rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su
T02D2510-1:34b-11: blos bsam pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang
T02D2510-1:34b-12: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ba sgoms pas dar
T02D2510-1:34b-13: du gcod cing gsod pas na bdud do //
T02D2510-1:34b-14: rab tu dgyes pa ni yid ba ste de brnyes pa'o //
T02D2510-1:34b-15: nam mkha' ni mnyan pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D2510-1:34b-16: de las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni
T02D2510-1:34b-17: nam mkha' ste nam mkha' zhes bya ba de nyid
T02D2510-1:34b-18: snying po ste gang gi skyes pa'i gnas yin pa
T02D2510-1:34b-20: de las skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:34b-21: shin tu gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pas na shin tu gzi chen te /
T02D2510-1:34b-22: nam mkha' thams cad du khyab pa'i rdo rje nyi
T02D2510-1:34b-23: ma'i 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros
T02D2510-1:34b-24: pa'i phyir ro // yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
T02D2510-1:34b-25: po chen nye bar mtshon pa'i tog gi mtshan ma
T02D2510-1:34b-26: gang la yod pa de ni rin chen dpal lo
T02D2510-1:34b-27: pa'i phyir ro // // 'dzum pa chen po mnga' bas na 'dzum pa che ste /
T02D2510-1:34b-28: 'dzum zhing bzhad pas na nas nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa'o //
T02D2510-1:34b-29: gti mug spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D2510-1:34b-30: gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:34b-32: sems can rnams spyan ras kyis 'tsho bas na kun du gzigs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:34b-33: de nyid ni nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba
T02D2510-1:34b-34: nyid kyis rang dbang mnga' bas na dbang chen no
T02D2510-1:34b-35: // kun du gzigs pa yang yin la dbang chen
T02D2510-1:34b-36: yang yin pas kun du gzigs pa'i dbang chen no
T02D2510-1:34b-38: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs bas na /
T02D2510-1:34b-40: tshig rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bas na mi gsung ba ste /
T02D2510-1:34b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung
T02D2510-1:34b-42: gis spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par
T02D2510-1:34b-43: sbyor ba'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:35a-0: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i @35a * //
T02D2510-1:35a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las mdzad pas na thams cad las so //
T02D2510-1:35a-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2510-1:35a-3: chub par spro ba'i brtson 'grus chen po 'di la
T02D2510-1:35a-5: gtum pas na ma rungs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:35a-6: mi phyed pas na dam pa'o //
T02D2510-1:35a-7: de nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu
T02D2510-1:35a-8: byas ba'i khu tshur gyi tshul can yin pas na
T02D2510-1:35a-10: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:35a-11: tshig 'di dag gis ni go rems bzhin du rdo
T02D2510-1:35a-12: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa' bcu drug
T02D2510-1:35a-13: po de dag gi sku'i gsang ba gsungs pa yin
T02D2510-1:35a-14: no // 'di dag ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-1:35a-15: mtshan ma yang de dag nyid yin no zhes bstan
T02D2510-1:35a-17: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-1:35a-18: rdo rje snga pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2510-1:35a-19: sems dpa'i phyag mtshan nyid yin te gzhan dag kyang
T02D2510-1:35a-20: de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:35a-21: rgyud pas 'di dag gi phyag mtshan smos pa ni 'og nas kyang ston to //
T02D2510-1:35a-22: sems dpa' chen po bcu drug po 'di dag ni
T02D2510-1:35a-23: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku dang gsung dang
T02D2510-1:35a-24: thugs kyi gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid yin par ni
T02D2510-1:35a-25: ston to // thog ma tha ma med cing zhi /
T02D2510-1:35a-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pas te /
T02D2510-1:35a-27: de nyid chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:35a-28: de la thog ma ni dang por skyes pa'o //
T02D2510-1:35a-29: tha ma ni nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa'i nyan
T02D2510-1:35a-30: thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das
T02D2510-1:35a-31: pa'o // gang la 'di dag mi mnga' ba de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa ste /
T02D2510-1:35a-32: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i sems las byung
T02D2510-1:35a-33: ba gnyis su med pa'i rang zhin chos kyi dbyings
T02D2510-1:35a-34: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:35a-35: rgyu 'di nyid kyis ni zhing zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:35a-36: zhi ba'i tshul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:35a-37: zhi ba'i sku ston par mdzad pas na zhi ba'o //
T02D2510-1:35a-38: gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can gdul bar bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:35a-39: phyir drag po'i skur ston par mdzad pas na ma
T02D2510-1:35a-40: rungs pa ste / 'di dag kyang khams gsum pa'i mchog las rnam par rgyal ba las ston to //
T02D2510-1:35a-41: sems can dang sems can ma yin pa dag 'joms
T02D2510-1:35b-0: shing khro bas 'dul @35b ba rnams kyi phyir de'i
T02D2510-1:35b-1: rjes su 'jug pa'i tshul ston par mdzad pas na
T02D2510-1:35b-2: khro ba'o // bzod par smra ba la sogs par
T02D2510-1:35b-3: sprul pas sems can 'dul bas na bzod pa che
T02D2510-1:35b-4: khro ba'o // ba'o // gnod sbyin gyis 'dul ba rnams la ni gnod sbyin no //
T02D2510-1:35b-5: srin pos 'di la ba rnams la ni srin po dam pa'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-6: brtan bos 'dul ba rnams la ni brtan pa'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-7: gzi chen rnams las kyang gzi brjid che ba ni gzi chen no //
T02D2510-1:35b-8: dpa' bas mngon par rlom pa rnams la ni dpa' ba'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-9: khyab pa po thams cad pas kyang thams cad shin tu khyab pas na khyab bdag chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-10: au ma'i bdag po'i tshul gyis sems can 'dul bar mdzad pas na au ma'i bdag po'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-11: sems can gyi khams rnams ni skye dgu ste /
T02D2510-1:35b-12: de'i mgon po ni bsrung ba'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-13: khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la khyab
T02D2510-1:35b-14: 'jug gi gzugs ston par mdzad pas na gtogs 'dod
T02D2510-1:35b-15: do // rgyal ba'i dang tshul can ni rgyal 'dod de nyi ma'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-16: thub pa rnams kyi nang na sh'akya thub pa'i tshul ston pas na thub pa chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-17: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'i gzugs kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pas na 'jig rten skyong ngo //
T02D2510-1:35b-18: nam mkha' ltar sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na nam mkha'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-19: rgya mtsho chen po la sogs par ltung ba rnams
T02D2510-1:35b-20: sa gzhi'i tshul gyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na sa'o
T02D2510-1:35b-21: // ming po gsum gyi gzugs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na 'jig rten gsum mo //
T02D2510-1:35b-22: khams gsum po rdo rje sems dpa' yin pa'i tshul gyis na khams gsum pa'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-23: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ste 'byung ba
T02D2510-1:35b-24: chen po'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na 'byung chen
T02D2510-1:35b-25: no // nor 'grub pa la sogs pa'i tshul nyid kyis na /
T02D2510-1:35b-26: sems can don rab mdzad do //
T02D2510-1:35b-27: dngos po thams cad kyi chos nyid du gyur pas na thams cad do //
T02D2510-1:35b-28: gu lang ste lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pas na gu lang ngo /
T02D2510-1:35b-29: tshangs pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pas na tshangs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:35b-30: chags pa dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i tshul gyis sems can 'dul bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D2510-1:36a-0: skye ba med pa'i sbyor bas 'khor ba'i chos nyid yin pas na 'kho @36a * //
T02D2510-1:36a-2: / mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin pas na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2510-1:36a-3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis brtag pa'am rtag pas na rtag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:36a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa mnga' bas na yang dag 'tsho ba'o //
T02D2510-1:36a-5: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis mchod pa chen po yin pas na mchod pa chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:36a-6: sangs rgyas bsgom pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na sangs rgyas te /
T02D2510-1:36a-7: rang nyid sangs rgyas rab bsgoms pas //
T02D2510-1:36a-8: sangs rgyas zhes ni bya ba yin //
T02D2510-1:36a-10: padma'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir so
T02D2510-1:36a-11: sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pas
T02D2510-1:36a-12: na dga' ba'o // byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras
T02D2510-1:36a-13: bu dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na
T02D2510-1:36a-15: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su yang dag par ston pa dang /
T02D2510-1:36a-16: de'i chos nyid kyis na srid gsum mo //
T02D2510-1:36a-17: rtag pa ni lha chen po'i gzugs te der ston pas na rtag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:36a-18: dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal lo //
T02D2510-1:36a-19: sham ni bde ba ste de la spyod pas na bde spyod do //
T02D2510-1:36a-20: bde spyod ni lha chen po ste de byang chub la bkod pas mgon po mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:36a-22: yi ge h'um gcig pu tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum
T02D2510-1:36a-23: 'dul bar mdzad pas na rab tu 'dul mdzad do
T02D2510-1:36a-24: // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad ni rdo
T02D2510-1:36a-25: rje'i rigs kyi bdag po yin pas na rdo rje
T02D2510-1:36a-26: // gtso bo'o // sa rab ni mos pa spyod
T02D2510-1:36a-27: pa'i sa la sogs pa ste de rnams kyi mchog
T02D2510-1:36a-28: ni rdo rje 'chang gi sa yin la /
T02D2510-1:36a-29: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sa rab chog go //
T02D2510-1:36a-30: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ni ye shes so //
T02D2510-1:36a-31: ye shes yin pa nyid kyis na pha rol tu
T02D2510-1:36a-32: phyin pa bcu drug thob pa'i thabs su gyur pas
T02D2510-1:36a-33: na / pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2510-1:36a-34: ji ltar na ye shes nyid yin pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul yin zhes na /
T02D2510-1:36a-35: de nas btsams te gang yang rung //
T02D2510-1:36a-36: mnyam par gzhag pas bsgoms nas ni //
T02D2510-1:36a-37: de dag thams cad brtan 'gyur te /
T02D2510-1:36a-38: ting 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa'o //
T02D2510-1:36b-0: byang chub kyi @36b rang bzhin yin pas na byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-1:36b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas sems
T02D2510-1:36b-2: can thams cad rnam par grol bar mdzad pas na
T02D2510-1:36b-4: gsangs sngags kyi spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na spyod pa'o //
T02D2510-1:36b-9: don yod grub pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
T02D2510-1:36b-10: nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas don no //
T02D2510-1:36b-11: ting nge 'dzin sgrub par byed pas ni rang sangs
T02D2510-1:36b-12: rgyas thugs te ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa snying la
T02D2510-1:36b-13: gnas te des na snying po zhes bshad do zhes
T02D2510-1:36b-15: nyan thos dang rang byang chub dang /
T02D2510-1:36b-16: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi chos nyid yin pas na byang chub kun no //
T02D2510-1:36b-17: 'di'i gong na yod pa ma yin pas na bla na med pa'o /
T02D2510-1:36b-18: rnam par snang mdzad ni ji ltar grags pa nyid do //
T02D2510-1:36b-19: bdud las rgyal bas na rgyal ba'o //
T02D2510-1:36b-20: sems can gyi tshogs chen po'i don mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:36b-21: phyag rgya chen po mnga' na phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2510-1:36b-22: gang phyir sems ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2510-1:36b-24: dmigs pa bsnyel ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas na rgyal ba'o //
T02D2510-1:36b-25: rigs bzhi'i bdag por gyur pas na mgon no //
T02D2510-1:36b-26: rang nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas nan rang byung ngo //
T02D2510-1:36b-27: rigs bzhi'i 'dzin par mdzad pa'i rang zhin yin pas chen po 'di yi lha //
T02D2510-1:36b-29: sems dpa' dang phyag rgya chen po de dang 'brel
T02D2510-1:36b-30: ba'i bdag med pa bsgoms pas sems rtse gcig pa'i
T02D2510-1:36b-32: mnyam par gzhag pas ring nge 'dzin yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:36b-33: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phrin las ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las te /
T02D2510-1:36b-34: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2510-1:36b-35: des mdzad pas na sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad do /
T02D2510-1:36b-36: 'di dag mdzad par ji ltar spyod pa yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:36b-38: yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid /
T02D2510-1:37a-1: de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas na yang dag pa nyid do //
T02D2510-1:37a-2: sems can rnams kyi don la chags pas na sems can te /
T02D2510-1:37a-3: sems can gyi don la chags pa na sems can no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:37a-4: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston par mdzad pas na /
T02D2510-1:37a-5: rtag tu don rtogs mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:37a-6: sngon po ni lha chen po'i gzugs su sems can gyi don du byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:37a-7: de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i sku chen po ni sdong po chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:37a-8: nag po chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can 'dul bar mdzad pas na nag po chen po'o /
T02D2510-1:37a-9: dpal mchog dang po las bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi
T02D2510-1:37a-10: yang dag par 'dus pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i
T02D2510-1:37a-11: tshul dang ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'dod
T02D2510-1:37a-12: chags chen pa'o // de nyid ni gnyis su med
T02D2510-1:37a-13: pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas na bde
T02D2510-1:37a-14: chags chen pa'o // ba che ste / mi 'gyur bde ba kun grub pa //
T02D2510-1:37a-15: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02D2510-1:37a-16: zhes lung las bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:37a-17: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis dngos grub
T02D2510-1:37a-18: thams cad bsdus pa yin pas na thabs chen no
T02D2510-1:37a-19: // rgyu 'di nyid kyis na mchog chen chog go //
T02D2510-1:37a-20: phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis na kun gyi chog go //
T02D2510-1:37a-21: de nyid kyi phyir gnas kyi dbang po'o //
T02D2510-1:37a-22: de lta bu de su zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:37a-23: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-1:37a-25: rang sangs rgyas rgyas kyi byang chub la ltos na
T02D2510-1:37a-26: 'di ni byang chub kyang yin la chen po yang
T02D2510-1:37a-27: yin pas na byang chub chen po ste /
T02D2510-1:37a-28: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D2510-1:37a-29: de ni sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2510-1:37a-30: de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi thugs 'di la
T02D2510-1:37a-31: mnga' bas na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2510-1:37a-32: chen po'i thugs zhes bshad do //
T02D2510-1:37a-33: kun du bzang po ni bshad zin to //
T02D2510-1:37a-34: de nyid ni byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin yin pas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:37a-35: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:37b-0: pa thams cad kyi @37b thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:37b-2: dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so zhes bya ba ni bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:37b-3: dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs kyis ni sku dang ldan pa ma yin te /
T02D2510-1:37b-6: bcom ldan de nyid sems dpa' yi //
T02D2510-1:37b-7: rdo rje'i ngo bo'i thugs dag / de nyid rgyal bar gyur pa yin //
T02D2510-1:37b-8: rdo rje'i sems dpa' zhes bshad pa //
T02D2510-1:37b-9: rdo rje der ni rab tu gnas //
T02D2510-1:37b-10: de nyid ye shes sbyor ba yis //
T02D2510-1:37b-11: sangs rgyas zhes ni bshad pa ste //
T02D2510-1:37b-12: thugs las na tshogs byung nas ni //
T02D2510-1:37b-13: sna rtogs gzugs su 'ang gyur pa yin //
T02D2510-1:37b-14: khams kun rdul gyi grangs snyed dag / de nyid rgyal bar gyur pa yin //
T02D2510-1:37b-15: rdo rje'i sku ni de rnams las //
T02D2510-1:37b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'byung ba yin //
T02D2510-1:37b-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:37b-18: 'dis ni skyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang /
T02D2510-1:37b-19: las kyi rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gnyis
T02D2510-1:37b-20: kyi mdo 'dis rigs bzhi'i mdo bshad pa yin no
T02D2510-1:37b-21: // gleng gzhi'i rnam par 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D2510-1:37b-23: // / de ltar rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:37b-24: rnam par snang mdzad chen po bstan pa bdag dang
T02D2510-1:37b-25: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan
T02D2510-1:37b-26: nyid can gyi de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i skyes
T02D2510-1:37b-27: bo'i mngon par 'dod pa skyes pa yin la /
T02D2510-1:37b-28: mngon par 'dod pa skyes bar gyur ba rnams bdag
T02D2510-1:37b-29: dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu'i
T02D2510-1:37b-30: mtshan nyid can bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar 'thob
T02D2510-1:37b-31: par 'gyur zhes rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba la
T02D2510-1:37b-32: / ngo bo nyid de mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:37b-33: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D2510-1:37b-34: de thob par byed pa'i thabs su rgyud gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:37b-35: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-1:37b-36: gdul bya rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa'i rjes thogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:37b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni 'jig rten gyi
T02D2510-1:37b-38: khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i
T02D2510-1:37b-40: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2510-1:37b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis so //
T02D2510-1:38a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di zhes bya ba @38a * //
T02D2510-1:38a-1: ni mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa phrag brgyal sogs pa'i rnam grags yod pa'o //
T02D2510-1:38a-2: dper na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dpe bstan pa'i don to //
T02D2510-1:38a-3: til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar
T02D2510-1:38a-4: gyur to zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-1:38a-5: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste /
T02D2510-1:38a-6: des mngon sum du byas nas zhes ston par byed pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:38a-7: sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:38a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku
T02D2510-1:38a-9: dang chos nyid rjes su dran par bya'o zhes rtogs
T02D2510-1:38a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2510-1:38a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:38a-13: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-1:38a-14: 'dus te zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshul gyis rdzogs par mdzad pa ste /
T02D2510-1:38a-15: de lta bu mdzad nas so //
T02D2510-1:38a-16: byang chub la dgongs shing sems dpa'i thugs 'di la mnga' bas nas byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-1:38a-17: sems can gyi tshogs chen po'i don chen po mdzad
T02D2510-1:38a-18: pa la rab tu 'jug pas na sems dpa' chen
T02D2510-1:38a-19: po'o // don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:38a-20: ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su
T02D2510-1:38a-21: rdzogs pas don thams cad grub par bya bzhed pa
T02D2510-1:38a-22: tsam la rag las pa 'di las pa 'di la
T02D2510-1:38a-23: mnga' bas na don thams cad grub pa'o //
T02D2510-1:38a-24: byang chub kyi rgyu'i snying po ni byang chub kyi snying po ste /
T02D2510-1:38a-25: mar gyi snying po dang 'dra bar gnas kyi snying por gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-1:38a-26: der bzhugs pa ni nye bar gnas par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:38a-27: gang na bar zhes bya bar zhes bya ba'i rgyu gsum pa'o //
T02D2510-1:38a-28: de'i don ni 'di yin te gang gis bskal pa
T02D2510-1:38a-29: grangs med pa gsum du skye ba sna tshogs pa
T02D2510-1:38a-30: ba zhes te / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas /
T02D2510-1:38a-31: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed de /
T02D2510-1:38a-32: bsam gtan bzhi ba'i chen po'i yang chen po bskyed
T02D2510-1:38a-33: nas ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis yid kyi rang
T02D2510-1:38a-34: bzhin gyi lus can gyi srid pa tha ma par
T02D2510-1:38a-35: mdzad nas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las cod pan dang /
T02D2510-1:38b-0: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba thob @38b nas sems
T02D2510-1:38b-1: can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir
T02D2510-1:38b-2: 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes dgongs nas dbugs rngub pa
T02D2510-1:38b-3: dang / dbugs dbyung ba bkag ste bcom ldan das
T02D2510-1:38b-4: don thams cad grub pa 'og min gyi gnas byang
T02D2510-1:38b-5: chub kyi snying po na bzhugs pa gang na ba
T02D2510-1:38b-6: der gshegs shing bzhud nas 'di skad cas gsungs pa
T02D2510-1:38b-7: dang / yin no // bcom ldan 'das bskal pa
T02D2510-1:38b-8: bsam gyis mi khyab par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D2510-1:38b-9: rgyas nas sh'akya'i rigs su skye ba ston par mdzad
T02D2510-1:38b-11: sh'akya'i rigs su skye ba bzhes bya ba 'di la mi rigs so /
T02D2510-1:38b-12: gshegs nas kyang de rnams kyis de la ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2510-1:38b-13: ched du zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:38b-14: de la rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku ni nyon mongs
T02D2510-1:38b-15: pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba sa
T02D2510-1:38b-16: chen po la bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun
T02D2510-1:38b-17: du bzang po la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi
T02D2510-1:38b-18: rdzogs longs spyod pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:38b-19: chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2510-1:38b-20: bzhugs pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos kyi rdzogs
T02D2510-1:38b-21: longs spyod pa'i sku dgongs pa yin pas rdzogs longs
T02D2510-1:38b-23: de rnams kyis rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas ji skad du gsungs she na /
T02D2510-1:38b-24: rigs kyi bu khyod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-1:38b-25: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D2510-1:38b-26: ci ltar zhes bya ba ni spong ba'o //
T02D2510-1:38b-27: de'i gong na khyad par du gyur ba gzhan med
T02D2510-1:38b-28: pas na bla na med pa ste yang dag par
T02D2510-1:38b-29: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub pa rnam
T02D2510-1:38b-30: pa lnga'o // gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:38b-31: ji srid de kho na nyid bsgom pa med par
T02D2510-1:38b-32: mi gyo ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'dis ni khyod mngon
T02D2510-1:38b-33: par rdzogs par byang chub par mi 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2510-1:38b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
T02D2510-1:38b-37: nyid ma rtogs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:38b-38: gsungs te / gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:38b-39: kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pa de ni mngon
T02D2510-1:38b-40: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na yang khyod
T02D2510-1:38b-41: ni mi gyo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bas
T02D2510-1:38b-42: bdag nyid gzir cing dka' ba spyod pa la zhugs

T02D2510-1:48b-15: ji skad du bshad pa'i bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:48b-16: gcig tu mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T02D2510-1:48b-17: dun du bzang po'i sku ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2510-1:48b-18: sku ste / de lta bu'i kun du bzang po
T02D2510-1:48b-19: grub pa dang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:48b-21: de grub par byed pa la thugs rtse gcig pa'o //

T02D2510-1:48b-28: de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de
T02D2510-1:48b-29: ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig tu gyur pa kun
T02D2510-1:48b-30: du bzang po'i sku gcig pu'o //

T02D2510-1:48b-34: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi dbang nyid kyis so //

T02D2510-1:49a-4: // chad du brjod pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:49a-5: ched kar nye bar brjod pas na ched du brjod pa ste /
T02D2510-1:49a-6: gzhan gyis mi bskul bas rang sa ba'i yid kyis brjod cing smras pa'o //
T02D2510-1:49a-7: ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02D2510-1:49a-8: bdag ces bya ba ni bdag nyid do //

T02D2510-1:49a-10: sems dpa' brtan zhes bya ba ni mi byed pa'i sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-1:49a-11: gal te khyod sangs rgyas rnams kyi kun du bzang
T02D2510-1:49a-12: po yin pa la ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ce
T02D2510-1:49a-13: na / de ni brtan phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:49a-14: gang gi phyir ni rgyu gang gis so //
T02D2510-1:49a-15: brtan pas lus min kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:49a-16: gnyis su med ba'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin du zun kyang /
T02D2510-1:49a-17: sems dpa'i lus su zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:49a-18: sems dpa'i sku'i ngo bo ni sems dpa'i lus nyid do //
T02D2510-1:49a-19: gyur pa yin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:49a-20: thob cing grub pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
T02D2510-1:49a-22: bdag ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gzugs med pa yin na ;
T02D2510-1:49a-23: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyi mthus gdul byas bdag gzugs kyi skur mthong ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:49a-24: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du
T02D2510-1:49a-25: bzang po'i sku zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag
T02D2510-1:49a-26: pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas zhas bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:49a-27: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas so //
T02D2510-1:49a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:49a-29: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i mdun na'o //
T02D2510-1:49a-30: bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:49a-31: bdag gis ci zhig bgyi zhes bka' nod par gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-1:49a-32: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan ldan
T02D2510-1:49a-33: rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs na ni
T02D2510-1:49a-34: / 'di zhal gcig pa dang phyag gnyis pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:49a-35: zhal du ma'i tshig med do //
T02D2510-1:49a-36: gan gyang zhal du ma mnga' ba der ni khyad par nyid du gsung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:49b-0: de nas zhes bya ba @49b la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:49b-1: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
T02D2510-1:49b-2: rdo rje de de'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:49b-3: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /

T02D2510-1:49b-5: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2510-1:49b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni
T02D2510-1:49b-7: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na
T02D2510-1:49b-8: gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rnam pa de
T02D2510-1:49b-9: nyid / kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin yin pas na dam tshig rdo rje'o //
T02D2510-1:49b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2510-1:49b-11: rgyu mthun pa las byung ba nyid kyis na kun
T02D2510-1:49b-12: rdzob kyi tshul gyis rdo rje de la de skad
T02D2510-1:49b-13: ces bya ste / de la dmigs pa'i ting nge
T02D2510-1:49b-14: 'dzin la yang ming de skad ces bshad do zhes
T02D2510-1:49b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2510-1:49b-17: dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:49b-18: la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba gsungs te
T02D2510-1:49b-19: / rdo rje rtse lnga pa sbyin pa'i rnam par
T02D2510-1:49b-20: thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad cis bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2510-1:49b-21: / go // rdo rje de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2510-1:49b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:49b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims ni /
T02D2510-1:49b-24: ji lta dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2510-1:49b-25: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02D2510-1:49b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa phas pham pa bcu bzhi las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2510-1:49b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnam par sems
T02D2510-1:49b-29: rtse gcig pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:49b-31: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni shes rab bo //
T02D2510-1:49b-32: des lam gyi tshul gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs shing /
T02D2510-1:49b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
T02D2510-1:49b-34: mngon par byang chub pa ni rnam par grol ba'o
T02D2510-1:49b-35: // rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes ni /
T02D2510-1:49b-36: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o //
T02D2510-1:49b-37: de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
T02D2510-1:50a-1: dang cho 'phral sna tshogs kyis sems can thams cad
T02D2510-1:50a-2: rnam par sbyong ba ni sems can gyi don no
T02D2510-1:50a-3: // bcos ma'i khro bo yang dag par ston pa ni thabs chen po ste /
T02D2510-1:50a-4: thabs chen po'i ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje
T02D2510-1:50a-5: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs
T02D2510-1:50a-6: so zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2510-1:50a-8: rta mchog la sogs pa'i gzugs can du gyur pas brtson 'grus so //
T02D2510-1:50a-9: tshig re rer thams cad bdag yin par bya ba'i ye shes chen po'o //

T02D2510-1:50a-14: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /
T02D2510-1:50a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D2510-1:50a-16: sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:50a-21: de rnams bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na /
T02D2510-1:50a-22: rdo rje ni dam tshig go //
T02D2510-1:50a-24: sems cad kyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D2510-1:50a-26: thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2510-1:50a-27: de yang bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
T02D2510-1:50a-28: yid bde ba thams cad ni dga' ba ste de dag kyang de bzhin no //
T02D2510-1:50a-29: de rjes su myong bar bya ba ni mngon sum du bya ba ste /
T02D2510-1:50a-30: de'i don du rjes su sbyin no //
T02D2510-1:50a-31: ji srid ces bya ba'i sgras ni sa dang pha
T02D2510-1:50a-32: rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang
T02D2510-1:50a-33: bsdu'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam
T02D2510-1:50a-34: pa nyid ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs

T02D2510-1:50a-38: de mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud pa'o //
T02D2510-1:50a-39: de nyid ni grub pa'i mchog ste /
T02D2510-1:50b-1: de thob pa ni bsnyes pa'o //
T02D2510-1:50b-2: de nyid ni 'bras bu ste de dag gi rgyu'i
T02D2510-1:50b-3: phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i
T02D2510-1:50b-4: rdo rje byin pa ni stsal ba'o //

T02D2510-1:50b-7: par shes pa thog par bya ba'i phyir de'i lag
T02D2510-1:50b-8: par byin no // byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:50b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ni
T02D2510-1:50b-10: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bur gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor

T02D2510-1:50b-14: bri ba'i chogs thun mong du bya ba'i phyir de'i

T02D2510-1:50b-18: ba nyid du bya ba des kyang ci zhig mdzad
T02D2510-1:50b-19: ce na / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D2510-1:50b-25: de nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa

T02D2510-1:50b-28: rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan
T02D2510-1:50b-29: che'o // no // des dbang bskur ba ni de lta bu'i dbu rgyan /
T02D2510-1:50b-31: dar dkar po zhang du khru gang la /
T02D2510-1:50b-32: dkyus khru nyi shu ba bcings pa'i dbang gis dbang
T02D2510-1:50b-33: bskur nas rdo rje de de'i lag tu byin no
T02D2510-1:50b-34: zhes bya ba la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur

T02D2510-1:50b-37: rked pa'i phyogs su ba dan te bzhag pa ni
T02D2510-1:50b-38: g-yon pa'i rdo rje bsgyings pa'o //

T02D2510-1:51a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:51a-8: grub pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i
T02D2510-1:51a-9: phyir dang dngos grub kyi rang bzhin yin pas so
T02D2510-1:51a-10: // bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:51a-11: stong ba nyid ni rdo rjer bshad //
T02D2510-1:51a-13: rigs lnga'i stong ba nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo
T02D2510-1:51a-14: bo nyid kyis ni phul du byung ba yin pas
T02D2510-1:51a-15: so // 'di zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis stsal ba gang yin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:51a-16: bdag ste zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gang yin pa de ni bdag yin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:51a-17: bdag gi lag tu byin zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:51a-18: bdag gi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje'i gzugs gang yin pa de bdag gi lag tu byin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:51a-19: de lta yin pa des na bdag rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:51a-20: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:51a-21: dpa'i gdul bya rnams byang chub kyi sems rab tu
T02D2510-1:51a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' bskul ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin mngon du mdzad pa dang /
T02D2510-1:51a-24: de'i ched du brjod pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2510-1:51a-25: ye shes kyi rdo rje dang /
T02D2510-1:51a-26: rdo rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2510-1:51a-33: rdzogs pa'i ched du brjod pas bskyed pa dang /
T02D2510-1:51a-37: brtan par bsgom pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:51a-38: de ltar tshul 'dis dpal rdo rje sems dpas 'dul
T02D2510-1:51a-39: ba'i rang bzhin la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:51a-40: kyi byang chub kyi sems su gzhag pa yin no
T02D2510-1:51a-41: // rdo rje rgyal pos 'gugs pa yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:51a-42: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:51a-43: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2510-1:51b-0: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gzhan yang zhes bya @51b ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:51b-1: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:51b-2: gdon mi za ba yang yin la rgyal po yang yin pas na gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2510-1:51b-3: de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste
T02D2510-1:51b-4: byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi zla ba'i
T02D2510-1:51b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i
T02D2510-1:51b-6: gzugs su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
T02D2510-1:51b-7: ka na gnas par gang sdar bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:51b-8: gdon mi za ba ni don yod ba'o //
T02D2510-1:51b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa rdo
T02D2510-1:51b-10: rje rgyal po'i gzugs kyis de nyid mdzes shing 'bar
T02D2510-1:51b-11: ba'i gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i //
T02D2510-1:51b-12: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'o //
T02D2510-1:51b-13: gang gi phyir de las byung bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-1:51b-15: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi rnam
T02D2510-1:51b-16: par sprul ba bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig
T02D2510-1:51b-17: tu mdzad pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:51b-18: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:51b-19: pa thams cad spyan drang ba ni spyan 'dren pa'o
T02D2510-1:51b-20: // de nyid ni dam tshig ste rgyu'o //
T02D2510-1:51b-21: ming de skad ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:51b-22: thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa de rang gi
T02D2510-1:51b-23: thugs ka nas rang nyid kyis phyung bar gyur pa
T02D2510-1:51b-24: ni badzra r'a dze zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:51b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:51b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas so //
T02D2510-1:51b-27: phyung ma thag pa zhes bya ba ni sgra'i gzugs so //
T02D2510-1:51b-28: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:51b-29: gang sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis byung ba de nyid /
T02D2510-1:51b-30: de ni rdo rje lcags kyu lta bur byung bar gyur nas phyag//
T02D2510-1:51b-31: gnyis su gnas so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
T02D2510-1:51b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen po ste /
T02D2510-1:51b-33: lcags kyu tshad med pa'i gzugs su gyur cing grub pa ste /
T02D2510-1:51b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs ka nas byung nas /
T02D2510-1:52a-0: @52a * // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su
T02D2510-1:52a-1: bzhugs te sngar bshad pa'i nyid kyis gcig tu 'dres

T02D2510-1:61b-0: thob par bya ba'i phyir de thob par bya @61b ba'i don du'o //
T02D2510-1:61b-1: rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du zhes bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:61b-2: rdo rje rin po che ni rin po che'i rigs so //
T02D2510-1:61b-3: de rnams kyi 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor sprul pa dang bre ba dag go //
T02D2510-1:61b-4: de bskor ba'i dang tshul gang la yod pa de ni 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
T02D2510-1:61b-5: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid do //
T02D2510-1:61b-6: de la rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid du ci zhig gis bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:61b-7: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas zhes bya ba yin te /
T02D2510-1:61b-8: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu ni dum bu
T02D2510-1:61b-9: bzhi las 'og nas bzhad pa'i aom badzra ratna ku
T02D2510-1:61b-11: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus dbang bskur ba
T02D2510-1:61b-12: ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang bskur
T02D2510-1:61b-15: dum bu bzhi pa las 'khor los sgyur bar sprul pa yang /
T02D2510-1:61b-16: 'og min du mngon par byang chub nas mi bskyod
T02D2510-1:61b-17: pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis yongs
T02D2510-1:61b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su nam mkha'i snying po la yang de nyid kyis mi bya'o //
T02D2510-1:61b-21: 'di ltar 'dir ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2510-1:61b-22: dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur la /
T02D2510-1:61b-23: nor bu'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar ni rdo
T02D2510-1:61b-24: rje rin po che'i myu gus rin po che'i dbu
T02D2510-1:61b-25: rgyan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2510-1:61b-26: gang gi phyir 'di'i rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D2510-1:61b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba la /
T02D2510-1:61b-28: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:61b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:61b-30: pa lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi tshul gyis bya bar bstan
T02D2510-1:61b-31: la / nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur bar ni rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus so //
T02D2510-1:61b-32: gang rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bur mi bskyod pa'i rigs gang yin pa de ni /
T02D2510-1:61b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin la /
T02D2510-1:61b-34: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs gang yin pa de ni rin po che'i rigs so //
T02D2510-1:61b-35: de bzhin du don yod par grub pa'i rigs gang
T02D2510-1:61b-36: yin pa de ni las kyi rigs yin no zhes
T02D2510-1:61b-37: bya ba'i bar du de ltar ni smra bar nus
T02D2510-1:61b-38: pa yang ma yin te ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2510-1:62a-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs @62a* //
T02D2510-1:62a-2: don thams cad grub pa'i dum bu thams cad ni
T02D2510-1:62a-3: nor bu'i rigs so zhes rgyud phyi ma las bshad
T02D2510-1:62a-4: pa dang / bshad pa'i rgyud las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2510-1:62a-8: rdo rje las rnams sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:62a-11: rdo rje nor bu de zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag na gnas pa'o //
T02D2510-1:62a-12: lag pa gnyis su byin no zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis kar yang ngo //
T02D2510-1:62a-13: 'dis ni rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul
T02D2510-1:62a-14: pa'i dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa
T02D2510-1:62a-15: yin no // gzhung bsdus pas gzhung rgyas pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D2510-1:62a-16: gzhan du ni gleng gzhi dang bcas par brjod dgos par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:62a-17: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog
T02D2510-1:62a-18: sgom pa pos ni sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang
T02D2510-1:62a-19: dar dpyangs kyi dbang gis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:62a-20: rdo rje rin po che'i myu gus ni ma yin te /
T02D2510-1:62a-21: de ni don gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:62a-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sos pa la /
T02D2510-1:62a-23: g-yon pa bsnems pas bzhugs nas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje nor bu 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2510-1:62a-24: dpral ba'i gnas su 'jog cig ched du brjod cig
T02D2510-1:62a-25: ched dub rjod pa 'di ched du brjod pa yin
T02D2510-1:62a-26: te / rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2510-1:62a-29: las ni bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:62a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'di zhes bya ba ni bcom
T02D2510-1:62a-31: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad las thob pa gang
T02D2510-1:62a-32: yin pa de'o // 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:62a-33: sems can khams la dbang bskur ba //
T02D2510-1:62a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rin po ches
T02D2510-1:62a-36: sems can gyi khams rnams nam mkha'i snying por byed
T02D2510-1:62a-38: bdag yin te bdag gi lag tu byin pas na
T02D2510-1:62a-39: zhes bya ba ni rin po che'i phyag rgya gang
T02D2510-1:62a-40: yin pa ni bdag yin la /
T02D2510-1:62a-41: bdag de rin po che'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02D2510-1:62a-42: de ltar yin pa de'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:62a-43: rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag / ces bya'o //
T02D2510-1:62b-0: de ltar rdo rje rin chen gyis de @62b bzhin
T02D2510-1:62b-1: gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur la dbang bskur bar
T02D2510-1:62b-2: gyur pas ni nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i gnas med
T02D2510-1:62b-3: pas nyi mar gyur pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ba
T02D2510-1:62b-4: yin pas / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-1:62b-5: pas rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas
T02D2510-1:62b-6: so zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:62b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:62b-8: thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka
T02D2510-1:62b-9: nas byung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:62b-10: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:62b-11: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la ltos pas so //
T02D2510-1:62b-12: byung chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la /
T02D2510-1:62b-13: gzi brjid chen po yang yin pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:62b-14: de nyid ni sems dpa'i ste /
T02D2510-1:62b-15: rdo rje lta bu'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:62b-16: de'i dam tshig ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
T02D2510-1:62b-17: de 'byung ba ni rin po che lta bu'i sems dpa'i rdo rje gang las de 'byung ba'o //
T02D2510-1:62b-18: de byin gyis brlabs pa ni brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:62b-19: ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par
T02D2510-1:62b-20: zhugs nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sprul
T02D2510-1:62b-21: cing bskyed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad
T02D2510-1:62b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rnams
T02D2510-1:62b-24: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer
T02D2510-1:62b-25: te / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2510-1:62b-27: gang la ming de skad ces bya ba'i de bzhin
T02D2510-1:62b-28: gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gang yin pa
T02D2510-1:62b-29: de rang gi thugs ka nas byung ba ni rang
T02D2510-1:62b-30: nyid kyis ston par gyur pa ste /
T02D2510-1:62b-31: badzra te dza zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:62b-32: de nas phyag gnyis su gnas so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:62b-33: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni sems dpa'i rdo rje'i gzugs so //
T02D2510-1:62b-34: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:62b-35: nam mkha' thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam pa yin
T02D2510-1:62b-36: pas de'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po zhes
T02D2510-1:62b-37: bya'o // de nas bsdu ba byas na de bzhin
T02D2510-1:62b-38: du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi
T02D2510-1:62b-39: rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2510-1:63a-0: @63a* // nam mkha' thams cad khyab pa rnams rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs gcig tu gyur la /
T02D2510-1:63a-1: de ltar gyur nas byung ste /
T02D2510-1:63a-2: de nyid kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so //
T02D2510-1:63a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thugs
T02D2510-1:63a-4: la gnas te ched du brjod do zhes bya bar
T02D2510-1:63a-5: sbyar ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:63a-6: 'od zer 'gyur pa la sos pa zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:63a-7: ni sems can gyi khams ma lus par rdo rje
T02D2510-1:63a-8: nyi ma'i ting nge 'dzin bskyed pa ni /
T02D2510-1:63a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:63a-10: de ltar de la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:63a-11: thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang yin
T02D2510-1:63a-12: pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:63a-13: 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:63a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams te /
T02D2510-1:63a-16: sogs pa'i sgras ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnam bar 'phrul pa rnams gzung ngo //
T02D2510-1:63a-17: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu
T02D2510-1:63a-18: gzi brjid che ba nyid dang zhes bya ba 'di
T02D2510-1:63a-19: la rab tu che ba'i gzi brjid mnga' bas na
T02D2510-1:63a-20: shing tu gzi brjid che ba ste /
T02D2510-1:63a-21: de'i ngo bo nyid shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid do //
T02D2510-1:63a-22: shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:63a-23: sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-1:63a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu mdzad nas
T02D2510-1:63a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje nyi ma'i gzugs kyi
T02D2510-1:63a-26: rang bzhin du gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2510-1:63a-27: // rab tu brtan ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:63a-28: rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis g-yo bar mi
T02D2510-1:63a-29: nus pa'i phyir ro gcig tu 'dres pa ni 'dus
T02D2510-1:63a-30: par gyur pa ste rdo rje'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2510-1:63a-31: ae ma'o dpe med gzi brjid ni //
T02D2510-1:63a-32: zhes bya ba ni 'di la mtshungs pa yod pa yin pas na dpe med gze brjid do //
T02D2510-1:63a-33: sems can khams kun snang byed bdag / ces bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:63a-34: nyon mongs pa'i mun nag thams cad sel bar byed
T02D2510-1:63a-35: pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma sems dang sems las
T02D2510-1:63a-36: byung ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems can gyi khams
T02D2510-1:63a-37: can gyi khams rnams kyi snang ba mdzad pas na
T02D2510-1:63a-39: 'di'i phrin las bstan pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:63a-40: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
T02D2510-1:63a-41: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:63b-0: @63b gang gi phyir spyod bar byed pa'i gzi brjid yin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:63b-2: sangs rgyas dag pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:63b-3: bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas
T02D2510-1:63b-4: dag par gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
T02D2510-1:63b-5: rnams kyi gzi brjid kyang spyod bar byed pa'i ye
T02D2510-1:63b-6: shes kyi nyi ma 'bar ba yin pa yin ba
T02D2510-1:63b-9: ma dag pa dang tha dad pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa sbyong pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:63b-10: de rnams shin tu dag pa yin pa'i phyir bdag
T02D2510-1:63b-11: dang rang bzhin tha mi dad pa yin bas bdag
T02D2510-1:63b-12: nyid la byed pa por 'gyur ba ni 'gal ba
T02D2510-1:63b-13: yin ba'i phyir / bdag de rnams sbyong bar byed
T02D2510-1:63b-14: pa ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang gdul bya rnams
T02D2510-1:63b-15: kyis de ltar mthong ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:63b-16: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:63b-17: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de /
T02D2510-1:63b-18: bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to zhes bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:63b-19: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la dri ma med ba'i gzi brjid kyang yin pas /
T02D2510-1:63b-20: byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid do //
T02D2510-1:63b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g-yas phyogs su
T02D2510-1:63b-22: gnas so zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rin
T02D2510-1:63b-23: chen 'byung ldan gyi g-yas phyogs su'o //
T02D2510-1:63b-24: yang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po la ltos nas yang gi sgras gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:63b-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:63b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nyi ma'i lag tu byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:63b-27: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od
T02D2510-1:63b-28: kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2510-1:63b-29: // de la dmigs ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin
T02D2510-1:63b-30: pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi
T02D2510-1:63b-31: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje zhes bya
T02D2510-1:63b-32: // ba ste / de la snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D2510-1:63b-33: ni rdo rje nyi ma sbyin pa'i rnam par ting
T02D2510-1:63b-34: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:63b-35: // ba ste / tha tshig go // de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:63b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:63b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rnams
T02D2510-1:63b-38: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer
T02D2510-1:64a-2: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni rgyu ste /
T02D2510-1:64a-3: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:64a-5: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
T02D2510-1:64a-6: pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa ste
T02D2510-1:64a-7: / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis
T02D2510-1:64a-8: bde ba dang yid bde ba dang yid bde thams
T02D2510-1:64a-9: cad myong bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:64a-10: 'di la dpe yod pa ma yin pas na mtshungs pa med ste /
T02D2510-1:64a-11: rgyur gyur pa de zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:64a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'od 'bar ba'o //
T02D2510-1:64a-13: de thob pa ni thob par gyur pa'o /
T02D2510-1:64a-14: de nyid ni dngos grub dam pa ste /
T02D2510-1:64a-15: de'i phyir ni de'i phyir ni de'i don du ste
T02D2510-1:64a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyi ma
T02D2510-1:64a-17: grub ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:64a-18: bar gyi zhes bya ba'i sgras ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D2510-1:64a-19: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas lnga'i
T02D2510-1:64a-20: dbu rgyan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang gis dbang bskur
T02D2510-1:64a-21: nas so // rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:64a-22: 'di la mi phyed pa'i 'od mnga' bas na rdo
T02D2510-1:64a-23: nas so // rje'i 'od de / gang gi phyir
T02D2510-1:64a-24: nyi ma'i phyag rgya de ni ri bo yang brtol
T02D2510-1:64a-25: te snang bar byed pa yin pas des 'bad par
T02D2510-1:64a-26: byed pa'i phyir rdo rje'i 'od do //
T02D2510-1:64a-27: rdo rje nyi ma des zhes bya ba ni de
T02D2510-1:64a-28: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar byed cing sems
T02D2510-1:64a-29: can rnams / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:64a-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di //
T02D2510-1:64a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsal ba gang yin pa de'o //
T02D2510-1:64a-33: 'di ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:64a-34: mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa //
T02D2510-1:64a-36: mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o //
T02D2510-1:64a-37: mi shes pa de nyid ni mun pa mun pa mun nag go //
T02D2510-1:64a-38: de 'joms par byed pa ni 'jig par byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:64a-39: shin tu rdul phran ji snyed pa //
T02D2510-1:64a-40: / zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D2510-1:64a-41: cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam ba'o
T02D2510-1:64a-42: // nyi ma'i 'od pas shing tu lhag / ces
T02D2510-1:64a-43: bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra
T02D2510-1:64a-44: rab kyi grangs snyed kyi nyi ma bas lhag pa
T02D2510-1:64a-45: yod pa'i rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D2510-1:64a-47: rdo rje chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi rang
T02D2510-1:64b-0: bzhin gyi @64b de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:64b-1: sku de las byung ba'i rdo rje nyi ma mtha'
T02D2510-1:64b-3: shin tu rdul phran ji snyed pa'i //

T02D2510-1:99a-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo
T02D2510-1:99a-12: rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te ched du brjod pa
T02D2510-1:99a-13: 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya bar sbyar ro
T02D2510-1:99a-14: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
T02D2510-1:99a-15: gi phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:99a-16: // la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:99a-17: dam tshig dbab cing dbang du bya ba'i don gyis
T02D2510-1:99a-18: phyir phyag rgya ni dril bu'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:99a-19: de rnams kyis phyag rgya'i tshogs der gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-1:99a-20: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do
T02D2510-1:99a-21: zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:99a-22: cad kyi thugs la gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2510-1:99a-23: ngo bor sngar bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:99a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs shing zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:99a-25: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes bskyed pas
T02D2510-1:99a-26: dbang du byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched
T02D2510-1:99a-28: rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa'i bdag / ces bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:99a-29: rdo rje 'bebs pa ni rdo rje dril bu la bya la /
T02D2510-1:99a-30: des nye bar mtshon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:99a-31: brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:99a-32: gal te khyed de lta bu yin pa la 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig yod ce na /
T02D2510-1:99a-33: gang phyir kun gyis bdag gyur nas //
T02D2510-1:99a-34: bran du yang ni gyur pa yin //
T02D2510-1:99a-37: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes thob cing
T02D2510-1:99a-38: sprul pas 'gro ba'i don bya ba la dbang ba
T02D2510-1:99a-39: nyid thob pas / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:99a-40: kyi bdag po yin zhing de rnams bdag dang tha
T02D2510-1:99a-41: mi dad pa'i rang bzhin yin pa las gdul bya
T02D2510-1:99b-0: rnams kyis bdag de @99b rnams kyi las byed par
T02D2510-1:99b-1: mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
T02D2510-1:99b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sdom gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:99b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs na spyan 'dren pa ste /
T02D2510-1:99b-5: de rnams nyid bzhugs pa ni rdo rje zhags pa'o //
T02D2510-1:99b-6: zhugs pa rnams 'ching ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02D2510-1:99b-7: bcings pa rnams dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:99b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed
T02D2510-1:99b-9: pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag thams cad ni
T02D2510-1:99b-10: / ji skad du bshad pa'i spyan 'dren pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:99b-11: de ltar dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2510-1:99b-12: rdo rje sems dpas byang chub kyi sems la rab
T02D2510-1:99b-13: tu gzhag / rgyal pos spyan drangs /
T02D2510-1:99b-15: legs pas legs so zhes bya bas dgyes par byas /
T02D2510-1:99b-16: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur /
T02D2510-1:99b-17: gzi brjid kyis 'od kyis snang bar byas /
T02D2510-1:99b-18: dpal gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar /
T02D2510-1:99b-19: bzhad pas 'dzum ba rmad du byung ba la rab
T02D2510-1:99b-20: tu gzhag / chos kyis ting nge 'dzin la sbyor
T02D2510-1:99b-21: / rnon pos de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa bcad /
T02D2510-1:99b-22: rdo rje rgyus dkyil 'khor du bcug / smra bas
T02D2510-1:99b-23: spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyar
T02D2510-1:99b-24: / rdo rje las kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchod pas mchod /
T02D2510-1:99b-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrung ba yongs su bskyab pas bsrungs /
T02D2510-1:99b-27: rdo rje khu tshur gyis grub bo //
T02D2510-1:99b-28: de nas mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:99b-29: rin chen 'byung ldan dang 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D2510-1:99b-31: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du gyur te /
T02D2510-1:99b-32: rdo rje sems ma ni byang chub kyi sems kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D2510-1:99b-33: rdo rje rin chen ma ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2510-1:99b-34: rdo rje chos ma ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2510-1:99b-35: rdo rje las ma ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
T02D2510-1:99b-36: tu phyin pa'i tshul gyis rigs thams cad bsdus pa
T02D2510-1:99b-38: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sbyin pa dang /
T02D2510-1:100a-4: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
T02D2510-1:100a-5: de rnams kyang byang chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus
T02D2510-1:100a-6: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang
T02D2510-1:100a-7: / byang chub kyi spyod pa'i zhags pas bcug pa dang /
T02D2510-1:100a-8: bsam gtan gyis bcings pa dang /
T02D2510-1:100a-9: byang chub kyi dbab pas dbang du mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:100a-10: re re zhing yang bskyed pa dang /
T02D2510-1:100a-13: de nas rang gi gnas su zhugs te ched du brjod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:100a-14: brtan par bsgom par shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:100a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:100a-16: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi gzhung gis ni /
T02D2510-1:100a-17: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:100a-18: 'di dag kyang ri rab kyi steng du de bzhin
T02D2510-1:100a-19: gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul par mdzad pa
T02D2510-1:100a-20: yin la / bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas
T02D2510-1:100a-21: su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin
T02D2510-1:100a-22: yin la / pa de ni / kun du bzang
T02D2510-1:100a-23: pa la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams
T02D2510-1:100a-24: rjes su gzung ba'i phyir der zhugs pa nyid kyis
T02D2510-1:100a-25: dga' ldan la sogs par rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprul
T02D2510-1:100a-26: pa ston par mdzad pa ni sprul pa'i sku yin
T02D2510-1:100a-27: no zhes bshad pa'i rgyud kyi don bstan pa'i phyir
T02D2510-1:100a-28: dang gzhung gzhan dag las 'og min gyi gnas las
T02D2510-1:100a-29: bskyod par mi mdzad do zhes gsungs pa yin no
T02D2510-1:100a-30: yin la / pa de ni / // de ltar bskyed pa dang /
T02D2510-1:100a-34: brtan par bsgom pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi don bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:100a-35: sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:100a-36: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:100a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsdu ba ni /
T02D2510-1:100a-39: de sngon du 'gro ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir
T02D2510-1:100a-40: zhes pa ni ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pas so
T02D2510-1:100a-41: // de'i don du rdo rje se gol gyi mtshan
T02D2510-1:100a-42: ma mdzad nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje khu
T02D2510-1:100a-43: tshur gnyis bcings la mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu gnyis
T02D2510-1:100a-44: // su byas la / lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bsnol te /
T02D2510-1:100a-45: rdo rje se gol brdabs pas /
T02D2510-1:100a-46: sangs rgyas thams cad kyang gshegs par gyur na gzhan
T02D2510-1:100a-47: lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba 'di rdo
T02D2510-1:100b-1: ming de skad ces bya ba'i sgra mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:100b-2: de nas skad cig ma de nyid la ste bskul
T02D2510-1:100b-3: ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2510-1:100b-4: go // thang cig yud tsam zhes bya ba'i tshig
T02D2510-1:100b-5: ni 'jig rten pa'i tshig gi tshul du cung zad
T02D2510-1:100b-6: cig tu nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:100b-7: skad cig tsam de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid la 'jug ste /
T02D2510-1:100b-8: gang gi phyir skad cig ma gcig la byon pa'o //
T02D2510-1:100b-10: de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D2510-1:100b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas /
T02D2510-1:100b-12: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
T02D2510-1:100b-15: se gol gyi sgra'i mtshan mas bskul ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:100b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
T02D2510-1:100b-17: phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang
T02D2510-1:100b-18: chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang
T02D2510-1:100b-19: bcas te / skad cig ma de nyid la 'dus par mdzad nas /
T02D2510-1:100b-20: khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba dang /
T02D2510-1:100b-21: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gshegs shing byon la /
T02D2510-1:100b-22: gshegs nas kyang ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod de /
T02D2510-1:100b-23: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'a da banda nam ka ro mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02D2510-1:100b-24: zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas kyang ched du brjod pa
T02D2510-1:100b-25: 'di ched du brjod do zhes bya ba ni de
T02D2510-1:100b-26: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
T02D2510-1:100b-27: bas ni don 'di ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:100b-28: ji ltar bdag cag gi rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2510-1:100b-29: sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' 'og min gyi gnas
T02D2510-1:100b-30: na bzhugs pa nyid las sems can gyis don la
T02D2510-1:100b-31: gzigs te ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje dbyings
T02D2510-1:100b-32: kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sprul pa rdzogs par
T02D2510-1:100b-34: bsdu bas byon pa rnams kyang thugs gcig pa'o //
T02D2510-1:100b-35: kun du bang po zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsungs dang thugs gcig pa nyid la dgongs nas ;
T02D2510-1:100b-36: 'dir rnams par snang mdzad nyid la kun du bzang po zhes bya bar 'dod do //
T02D2510-1:100b-37: yang na rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid ni kun du bzang po ste /
T02D2510-1:100b-38: de'i spyod pa'i mchog ni mdzes pa'i spyod pa yin pas spyod pa'i mchog ste /
T02D2510-1:101a-0: lha sum cu rtsa bdun du lhag par mos pa'i rnam par thar @101a * //
T02D2510-1:101a-1: pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:101a-2: 'dir ci zhig ngo mtshar che zhe na /
T02D2510-1:101a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02D2510-1:101a-4: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes //
T02D2510-1:101a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'khor lo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo ste /
T02D2510-1:101a-7: bsdus nas byon pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'o //
T02D2510-1:101a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor lo de'i dbus na
T02D2510-1:101a-9: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dbyings
T02D2510-1:101a-10: kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis mdzes shing 'bar
T02D2510-1:101a-11: bar gyur pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
T02D2510-1:101a-12: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:101a-13: dngos po thams cad kyi don ji lta ba bzhin thugs su chud pas /
T02D2510-1:101a-14: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin la /
T02D2510-1:101a-15: bdag cag gis kyang dngos po thams cad kyi don
T02D2510-1:101a-16: ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:101a-18: de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gcig pu'i
T02D2510-1:101a-19: tshul gang yin pa de ni thams cad kyi yin
T02D2510-1:101a-20: la / thams cad kyi gang yin pa ni gcig yi yang de yin te /
T02D2510-1:101a-23: 'gro ba'i don gyi bya pas mtshungs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:101a-24: de bas na kho bo cag thams cad tshul 'dis gnas mod kyi /
T02D2510-1:101a-25: gdul bya rnams kyis kun du bzang po nyid gcig pur mthong ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che'o //
T02D2510-1:101a-26: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:101a-27: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus te byon ba rnams so //
T02D2510-1:101a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
T02D2510-1:101a-29: kyis zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D2510-1:101a-30: pa'i mthus te / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-1:101a-31: tshul gyis sems dang sems las byung ba rnams sngon
T02D2510-1:101a-32: gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyi stobs kyis ye shes rtogs
T02D2510-1:101a-33: pa'i mthus te / pa yin no // rnam par
T02D2510-1:101a-34: snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:101a-35: ni dbus na bzhugs pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o
T02D2510-1:101a-36: pa'i mthus te / pa yin no // // byang
T02D2510-1:101a-37: chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D2510-1:101a-38: zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi byang chub sems
T02D2510-1:101a-39: dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rang rang gi thugs kar
T02D2510-1:101a-40: zhugs shing chud par gyur te zhas bya ba'i tha
T02D2510-1:101a-41: pa'i mthus te / pa yin no // // tshig go // ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2510-1:101b-0: de dag thams @101b cad kyi thugs las zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:101b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las zhes
T02D2510-1:101b-2: bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar
T02D2510-1:101b-3: zhugs nas / rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:101b-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i thugs las /
T02D2510-1:101b-5: rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:101b-6: 'khor dang bcas te byung nas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:101b-7: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las sems ma rdo
T02D2510-1:101b-8: rje ma dang / rin chen ma dang /
T02D2510-1:101b-10: las ma rnams byung zhing sbrul te /
T02D2510-1:101b-11: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2510-1:101b-12: bzhugs pas bdag nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul
T02D2510-1:101b-13: gyis bzhugs so// mi bskyod pa'i thugs las mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:101b-21: byams pa la sogs pa shar phyogs kyi cha la bzhugs pa rnams byung ste /
T02D2510-1:101b-22: sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2510-1:101b-23: bzhugs pas rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs
T02D2510-1:101b-24: so // byams pa la sogs pa yang rang rang gi gnas nyid na'o //
T02D2510-1:101b-25: gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:101b-26: ci'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar thams cad zhugs she na /
T02D2510-1:101b-27: rnam par snang mdzad ni sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus
T02D2510-1:101b-28: pa yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir ro
T02D2510-1:101b-29: // de'i thugs kar chud nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:101b-30: rnams kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste lhag ma gzhan
T02D2510-1:101b-31: dag kyang byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2510-1:101b-32: de'i yan lag gi khyad par du rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yin no //
T02D2510-1:101b-33: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis
T02D2510-1:101b-34: kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i don 'grub par bya'i phyir
T02D2510-1:101b-35: / dkyil 'khor sprul pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2510-1:101b-36: kyis ji ltar mdzad pa de ltar rjes su spyad
T02D2510-1:101b-37: par bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:101b-38: rgya chen chen po thog med skyes //
T02D2510-1:101b-39: zhes bya ba ni rgya che ba yang yin la
T02D2510-1:101b-40: chen po yang yin pas na rgya chen po ste
T02D2510-1:101b-41: ; rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka na gnas
T02D2510-1:101b-42: pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
T02D2510-1:101b-43: shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:101b-44: pa rnams bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:101b-45: thog med skyes zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:101b-46: 'di la thog ma yod pa ma yin pas na thog ma med pa ste /
T02D2510-1:102a-1: 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:102a-2: de nyid las skyes pa ni 'di ltar de bzhin
T02D2510-1:102a-3: gshegs pa gcig gi thugs ka na sangs rgyas thams
T02D2510-1:102a-5: 'dir ngo mtshar ci zhig che zhe na /
T02D2510-1:102a-6: rdul phrar ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:102a-7: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs nas gcig
T02D2510-1:102a-8: tu gyur pa nyid thob pa ni ngo mtshar che'o
T02D2510-1:102a-10: gdul bya rnams kyis de ltar ma thog gi chos
T02D2510-1:102a-11: kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can gyi de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:102a-12: pa rnams la ni don dam par gcig pa nyid
T02D2510-1:102a-13: dang du ma nyid du ma nyid mnga' ba ma
T02D2510-1:102a-14: yin no// bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-1:102a-15: ched du brjod pa'i bar gyi gzhung 'dis ni las
T02D2510-1:102a-16: kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:102a-17: gsum pa ston pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:102a-18: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa 'di dag kyang ;
T02D2510-1:102a-19: gsang ba sra zhing mtho ba las rnam par phye ste /
T02D2510-1:102a-20: bstan pa yin pas som nyi mi bya'o //
T02D2510-1:102a-21: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum pa bstan pas /
T02D2510-1:102a-22: rnam par snang mdzad chen po thob pa'i thabs bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:102a-23: 'dir dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang bskur ba'i thabs la 'jug par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:102a-24: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02D2510-1:102a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:102a-26: cad kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la ming
T02D2510-1:102a-27: brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo zhes
T02D2510-1:102a-29: ci'i phyir gsol ba btab ce na /
T02D2510-1:102a-30: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:102a-32: byin gyis brlab bar zhes bya ba ni slob dpon
T02D2510-1:102a-33: gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bri ba'i tshogs yun
T02D2510-1:102a-35: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
T02D2510-1:102a-36: pa rnams ji skad du bshad pa'i yongs su bskyab
T02D2510-1:102a-37: pa la sogs pa 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:102a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes pa rnam
T02D2510-1:102a-39: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D2510-1:102a-40: ye shes te / chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i sems dang /
T02D2510-1:102a-41: mngon pa shes pa drug ste /
T02D2510-1:102a-42: de rnams nyid kyi mngon par shes pa ji skad du bshad pa drug ste /
T02D2510-1:102b-0: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa @102b thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2510-1:102b-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs pa ste /
T02D2510-1:102b-3: de nyid dngos grub dam pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2510-1:102b-4: de dag gi phyir gsol ba 'debs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:102b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin
T02D2510-1:102b-6: la zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje
T02D2510-1:102b-7: chen po'i bdag nyid kun du bzang po ni de
T02D2510-1:102b-8: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ste /
T02D2510-1:102b-9: gang gi phyir 'di las sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs
T02D2510-1:102b-10: kyis nye bar skye zhing de dag kyang de'i dbang
T02D2510-1:102b-12: de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:102b-13: de yang de rnams kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas de'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:102b-14: rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:102b-15: de yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid kyis /
T02D2510-1:102b-16: rtag tu gnyis med pa nyid la /
T02D2510-1:102b-17: de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa zhes gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:102b-18: de nyid kyis na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin par mdzad de /
T02D2510-1:102b-19: de'i phyir rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la zhes smos so //
T02D2510-1:102b-20: 'dis zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa thugs la bzhag ste gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:102b-21: gsol ba btab bo zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab par gyur pa'o//

T02D2510-1:102b-23: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni 'dir badzra
T02D2510-1:102b-24: satva zhes bya ba'i tshul ni snying por gsungs pa

T02D2510-1:102b-26: bya ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin yin no zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:102b-27: yin te / tha tshig go // sems dpa' che
T02D2510-1:102b-28: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi zla ba'i
T02D2510-1:102b-29: dkyil 'khor la sogs par spro ba ni sems dpa'

T02D2510-1:102b-33: mo dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul gyis

T02D2510-1:103a-36: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems gsod pas na bdud do //
T02D2510-1:103a-37: de nyid ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na 'dod pa ste /
