T02D2510-1:105a-12: rab sgrub sbyin zhes bya ba ni lhags kyi phyag
T02D2510-1:105a-13: rgya des dngos grub bzang po stsol bar mdzad pas
T02D2510-1:105a-15: mi gsungs rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsung gi sku la'o //
T02D2510-1:105a-16: mchog grub pa zhes ba ni rdo rje ljags kyis
T02D2510-1:105a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las rang gis dngos
T02D2510-1:105a-18: grub brnyes pas na mchog grub pa'o //
T02D2510-1:105a-19: rdo rje gsungs zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
T02D2510-1:105a-20: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
T02D2510-1:105a-21: rdo rje las ni badzra karmma zhes bya ba ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105a-22: rab rdo rje'i bka' zhes bya ba ni shin tu bzang po'i rdo rje ni rab rdo rje ste /
T02D2510-1:105a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
T02D2510-1:105a-24: de rnams kyi bka' ni bsgo ba ste /
T02D2510-1:105a-25: sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dang /
T02D2510-1:105a-26: sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:105a-27: de 'di la mnga' bas na rab rdo rje'i bka'o //
T02D2510-1:105a-28: las kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:105a-29: rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105a-30: kun rab 'gro zhes bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rjes nam mkha' khyab pa'o //
T02D2510-1:105a-31: rdo rje nges pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub
T02D2510-1:105a-32: sems dpa' sna tshogs rdo rje'i sku'i sgo nas so
T02D2510-1:105a-33: // rgya che ba zhes bya ba ni mchod pa
T02D2510-1:105a-34: ma lus shing lus pa med pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:105a-35: pa thams cad mchod pas na rgya che ba'o //
T02D2510-1:105a-36: rdo rje kun zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
T02D2510-1:105a-37: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
T02D2510-1:105a-38: rdo rje bsrung ba ni badzra raksha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105a-39: brtan pa che zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs
T02D2510-1:105a-40: su dag pa'i las kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshul gyis
T02D2510-1:105a-41: so // rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba ni go cha'i phag rgya'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105b-0: sra ba che zhes bya ba ni de nyid gzhig par dka' ba yin pa'i @105b phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:105b-1: brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka' //
T02D2510-1:105b-2: zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi mchog kyang yin la thub par dka' ba yang yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:105b-3: brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka' //
T02D2510-1:105b-5: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje bsrung ba'i sku'o //
T02D2510-1:105b-6: rdo rje brtson 'grus zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
T02D2510-1:105b-7: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
T02D2510-1:105b-8: rdo rje gnod sbyin ni badzra yaksha ste snying po'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105b-9: thabs chen po zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs
T02D2510-1:105b-10: su dag pa'i so sor rtogs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis
T02D2510-1:105b-11: bdud thams cad nya bar med dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus
T02D2510-1:105b-12: chen po mnga' ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:105b-13: rdo rje mche ba zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105b-14: 'jigs pa che zhes bya ba ni mche ba'i phyag
T02D2510-1:105b-15: rgya de nyid kyis nam mkha' thams cad khyab par
T02D2510-1:105b-16: mdzad pas so // bdud 'joms zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:105b-17: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sku
T02D2510-1:105b-18: mdzad pas so // la'o // rdo rje mi bzad
T02D2510-1:105b-19: pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag
T02D2510-1:105b-20: rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad
T02D2510-1:105b-21: pas na rdo rje mi bzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:105b-22: rdo rje drag po zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
T02D2510-1:105b-23: de ltar na mtshan bdun no //
T02D2510-1:105b-24: rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba ni badzra sandhi ste nying po'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105b-25: rab bsdus nyid ces bya ba ni shin tu bsdus
T02D2510-1:105b-26: pa'i byin gyis rlob ba'i las mdzad pas na rab
T02D2510-1:105b-27: bsdus nyid do // rdo rje 'ching ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105b-28: rab grol byed ces bya ba ni de kho na
T02D2510-1:105b-29: nyid kyi sbyor bas sgrib pa thams cad las rab
T02D2510-1:105b-30: tu thar bar mdzad pas na rab grol byed do
T02D2510-1:105b-31: ; / rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog /
T02D2510-1:105b-32: ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T02D2510-1:105b-33: rdo rje khu tshur gyi sku'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105b-34: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas te /
T02D2510-1:105b-36: de ltar na mtshan brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:105b-37: 'ching ba ni zhes bya ba ni tshig dang don gyi sgo nas sam /
T02D2510-1:105b-38: bzlas pa dang sgom pa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2510-1:105b-39: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad
T02D2510-1:105b-40: zad par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na zhi ba'o
T02D2510-1:105b-41: // rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs //
T02D2510-1:105b-42: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje 'chang ba
T02D2510-1:105b-43: chen po la ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs
T02D2510-1:106a-1: brgyad mnga' ba de bzhin du /
T02D2510-1:106a-2: sgrub pa po 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:106a-3: gang zhig ces bya ba ni gang la yod pa'o //
T02D2510-1:106a-4: yon tan zhes bya ba ni yon tan gyi rgyur gyur pas na yon tan no //
T02D2510-1:106a-5: ming rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:106a-8: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun mi 'chang pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D2510-1:106a-9: dbyangs kyis bstod pas zhes bya ba ni rnal ma
T02D2510-1:106a-10: nyid yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po la
T02D2510-1:106a-11: de'i yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod par 'dod pas
T02D2510-1:106a-14: rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2510-1:106a-15: theg pa chen po rtogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:106a-16: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02D2510-1:106a-17: ces bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras
T02D2510-1:106a-18: bu dang bcas pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:106a-19: 'khor 'di ni tshul chen po yin te /
T02D2510-1:106a-20: sems can skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcur rgyas shing bskor bar mdzod ces pa'o //
T02D2510-1:106a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
T02D2510-1:106a-22: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2510-1:106a-23: pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshogs pa 'dir mdzad pas
T02D2510-1:106a-25: / cho ga'i mchog ni bshad par gsol //
T02D2510-1:106a-26: zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i spyod pa'i chog la
T02D2510-1:106a-27: stos na sngags kyi tshul gyi cho ga khyad par
T02D2510-1:106a-28: du 'phags pa yin pas cho ga'i mchog ces bya
T02D2510-1:106a-29: ste / gang gi phyir mdo sde la spyod pa
T02D2510-1:106a-30: rnams bskal pa grangs mang pa gsum gyis mngon par
T02D2510-1:106a-32: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub
T02D2510-1:106a-33: sems dpa' rnams ni tshe 'di nyid la rab tu
T02D2510-1:106a-34: dga' ba'i sa thob nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
T02D2510-1:106a-35: rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:106a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:106a-37: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig go //
T02D2510-1:106a-38: de 'byung ba ni rdo rje gang las byung ba ste /
T02D2510-1:106a-39: de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gang
T02D2510-1:106a-40: la ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:106a-41: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
T02D2510-1:106b-0: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gsungs @106b
T02D2510-1:106b-1: pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad do zhes
T02D2510-1:106b-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:106b-4: gang phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste des na
T02D2510-1:106b-5: 'di 'byung ba ni gang gi phyir ming la sogs
T02D2510-1:106b-6: pa kha cig rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-1:106b-7: po de bzhin gshegs pas ri rab kyi rtse mor
T02D2510-1:106b-8: sprul pa lta pa'i skal pa dang mi ldan pa
T02D2510-1:106b-9: yin la / de bas na de rnams kyis mthong
T02D2510-1:106b-10: bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon bskyed bar bya
T02D2510-1:106b-11: ba'i phyir yang dag par bshad do zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:106b-12: yin la / ste / yang dag par rnam par
T02D2510-1:106b-13: phye nas rab tu bshad cing bstan pas na yang
T02D2510-1:106b-15: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:106b-16: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni sku'i gsang ba gtso bor gyur pa yin gyi /
T02D2510-1:106b-17: thugs la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2510-1:106b-18: de nyid mchog tu gyur pas na dam pa ste /
T02D2510-1:106b-19: gang gi phyir tshe 'di nyid la sa thob par sgrub pa byed pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:106b-20: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
T02D2510-1:106b-22: ri rab kyi steng gi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2510-1:106b-23: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:106b-24: rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags /
T02D2510-1:106b-26: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin
T02D2510-1:106b-27: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2510-1:106b-28: rdo rje'i dbyings kyis nye bar mtshon pas na /
T02D2510-1:106b-29: rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags //
T02D2510-1:106b-31: sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya cher //
T02D2510-1:106b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:106b-33: langs nas bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:106b-34: ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang //
T02D2510-1:106b-36: ci rigs par ni 'di yin te //
T02D2510-1:106b-37: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2510-1:106b-39: lo gcig gi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:106b-40: de la yang dang po re zhig rang gi sdom
T02D2510-1:106b-41: pa la gnas pa'i nang gi bdag nyid can gyi
T02D2510-1:106b-42: khrus dang / phyi'i khrus kyang ci nus par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:106b-43: de la sdom pa gsum la rab tu gnas shing skyang ba ni khrus gcig go //
T02D2510-1:106b-44: bshags pa dang ga sol ba 'debs pa la sogs pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D2510-1:106b-45: phyag rgya dgrol ba ni gsum pa'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-2: 'di dag dang gos gsum pa brje bar yang bya'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-3: de la sdom pa rnams la gnas pa ni gos dang po'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-4: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-5: phyi gos gtsang ma ni gsum pa zhes bya bar bshad do //
T02D2510-1:107a-6: de nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2510-1:107a-7: nyin re zhing sdom pa gzung ba yang lan drug tu bya'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-8: de nas sdog pa dral ba dang phyag rgya thams
T02D2510-1:107a-9: cad dgrol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la
T02D2510-1:107a-11: de nas snying gar dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-12: yang na rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pas dang po'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2510-1:107a-13: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2510-1:107a-14: phyag 'tshal ba dang ched du brjod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:107a-15: rang gi snying gar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs par lhag par mos pa yang byas nas /
T02D2510-1:107a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas
T02D2510-1:107a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung la rang rang gi
T02D2510-1:107a-18: ting nge 'dzin gyis gnas nas ched du brjod pa
T02D2510-1:107a-19: chen du brjod par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-20: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig
T02D2510-1:107a-21: tu gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:107a-22: thams cad las phreng ba'i dbang nga skur ba la
T02D2510-1:107a-23: sogs pa dbang bskur ba thams cad blangs la /
T02D2510-1:107a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-1:107a-28: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-29: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
T02D2510-1:107a-30: phrin las rnams la nges par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:107a-31: de la dang po re zhig rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-1:107a-32: kyi phyag chen po bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2510-1:107a-33: gcig tu bsdus par mdzod cig ces rang gi las
T02D2510-1:107a-34: la nges par sbyar bar bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:107a-35: / de bzhin du sems ma dang /
T02D2510-1:107a-38: las kyi rdo rje mas rigs thams cad bsdus par rgyas gdab par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:107a-39: mi bskyod pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:107a-40: byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzod cig / rin
T02D2510-1:107b-0: chen 'byung ldan la @107b sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
T02D2510-1:107b-1: phyin pa dang / 'od dpag tu med pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
T02D2510-1:107b-2: don yod par grub pa la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:107b-3: thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2510-1:107b-4: yongs su rdzogs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang
T02D2510-1:107b-5: / rdo rje sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:107b-6: thams cad byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhag
T02D2510-1:107b-7: par mdzod cig / rdo rje rgyal po la de
T02D2510-1:107b-8: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang pa dang /
T02D2510-1:107b-9: chags pas rjes su mnyes par mdzod cig / legs
T02D2510-1:107b-10: pas legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par mdzod cig
T02D2510-1:107b-11: / rin chen gyis dbang bskur bar mdzod cig /
T02D2510-1:107b-12: nyi mas nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzod cig
T02D2510-1:107b-13: / rgyal mtshan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D2510-1:107b-14: pa la rab tu 'jog par mdzod cig / bzhad
T02D2510-1:107b-15: pas 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la rab tu
T02D2510-1:107b-16: gzhag par mdzod cig / chos kyis shin tu rnam
T02D2510-1:107b-17: par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jog
T02D2510-1:107b-18: par mdzod cig / rnon pos sems can gyi nyon
T02D2510-1:107b-19: mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gcod
T02D2510-1:107b-20: par mdzod cig /'khor los de rnams dkyil 'khor du
T02D2510-1:107b-21: zhugs par mdzod cig / smra bas spros pa med
T02D2510-1:107b-22: pa'i chos nyid la nges par sbyor bar mdzod cig
T02D2510-1:107b-23: / rdo rje las kyis ma lus shing lus pa
T02D2510-1:107b-24: med pa'i mchod pas mchod par mdzod cig / srung
T02D2510-1:107b-25: bas theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i sems nyid las
T02D2510-1:107b-26: rjes su srungs shig / gnod sbyin srung ba yongs
T02D2510-1:107b-27: su bskyangs pas de rnams yongs su srungs shig /
T02D2510-1:107b-28: khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur sgrubs
T02D2510-1:107b-30: sgeg mo la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:107b-38: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de rnams
T02D2510-1:107b-39: nges par sbyor cig / rdo rje lcags kyus byang
T02D2510-1:107b-40: chub kyi sems kyi lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:107b-41: thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug
T02D2510-1:107b-42: par mdzod cig / zhags pas byang chub kyi spyod
T02D2510-1:107b-43: pa'i zhags pas gzhug tu gsol /
T02D2510-1:107b-44: lcags sgrog gi theg pa gzhan 'dod pa'i sems la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dral ba dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-0: @108a * // shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin ba'i bsam gtan
T02D2510-1:108a-1: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcing du gsol
T02D2510-1:108a-2: // 'bebs pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing skye
T02D2510-1:108a-3: ba med par 'bebs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2510-1:108a-4: 'bebs par mdzod cig ces bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-5: byangs pa la sogs pa la dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer yongs su skyongs shig ces bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108a-6: thams cad du thams cad kyi rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2510-1:108a-7: rang gi phrin las la des par sbyar ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108a-8: de ltar las kyi rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms
T02D2510-1:108a-9: nas yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bsdu ba
T02D2510-1:108a-10: byas te / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02D2510-1:108a-11: ji lta ba bzhin du dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-14: dbang du bya ba byas la /
T02D2510-1:108a-15: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-16: phyogs bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:108a-17: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de /
T02D2510-1:108a-18: rdo rje go chas srung ba thams cad yang dag par srungs la /
T02D2510-1:108a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur te /
T02D2510-1:108a-21: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba dang phyi'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-22: sgeg mo la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-23: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-25: mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis yang legs par mchod la /
T02D2510-1:108a-31: badzra sa tva zhes brjod la /
T02D2510-1:108a-32: thams cad kyang bdag kho na yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108a-33: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bas bstod la /
T02D2510-1:108a-34: de bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2510-1:108a-35: ji lta ba bzhin du phyag byas nas /
T02D2510-1:108a-36: phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la dbang bskur te /
T02D2510-1:108a-37: go cha bgos nas mnyam pa'i thal mos kyang mnyes par byas la /
T02D2510-1:108a-38: badzra sa tva zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:108a-39: yi ge brgya ba yang brjod la /
T02D2510-1:108a-40: mngon par 'dod pa'i dpa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge
T02D2510-1:108a-41: ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos nas mchod yon phul
T02D2510-1:108b-0: lo // slar byon ba'i phyir bskul te gshegs @108b su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-1: de nas rdo rje bsrung ba dang /
T02D2510-1:108b-3: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas /
T02D2510-1:108b-4: mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa'i bya ba bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-5: de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa'i brtul zhugs rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-6: de ltar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:108b-10: grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi phyogs kyi char yid dang rjes su mthun par /
T02D2510-1:108b-11: shin tu mnyam zhing snum pa /
T02D2510-1:108b-12: shar du gzhol ba shin tu tshad dang ldan pa /
T02D2510-1:108b-13: tshva sgo med pa'i sa'i cha der rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-14: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-15: tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am de'i phyed do //
T02D2510-1:108b-16: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-17: de la dang po re zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D2510-1:108b-18: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye
T02D2510-1:108b-19: ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2510-1:108b-20: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi chogs dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog nas /
T02D2510-1:108b-23: sa bdag la sogs ba zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-24: de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:108b-27: pus mo nu btsam du 'og tu brkos la /
T02D2510-1:108b-28: spos chu dri zhim pos bran pa'i sas bkang nas /
T02D2510-1:108b-29: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste /
T02D2510-1:108b-31: shin tu mnyam par byas te /
T02D2510-1:108b-32: khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du chud pa /
T02D2510-1:108b-33: rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la sgo bzhi dang ldan ba skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D2510-1:108b-34: mtha' ma dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2510-1:108b-35: bla re mchog sna tshogs bres pas nye bar mdzes par byas la /
T02D2510-1:108b-36: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris
T02D2510-1:108b-37: dang sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa
T02D2510-1:108b-38: grva bzhir gzhags pa'i spos snod rnams las spos legs
T02D2510-1:108b-41: gos la sogs pa'i yo byang rnams kyis mdzes par
T02D2510-1:108b-42: byas pa'i sa'i cha dris nye bar byugs nas rdo
T02D2510-1:108b-43: rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus bsangs
T02D2510-1:109a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109a-3: sa sbyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2510-1:109a-4: de nas rang nyid khrus byas shing lus dri zhi ma pos byugs la /
T02D2510-1:109a-5: ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing /
T02D2510-1:109a-6: shin tu dmar ba'i ras gos bgo ba dang /
T02D2510-1:109a-7: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim por byas la /
T02D2510-1:109a-8: yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:109a-13: tshes lnga'i snga dro'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:109a-15: de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag dar dang skyang nul la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2510-1:109a-16: de bzhin du lag pa sa la reg par byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2510-1:109a-17: yi ge brgya pa bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109a-18: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
T02D2510-1:109a-20: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109a-21: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
T02D2510-1:109a-22: phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2510-1:109a-23: sdom pa gzung ba dang rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02D2510-1:109a-24: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bskyed la /
T02D2510-1:109a-25: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug ste /
T02D2510-1:109a-26: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2510-1:109a-28: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
T02D2510-1:109a-29: zhes bya ba'i par gyis bdag nyid spro ba bskyed bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109a-30: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /
T02D2510-1:109a-31: spos smod lag tu thogs te /
T02D2510-1:109a-32: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2510-1:109a-34: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02D2510-1:109a-35: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109a-36: de nas yang dang po sbyor ba dang /
T02D2510-1:109a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang /
T02D2510-1:109a-38: las kyi rgyal po mchog rnams bsgoms la /
T02D2510-1:109a-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po gnas shing /
T02D2510-1:109a-40: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlo sa pa la brtson
T02D2510-1:109a-41: pa la rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2510-1:109a-42: bri pa'i phyir / sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin
T02D2510-1:109a-43: gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mtshan brgya rtsa
T02D2510-1:109b-0: @109b brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109b-1: de ltar na 'di ni ci rigs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:109b-2: tshul 'dis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug pa las langs nas yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109b-3: 'on te spros par 'dod na spros pa dang bcas
T02D2510-1:109b-4: pa'i skyor ba nyid bya bar shes bya bar shes
T02D2510-1:109b-5: par bya'o // sems dpa' chen po ni phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:109b-6: cher bsgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing zhes bya
T02D2510-1:109b-7: ba ni de nas gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs
T02D2510-1:109b-8: par bya'o // nyid la / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams te /
T02D2510-1:109b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la /
T02D2510-1:109b-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-1:109b-11: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:109b-12: bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02D2510-1:109b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02D2510-1:109b-14: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02D2510-1:109b-15: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
T02D2510-1:109b-16: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
T02D2510-1:109b-17: phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin //
T02D2510-1:109b-18: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis rlob pa mi 'dor ro //
T02D2510-1:109b-20: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2510-1:109b-21: rgyas ji ltar yongs su bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor bteg
T02D2510-1:109b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya de
T02D2510-1:109b-24: nyid kyis badzra sa tva zhes zlos shing bdag nyid
T02D2510-1:109b-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal bskyed de /
T02D2510-1:109b-27: badzra dri shti mata ces bya ba nig gnyis su bkod la /
T02D2510-1:109b-28: aa zhes bya bas rkang pa gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2510-1:109b-29: yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen bor bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:109b-31: sems dpa' che yi phyag rgya cher //
T02D2510-1:109b-32: sgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing //
T02D2510-1:109b-33: zhes pa 'di'i don ston pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:109b-34: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02D2510-1:109b-35: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen mo ma bkrol
T02D2510-1:109b-36: bas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bshig la langs te
T02D2510-1:109b-37: / phyag rgyas gnas pas na phyag rgya la gnas zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2510-1:109b-38: phyag rgya chen po bcings pa nyid kyis gnas pa'o //
T02D2510-1:109b-39: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02D2510-1:109b-40: zhes bya ba ni dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:109b-41: g-yon phyogs nas bltas pas bgegs bskrad par byas la /
T02D2510-1:110a-1: de bzhin du g-yas phyogs nas bltas nas phyogs mtshams dang /
T02D2510-1:110a-2: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' dang sa bcing ba dang ra ba dang dra ba byas la /
T02D2510-1:110a-3: rkang mthil gyis yongs su bzang bas sa bzhi brtan
T02D2510-1:110a-4: pa nas brtsams te ri rab kyi steng gi bar
T02D2510-1:110a-5: du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byed cing ;
T02D2510-1:110a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2510-1:110a-7: de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing g-yas phyogs nas yongs su bskor nas /
T02D2510-1:110a-8: yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul
T02D2510-1:110a-9: gyis bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya ba nas
T02D2510-1:110a-10: / lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:110a-11: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:110a-12: de dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam
T02D2510-1:110a-13: mkhar zhag la thig gis thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:110a-14: sar pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gzhan du yongs su ma spyad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:110a-15: legs par bkal nas kyang zhes bya ba ni dris
T02D2510-1:110a-16: byug pa'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du gzhag go
T02D2510-1:110a-17: // tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni dkyil
T02D2510-1:110a-18: 'khor khru drug pa la sboms su mthe'u chung gi
T02D2510-1:110a-19: tshad la chur dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur gyi tshad kyis
T02D2510-1:110a-20: // so // mdzes pa'i thig gis zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:110a-21: ni tshon sna lnga pos lta na sdug pa'i thig
T02D2510-1:110a-23: mkhas pas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi mdog dang dbyibs dang bya ba la sbyang ba'o //
T02D2510-1:110a-24: ci nus kyis zhes bya ba ni tshad dpag tshad nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:110a-25: khru drug pa'i tshad kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du nus pa'i tshad las dpags te /
T02D2510-1:110a-26: dkyil 'khor gyi thig gis gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:110a-27: grub bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
T02D2510-1:110a-28: zhes bya ba ni shar dang nub dang byang dang
T02D2510-1:110a-29: lho'i ngos kyi ri mos zur bzhir bya pa'i phyir
T02D2510-1:110a-30: gru bzhi'o // sgo bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:110a-31: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi ngos kyi
T02D2510-1:110a-32: dbus su re re zhing sgo btod pa yod de
T02D2510-1:110a-34: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
T02D2510-1:110a-35: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2510-1:110a-36: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02D2510-1:110a-37: zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang mtshams kyi tig gnyis te /
T02D2510-1:110a-38: de dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa
T02D2510-1:110a-39: ni mnyam por bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D2510-1:110a-40: du'o // dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02D2510-1:110a-41: zhes bya ba ni dar gyi phreng ba dang /
T02D2510-1:110b-0: @110b me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2510-1:110b-1: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad dang //
T02D2510-1:110b-2: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02D2510-1:110b-3: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni //
T02D2510-1:110b-4: dkyil 'khor phyi ri thig gdab bo //
T02D2510-1:110b-5: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor grva'i phyogs bzhi char du yang zla ba phyed pa /
T02D2510-1:110b-6: de'i steng du rdo rje rin chen yod par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:110b-7: sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud ni sgo khyud de //
T02D2510-1:110b-8: de rnams kyi mtshams ni ri mo gnyis phrad pa'i tshul te /
T02D2510-1:110b-9: de rnams su yang zla ba phyed pa'i steng du
T02D2510-1:110b-10: rdo rje'i na po che yod par thig gdab par
T02D2510-1:110b-11: bya'o // de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
T02D2510-1:110b-12: 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i rim pa'i nang du zhugs la //
T02D2510-1:110b-13: 'khor lo 'dra bar dkyil 'khor gyi gnas gru bzhi
T02D2510-1:110b-14: dang sgo bzhi la sogs pa ji skad du bshad
T02D2510-1:110b-15: pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba la rta babs
T02D2510-1:110b-16: med par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:110b-17: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar //
T02D2510-1:110b-18: zhes bya ba ni rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D2510-1:110b-19: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa //
T02D2510-1:110b-20: zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi cha re re zhing
T02D2510-1:110b-21: rtsig pa la brten pa'i rdo rje ka ba gnyis
T02D2510-1:110b-23: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:110b-24: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su 'ang //
T02D2510-1:110b-25: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan pa //
T02D2510-1:110b-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ka ba rnams kyi
T02D2510-1:110b-27: mchog ste gnas dam pa yin pas na rdo rje
T02D2510-1:110b-28: ka ba'i mchog gi gnas su'o //
T02D2510-1:110b-29: rdo rje ka ba'i mchog gi gnas de rnams su /
T02D2510-1:110b-30: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:110b-34: don yod grub pa'i gnas rnams su ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zlum po lnga'i thig btab la /
T02D2510-1:110b-35: yang re re zhing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga
T02D2510-1:110b-36: yod pa'i rdo rje rim mos yongs su bskor bar
T02D2510-1:110b-37: thig btab la / zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2510-1:110b-38: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes byas shing /
T02D2510-1:110b-39: rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor bar //
T02D2510-1:110b-40: dkyil 'khor dbus ma bri bar bya //
T02D2510-1:110b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:110b-42: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rtse mo las rdo
T02D2510-1:110b-43: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor che na po'i cha bgo
T02D2510-1:110b-44: ba mdzad pa yin pas the tshom mi bya'o //
T02D2510-1:111a-0: 'dir yang de'i 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes bstan pa ni 'khor @111a * //

T02D2510-1:111a-8: 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //

T02D2510-1:111a-11: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //

T02D2510-1:111a-26: la bkod de / d'i pti shti am ku sha dza: zhes bya ba /
T02D2510-1:111a-28: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02D2510-1:111a-29: zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i lta ba dang /

T02D2510-1:114a-34: rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po lto ba yang pa /

T02D2510-1:114a-36: gnyis kyis zhal gyi mtha' gnyis su mche ba gnyis
T02D2510-1:114a-38: rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog ser po dam tshig
T02D2510-1:114a-39: gi khu tshur gnyis kyi nang du rdo rje chud
T02D2510-1:114b-0: pa / dam tshig gi khu @114b tshur gyis btsir zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-1: sgeg mo sku mdog dkar pa /
T02D2510-1:114b-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams te /
T02D2510-1:114b-3: rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis sgeg pas g-yon du cung zad 'dud pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-4: phreng ba ma sku mdog ser po /
T02D2510-1:114b-5: rin po che'i phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tshem par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-6: glu ma sku mdog dmar skya pi wang brdung ba'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-7: gar ma sku mdog rdo rje las lta bu rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams te /
T02D2510-1:114b-8: phyag gnyis kyis gar mdzad cing ba zhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-9: bdug pa ma sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje spos
T02D2510-1:114b-10: snod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tshim par mdzad
T02D2510-1:114b-11: pa'o // me tog ma sku mdog ser mo phyag
T02D2510-1:114b-12: g-yon gyis rdo rje me tog gi snod thogs te
T02D2510-1:114b-13: pa'o // / phyag g-yas kyis me tog gi char 'bebs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-14: mar me ma sku mdog dmar skya mar me'i sdong bu bsnams te /
T02D2510-1:114b-15: snang ba'i tshogs kyis mchod par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-16: byug pa ma gar ma ltar sna tshogs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yon dri'i dung chos bsnams te /
T02D2510-1:114b-17: phyag g-yas kyis dri'i sprin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-18: rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog dkar po rdo rje
T02D2510-1:114b-19: lcags khus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan 'dren par
T02D2510-1:114b-20: mdzad pa'o // rdo rje zhags pa sku mdog ser
T02D2510-1:114b-21: po rdo rje zhags pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2510-1:114b-23: rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar skya rdo rje
T02D2510-1:114b-24: lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'ching bar
T02D2510-1:114b-25: mdzad pa'o // rdo rje 'bebs pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D2510-1:114b-26: mdog can phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams
T02D2510-1:114b-27: mdzad pa'o // te / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'bebs par mdzad pa /
T02D2510-1:114b-28: phyag g-yon gdan la brten te bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-29: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa /
T02D2510-1:114b-30: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2510-1:114b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa /
T02D2510-1:114b-34: sgeg pa'i nyams dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa /
T02D2510-1:114b-35: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02D2510-1:114b-36: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2510-1:114b-37: byams pa la sogs pa shar gyi cha la ni
T02D2510-1:114b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar rdo rje bsnams
T02D2510-1:115a-1: / lhor ni rdo rje rin chen dang 'dra bar rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-1:115a-2: nub tu ni rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar rdo rje padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-1:115a-3: byang du ni rdo rje las dang 'dra bar sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02D2510-1:115a-5: 'di ltar rin po che'i chod pan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba mnga' ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:115a-6: aom sarbba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharmm'a te
T02D2510-1:115a-7: ma h'a n'a ya ba ri b'a re sv'a h'a
T02D2510-1:115a-8: zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po rnams kyi
T02D2510-1:115a-10: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:115a-11: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas /
T02D2510-1:115a-12: phyi rol kun du spos chus byug cing me tog sil ma bkram la dgongs ka'i dus su /
T02D2510-1:115a-13: badzra satva zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i dam
T02D2510-1:115a-14: tshig gi phyag rgya me tog gi phreng ba bzung
T02D2510-1:115a-15: la / rdo rje shugs kyi dkyil 'khor du zhugs la /
T02D2510-1:115a-16: yang rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas la /
T02D2510-1:115a-17: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang ma tshang
T02D2510-1:115a-18: ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la
T02D2510-1:115a-19: / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phreng ba de phul te /
T02D2510-1:115a-21: blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:115a-22: badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba bar ma chad par bzlas par bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:115a-23: / de yang rdo rje dril bu rab bskor bas //
T02D2510-1:115a-24: mkhas pas ma tshang yongs su skong //
T02D2510-1:115a-25: lhag pa gang yin 'dor bar byed //
T02D2510-1:115a-28: de'i rjes la yi ge h'um las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:115a-29: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02D2510-1:115a-30: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D2510-1:115a-31: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02D2510-1:115a-32: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02D2510-1:115a-33: aom badzro tgha ta sa ma ya bra be sha ya h'um zhes bya ba /
T02D2510-1:115a-34: phyag rgya dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:115a-35: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas nas /
T02D2510-1:115a-36: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la /
T02D2510-1:115a-37: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i me tog gi lcug ma rdo rje sems mas yongs su bzung ba las /
T02D2510-1:115a-38: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D2510-1:115b-0: yang badzrod ka h'um zhes stong rtsa brgyad mngon par @115b bzlas te /
T02D2510-1:115b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar legs par gzhag go //
T02D2510-1:115b-2: bum pa lhag ma rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:115b-3: pa la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te
T02D2510-1:115b-4: / dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:115b-5: de'i rjes la bum pa gang ba la rnam par
T02D2510-1:115b-6: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas la gzhag par
T02D2510-1:115b-7: bya'o // yang bum pa gcig la rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:115b-8: dpa' lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla ste 'jug pa'i sgor
T02D2510-1:115b-9: mngon par phyogs par gzhag go //
T02D2510-1:115b-10: ma 'byor na dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang de
T02D2510-1:115b-11: bzhin gshegs pa lnga la bum pa dul bar bya
T02D2510-1:115b-12: ste / aom badzra satva mu shti aa: zhes bya ba ni bskyod pa'i rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02D2510-1:115b-13: aom badzra ratna mu shti tr'am zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:115b-14: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o
T02D2510-1:115b-15: // aom badzra dharmma mushti kham zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:115b-16: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs kyi bum ba la'o
T02D2510-1:115b-17: // // aom badzra karmma mushti ham zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:115b-18: ni don yod par grub pa'i las kyi rigs kyi
T02D2510-1:115b-19: bum pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas
T02D2510-1:115b-20: la rigs de la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:115b-21: de bzhin du bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:115b-22: bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes nges pa gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:115b-23: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha yid kyis mngon sum
T02D2510-1:115b-24: lta bur mngon du byas la mchod pa lnga dang
T02D2510-1:115b-25: kha zas kyi bye brag rnams kyi ci nus par
T02D2510-1:115b-27: rang gi gdong ji lta ba bzhin du g-yogs te
T02D2510-1:115b-28: phyag bzhi dang sdom pa gzung ba'i bar du byas
T02D2510-1:115b-29: nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag
T02D2510-1:115b-32: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod nas sems ma rdo rje ma bcings la /
T02D2510-1:115b-33: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs te /
T02D2510-1:115b-34: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo
T02D2510-1:115b-35: rje ma dral zhing a'a: zhes bya bas bdag nyid
T02D2510-1:115b-37: ji lta bar ni bka' nod do //
T02D2510-1:115b-39: de la ji lta bar zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-1:115b-40: de ltar bdag nyid la dbab pa dang /
T02D2510-1:115b-45: yang sems ma rdo rje ma bcings te /
T02D2510-1:115b-46: rang gi snying gar bkrol bas kyang dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02D2510-1:116a-1: thams cad blang ba byas nas dam tshig gsum gzung
T02D2510-1:116a-2: ba'i phyir dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gzung
T02D2510-1:116a-3: bar bya'o // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das las sngags mnos la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2510-1:116a-5: bdag nyid la mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:116a-6: bdag kun du bzang po rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:116a-7: la sogs pa rang gi dbang bskur ba'i ming nas
T02D2510-1:116a-8: brjod par bya'o // de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba //
T02D2510-1:116a-9: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag
T02D2510-1:116a-10: rgya chen po bcings la rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2510-1:116a-11: gnas su / badzra dh'a tu aa zhes bya bas
T02D2510-1:116a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsams la
T02D2510-1:116a-13: gnas su / / rdo rje de badzro& ham zhes bsgoms la /
T02D2510-1:116a-14: de nyid la ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta ta th'a ham zhes bsgoms te /
T02D2510-1:116a-15: rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgom par bya
T02D2510-1:116a-16: ba nas de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar
T02D2510-1:116a-17: gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2510-1:116a-18: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas su badzra a'a be sha /
T02D2510-1:116a-19: aa: zhes bya bas rdo rje dril bur bdag nyid bsams la /
T02D2510-1:116a-20: badzra gha ndo& ham zhes bya bas dril bu'i rnam par bsgoms te /
T02D2510-1:116a-21: de nyid badzra a'a be sho& ham zhes bya bas
T02D2510-1:116a-22: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar bdag nyid bsgom par bya
T02D2510-1:116a-23: ste / de ltar na dkyil 'khor des rdo rje sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:116a-24: gnas skabs 'dir mtshan ma'i phyag rgya nyid la rdo rje sgrar bshad pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:116a-25: gang gi phyir rgyud 'dir mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du bshad la /
T02D2510-1:116a-26: de bas na mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la rdo rje zhes bya bar the tshom med do //
T02D2510-1:116a-28: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-1:116a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2510-1:116a-30: bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la rdo rje se gol
T02D2510-1:116a-32: aom badzra dza: badzra sa m'a dza: dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2510-1:116a-33: zhes zlos shing rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:116a-34: nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar gyi sangs rgyas thams
T02D2510-1:116a-36: de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D2510-1:116a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:116a-38: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2510-1:116a-39: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor te de rnams kyis de yang
T02D2510-1:116a-40: dag par gang bas na de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2510-1:116a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas bskal pa
T02D2510-1:116a-43: bzang po'i bar gyi rdo rje dbyings kyi khang pa
T02D2510-1:116b-0: brtsegs ma @116b na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2510-1:116b-2: rdo rje slob dpon gyis brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor dbye
T02D2510-1:116b-3: ba mtha' yas pa'i gzhal yas khang du bzhugs te
T02D2510-1:116b-4: / kun nas yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'dus par gyur cing /
T02D2510-1:116b-5: tshogs par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2510-1:116b-6: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs ba la /
T02D2510-1:116b-7: bsdus par gyur pa'i rjes thogs nyid la phyag bya ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:116b-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus par gyur
T02D2510-1:116b-9: ba'i sku'i gsang ba phyag rgya chen po'i tshul sgom
T02D2510-1:116b-10: par byed cing 'dus nas byon pa la pus mo
T02D2510-1:116b-11: gnyis kyi lha ngas la btsugs la /
T02D2510-1:116b-12: rdo rje thal mo bskor nas shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du snying gar 'jog pa dang /
T02D2510-1:116b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2510-1:116b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:116b-15: de nas dgyes par gyur pas na /
T02D2510-1:116b-16: 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bstan par gyur cing mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:116b-17: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
T02D2510-1:116b-18: zhes bya ba ni grogs po ltar sgrub pa po
T02D2510-1:116b-19: la dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub stsol bar mdzad do
T02D2510-1:116b-20: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:116b-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:116b-22: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
T02D2510-1:116b-24: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes
T02D2510-1:116b-25: thogs la snga ma bzhin du sgong bye ba byas
T02D2510-1:116b-26: nas / rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:116b-27: mi bskyod pa'i rigs bkug la shar sgor gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:116b-28: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs ni lho sgo dang nye bar ro //
T02D2510-1:116b-29: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs ni nub sgo dang nye bar ro //
T02D2510-1:116b-30: don yod par grub pa'i rigs ni byang sgo dang nye bar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:116b-31: rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas rang rang
T02D2510-1:116b-32: gi sgo nas rang rang gi gnas su gzhug bar
T02D2510-1:116b-33: bya'o // rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas thams cad cing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:116b-34: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas rnam bar
T02D2510-1:116b-35: snang mdzad la sogs pa thams cad dbang du bya'o
T02D2510-1:116b-36: // las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2510-1:116b-37: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
T02D2510-1:116b-38: zhes bya ba ni las kyang de yin la chen po yang yin pas las chen te /
T02D2510-1:117a-0: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las su bshad pa gang yin @117a * //
T02D2510-1:117a-1: pa de ni las chen te /
T02D2510-1:117a-2: de rnams la de'i mtshan ma mchog ste dam pa'o //
T02D2510-1:117a-3: las che mchog kyang yin la phyag rgya yang yin pas las che mchog gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:117a-4: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa las gsungs ba legs par drangs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:117a-5: de la sgrub pa'i yan lag bcu drug tu bstan pa ni /
T02D2510-1:117a-23: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa re re zhing so sor bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir gsungs la /
T02D2510-1:117a-24: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bsgrub pa ni phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:117a-25: bzhir bstan pa nyid ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:117a-26: zhes bya'o zhes rgyud gzhan las gsungs pas na dam
T02D2510-1:117a-27: tshig dang / chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-1:117a-28: po'i tshul nyid las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2510-1:117a-29: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'da' bar bya ba ma
T02D2510-1:117a-30: yin pas de'i phyir dam tshig rnams zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:117a-31: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02D2510-1:117a-35: phyag rgya chen po nyid kyis de rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:117a-36: dkyil 'khor du bris pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sku la /
T02D2510-1:117a-37: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' rnams kyi chos dang /
T02D2510-1:117a-39: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul rab tu gnas par bya ba ni gzhag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:117a-40: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2510-1:117a-41: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02D2510-1:117a-42: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02D2510-1:117a-43: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:117a-44: ni ji ltar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-1:117a-45: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos dang /
T02D2510-1:117a-47: phyag rgya chen pos gzhag / de bzhin du /
T02D2510-1:117a-48: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa byed pa
T02D2510-1:117a-49: por gyur pa rnams kyang bsgrub par bya zhing bdag
T02D2510-1:117a-52: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2510-1:117a-53: 'dis ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi spyi'i
T02D2510-1:117a-54: yi ge bzhi po bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa
T02D2510-1:117a-55: yin no // la la dag dza: h'um bam ho:
T02D2510-1:117b-0: zhes bya ba @117b ni 'di dag rdo rje lcags
T02D2510-1:117b-1: kyu la sogs pa sgo srung bzhi'i phyag rgya'i snying

T02D2510-1:123b-25: 'khor gyi steng du lnga tshogs rdo rje'i gzugs su
T02D2510-1:123b-27: de'i rgyur a'atma nam n'ir+ya t'a y'a mi zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:123b-28: sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra karmma zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:123b-29: ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las la 'bod pa'o
T02D2510-1:123b-30: // ku ru mam zhes bya ba ni bdag la mdzod cig ces pa ste /
T02D2510-1:123b-31: bdag gi spyi bor zhugs la sna tshogs rdo rje'i
T02D2510-1:123b-32: gzugs su bdag nyid sprul par mdzod cig ces bya
T02D2510-1:123b-34: / de nas stod g-yogs gos dmar po gyon la /
T02D2510-1:123b-35: gdong g-yogs ras dmar pos dkris nas sems ma rdo
T02D2510-1:123b-36: rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:123b-37: / le brgan rtsi'i kha dog ltar dmar po yin gyi /
T02D2510-1:123b-38: sngon po la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2510-1:123b-39: rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la 'dir sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag bya zhes bya'i /
T02D2510-1:123b-40: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni ma yin no //
T02D2510-1:123b-41: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes bya bas bcing ngo //
T02D2510-1:123b-42: de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng
T02D2510-1:123b-43: ba 'dzin du bcug la drang zhing zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:123b-44: ni sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya de nyid
T02D2510-1:124a-0: gung mo'i sor mo gnyis phreng ba 'dzin du @124a
T02D2510-1:124a-2: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis zhes bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:124a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:124a-8: / de rnams kyi rigs ni de skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas /
T02D2510-1:124a-9: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i tshul te /
T02D2510-1:124a-10: de las bskyed pa ni rigs so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:124a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'di dag
T02D2510-1:124a-12: tu khyed phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pa dag gis
T02D2510-1:124a-13: zhugs pa ste / de las ma ya h'um zhes
T02D2510-1:124a-14: bya ba 'dis rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2510-1:124a-15: zhugs pa ste / pa ni phyi'i'o // de bzhin
T02D2510-1:124a-16: du sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba ni 'di
T02D2510-1:124a-17: nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
T02D2510-1:124a-18: shes babs pa ni gsang ba'i 'jug pa yin te
T02D2510-1:124a-19: zhugs pa ste / pa ni phyi'i'o // / de
T02D2510-1:124a-20: skad du yangs ma ya h'um zhes bya bas de
T02D2510-1:124a-21: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab par
T02D2510-1:124a-22: bya'o zhes rtse mo las gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:124a-23: ngas khyed la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2510-1:124a-24: ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya
T02D2510-1:124a-25: yis zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag tu bzhugs
T02D2510-1:124a-26: pa gang yin pa de ngas khyod la rdo rje
T02D2510-1:124a-27: ye shes te sa dang po la sogs pa'i rang
T02D2510-1:124a-28: bzhin can gyi mi phyed pa'i ye shes bskyed par
T02D2510-1:124a-29: bya zhing mngon sum du bya ba yin zhes bod
T02D2510-1:124a-30: pa'o // de nyid kyi khyad par ni ye shes
T02D2510-1:124a-31: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to
T02D2510-1:124a-32: pa'o // // khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma
T02D2510-1:124a-33: mthong ba rnams lam smra shig / dam tshig nyams
T02D2510-1:124a-34: par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni phyi dang
T02D2510-1:124a-35: gsang ba'i lta bas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:124a-36: chen po mthong ba gang yin pa de nyid la
T02D2510-1:124a-37: smra bar bya zhing bshad par bya'i rdo rje dbyings
T02D2510-1:124a-38: kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ni 'di lta bu yin
T02D2510-1:124a-39: no zhes 'dir ma zhugs shing dkyil 'khor ma mthong
T02D2510-1:124a-40: ba gzhan dag la yang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:124a-41: 'khor chen po ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes
T02D2510-1:124a-43: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor dang bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:124a-44: gnyis ka'i rgyud rnams las rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid gtso bo yin no //
T02D2510-1:124a-45: de skad du yang thams cad gsang ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2510-1:124b-0: rdo rje dbyings @124b ni dga' chen por //
T02D2510-1:124b-1: mkhas pa gang zhig dbang bskur zhing //
T02D2510-1:124b-2: rtag tu gsang ba'i nor ldan pa //
T02D2510-1:124b-3: de la mkhas pas bshad par bya //
T02D2510-1:124b-5: 'phags pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mngon par 'byung pa
T02D2510-1:124b-6: las kyang 'khor los skyur ba la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:124b-7: 'khor du dbang bskur ba gang yin pa de yang
T02D2510-1:124b-8: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya'i
T02D2510-1:124b-9: / 'dir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba
T02D2510-1:124b-10: dang ldan pa nyid kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:124b-14: chos la sogs par dbang bskur ba yang rang gi dkyil 'khor tsam gyi slob dpon nyid yin no //
T02D2510-1:124b-15: dkyil 'khor gzhan du dbang bskur ba de dag kyang
T02D2510-1:124b-16: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa yin no
T02D2510-1:124b-17: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:124b-18: de bas na rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-1:124b-19: por zhugs pa dang dbang bskur bas ni gsang sngags
T02D2510-1:124b-20: kyi tshul thams cad nye bar ston par rung ba
T02D2510-1:124b-21: yin gyi / gzhan dag tu ni rang gi tshul kho na ston pa tsam yin no //
T02D2510-1:124b-22: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:124b-23: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis
T02D2510-1:124b-24: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas
T02D2510-1:124b-25: par 'gyur ro zhes 'og nas bshad pa ni /
T02D2510-1:124b-26: khyod dam tshig las 'da' bar ma byed cig ces bsgo ba'o //
T02D2510-1:124b-27: kha nang du bltas pa dang phyir bstan pa zhes bya ba ni kha thur du bstan la /
T02D2510-1:124b-28: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng //
T02D2510-1:124b-29: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs //
T02D2510-1:124b-31: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02D2510-1:124b-32: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid de
T02D2510-1:124b-33: khyod kyi snying la yang dag par zhugs te zla
T02D2510-1:124b-34: ba'i rdo rje'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:124b-35: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2510-1:124b-36: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02D2510-1:124b-38: sems dpa'i rdo rje'i gzugs snying la zhugs pa'i rdo
T02D2510-1:124b-39: rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi snying dral nas gshegs
T02D2510-1:124b-41: deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis zhes bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:124b-42: deng zhes bya ba ni dus 'di nas bzung ste khyod ces bya ba khyod nyid kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:124b-43: nga yin zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid do //
T02D2510-1:125a-1: rdo rje zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba yang de 'dra'o //
T02D2510-1:125a-2: de bas na khyod kyis nga'i bsgo ba bya dgos so //
T02D2510-1:125a-3: khyod kyis ngal tshul khrims 'chal ba'o zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:125a-4: la sogs pas smod cing brnyas par ma byed cig
T02D2510-1:125a-5: pa'o // gang gi phyir brnyas par byed na mi
T02D2510-1:125a-6: bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas sems
T02D2510-1:125a-7: can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo
T02D2510-1:125a-8: pa'o // bar bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:125a-9: cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2510-1:125a-10: bdag la bab par gyur cig ces smros shig par
T02D2510-1:125a-11: bsgo'o zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyis smras pa
T02D2510-1:125a-12: pa'o // bar bya'o // dang / slob mas de
T02D2510-1:125a-13: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la
T02D2510-1:125a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur cig
T02D2510-1:125a-17: tha mal pa'i gzugs bsal la /
T02D2510-1:125a-18: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2510-1:125a-19: kyis byin gyis rlob par mdzod cig / de bzhin
T02D2510-1:125a-20: du rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la bab par gyur
T02D2510-1:125a-21: cig zhugs par gyur cig ces bya ba yin no
T02D2510-1:125a-22: // de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:125a-23: bya ba gzhan bkag pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:125a-24: sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:125a-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i gung mo gnyis myu gur bsgreng ba ni sems dpa' rdo rje ste bcing ba'o //
T02D2510-1:125a-26: 'di de rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02D2510-1:125a-28: gang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:125a-29: rtse lnga pa'i dam tshig gang yin pa de ni
T02D2510-1:125a-30: nga'i lag pas de'i tshul du byas pa 'di yin
T02D2510-1:125a-31: no // rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2510-1:125a-32: zhes bya ba ni gang 'di nga'i lag pas de'i
T02D2510-1:125a-33: tshul du byas pa 'di nyid rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2510-1:125a-35: rdo rje ye shes ni sar nges pa'o //
T02D2510-1:125a-36: 'di nyid mchog tu gyur pa yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:125a-37: bla med ba ni zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:125a-38: de ring nyid du zhes bya ba ni da lta kho na'o //
T02D2510-1:125a-39: 'bab par shog ces bya ba ni 'di nyid la 'bab cing zhugs bar gyur cig ces pa'o //
T02D2510-1:125a-40: khro bo'i khu tshur bcings la zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:125a-41: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo brkyang
T02D2510-1:125a-42: la steng du sdigs mdzub kyi tshul du gzhag pa
T02D2510-1:125a-43: ni 'dir khro bo'i khu tshur zhes bya ste /
T02D2510-1:125a-44: de bcings la lag pa g-yas pas khu tshur bcangs te /
T02D2510-1:125b-0: @125b mthe bo'i 'og tu mdzub mo gtang la /
T02D2510-1:125b-1: gung mo'i tshigs bar mar mnan te /
T02D2510-1:125b-2: gung mo brgyad la gyen du bsgreng nas gzhag pa 'di ni 'dir sems ma rdo rje ma'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-3: 'di la sdar bshad pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur de drangs shing dral bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-4: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:125b-5: badzra sa tva aa:aa:aa: zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis lan brgya brjod pa'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-6: gzhan dag ni yin ge brgya pa yin no zhes zer mod kyi /
T02D2510-1:125b-7: de ni mi rigs te gang gi phyir de ni
T02D2510-1:125b-8: brtan par byed pa'i snying po yin no zhes kha
T02D2510-1:125b-9: cig zer ro // de nas babs te zhes bya
T02D2510-1:125b-10: ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs
T02D2510-1:125b-11: cig zer ro // par mdzad pa'o // lha'i ye
T02D2510-1:125b-12: shes skye bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D2510-1:125b-13: rje sems dpa' de bzhugs pas babs pa de la
T02D2510-1:125b-14: mngon bar shes pa lnga la sogs pa'i ye shes
T02D2510-1:125b-15: khyad par can nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:125b-16: ye shes des zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2510-1:125b-17: lha'i ye shes nyid rnam par dbye ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:125b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di'i
T02D2510-1:125b-19: sems kyang brtan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:125b-20: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa ni bka' ste /
T02D2510-1:125b-21: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa 'di dag bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-22: 'di dag bsgoms na mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2510-1:125b-23: bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul de la de'i sems
T02D2510-1:125b-25: 'di'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni gzhan gyi gnod pas gzir pa dang /
T02D2510-1:125b-26: nad la sogs pa las byung ba'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-27: 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:125b-28: ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-29: gnod pa med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-30: byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dgongs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-31: dngos grub thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams so //
T02D2510-1:125b-32: rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:125b-33: yul gyi bde ba gang dag sngon cad ma myong ba de ni sngon ma byung ba ste /
T02D2510-1:125b-34: snga na med pas na sngon ma byung ba'o //
T02D2510-1:125b-35: de lta bur gyur pa'i rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2510-1:126a-0: rangs par byed pa'i bde ba thams cad 'di las @126a * //
T02D2510-1:126a-2: sngon nyams su myong ba'i yul ni dran pa'i rgyu yin pa las /
T02D2510-1:126a-3: de med pas na rgyu med pa'o //
T02D2510-1:126a-4: rgyu med pa yang yin la /
T02D2510-1:126a-7: rangs par byed pa'i bde ba yang yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:126a-8: rgyu med pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D2510-1:126a-10: ra rangs par byed pa ste /
T02D2510-1:126a-11: de lta bu'i bde ba 'di las skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2510-1:126a-12: de bde ba de dag ces bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-1:126a-13: pa la ting nge 'dzin ni rab tu dga' ba
T02D2510-1:126a-14: la sogs pa'i sa thob pa'i rang bzhin can no
T02D2510-1:126a-15: // gzungs ni tshig la sogs pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:126a-16: dran pa ni shes rab dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin no//
T02D2510-1:126a-17: de nas phyag rgya de bcings la rang gi snying
T02D2510-1:126a-18: gar dgrol du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni sems
T02D2510-1:126a-19: ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings par gyur pa
T02D2510-1:126a-20: dang / yang bcings la rdo rje sems dpas byin
T02D2510-1:126a-21: gyis rlob par mdzad pa'i phyir slob ma'i snying gar
T02D2510-1:126a-23: de nas me tog gi phreng ba dor zhing zhes
T02D2510-1:126a-24: bya ba ni phreng ba phul bas lha rnams kyis
T02D2510-1:126a-25: so sor yongs su bzung bar gyur na /
T02D2510-1:126a-26: de'i dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyi te /
T02D2510-1:126a-27: yongs su gzung ba de nyid gsungs pa ni /
T02D2510-1:126a-28: aom bra ti gri hna sva mi mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:126a-29: de ltar babs bzhin du zhas bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:126a-30: de ltar rnam pa gnyis kyis bab pa ste /
T02D2510-1:126a-32: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis babs par gyur nas
T02D2510-1:126a-33: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te rnam par snang
T02D2510-1:126a-34: mdzad kyi bar du dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du
T02D2510-1:126a-35: bstan par bya'o // dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba
T02D2510-1:126a-36: na 'dir slob dpon gyis dbang du bsdus pa lta
T02D2510-1:126a-38: dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phan yon bstan par bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:126a-39: dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:126a-40: 'od zer sna tshogs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:126a-42: ser po la sogs pa'i gzugs can no //
T02D2510-1:126a-43: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'od zer gyi tshogs te mthong bas zhes bya bar mtshams sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:126a-44: yang slob ma gzug pa'i cho ga 'di'i don bcom
T02D2510-1:126a-45: ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa de ltar
T02D2510-1:126a-47: ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'os pa'i
T02D2510-1:126a-48: slob ma bslab pa lnga yongs su gzung ba'am dge
T02D2510-1:126a-49: sbyong ngam / dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su
T02D2510-1:126a-50: gzung ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga ji lta
T02D2510-1:126b-1: slob dpon gyi zhabs la mngon par phyag byas nas /
T02D2510-1:126b-2: sems can ma lus pa rnams kyi phan pa dang /
T02D2510-1:126b-3: bde ba dam pa ma lus pa bsgrub bar bya ba'i rgyur /
T02D2510-1:126b-4: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang /
T02D2510-1:126b-5: rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag po dang /
T02D2510-1:126b-7: padma'i rigs kyi bdag po dang /
T02D2510-1:126b-9: nor bu'i rigs kyi bdag po dang /
T02D2510-1:126b-11: las kyi rigs kyi bdag po dang /
T02D2510-1:126b-12: las kyi rigs kyi ngo bo rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:126b-13: rnam par snang mdzad chen por gyur par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa mngon du byas la /
T02D2510-1:126b-14: slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas la /
T02D2510-1:126b-16: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2510-1:126b-17: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2510-1:126b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2510-1:126b-19: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2510-1:126b-20: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2510-1:126b-21: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2510-1:126b-22: de nas yol ba'i mthar slob ma la rdo rje
T02D2510-1:126b-23: srung ba yongs su bzlas pa'i ras shin tu dmar

T02D2510-1:135b-40: chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par stsol bar
T02D2510-1:135b-41: mdzad pa ni / srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2510-1:135b-42: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni byed pa yin //
T02D2510-1:136a-1: gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byas la /
T02D2510-1:136a-2: lha rnams yang dag par bsgrubs te dril bu dkrol lo //
T02D2510-1:136a-3: de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2510-1:136a-4: rab tu rtogs pa 'bebs pas sgrib pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:136a-5: rnam par dag par byed do //
T02D2510-1:136a-6: rdo rje thams cad 'bebs pa dang rab tu bsgrub pa dang /
T02D2510-1:136a-7: dbang du bya ba dang yang rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'grub ste /
T02D2510-1:136a-8: chos 'dis dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136a-9: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu che //
T02D2510-1:136a-10: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2510-1:136a-11: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2510-1:136a-12: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02D2510-1:136a-13: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2510-1:136a-14: ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du //
T02D2510-1:136a-15: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2510-1:136a-16: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2510-1:136a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med
T02D2510-1:136a-18: pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i dam
T02D2510-1:136a-19: tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam
T02D2510-1:136a-20: tshig go // de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar /
T02D2510-1:136a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2510-1:136a-22: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pa //
T02D2510-1:136a-23: phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
T02D2510-1:136a-24: yid kyis gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:136a-25: de la 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:136a-26: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2510-1:136a-27: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02D2510-1:136a-28: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2510-1:136a-29: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2510-1:136a-30: shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang //
T02D2510-1:136a-31: ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas na //
T02D2510-1:136a-32: chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02D2510-1:136a-34: zhes bya ba 'di'i dam tshig gis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:136a-35: pa'i rigs kyi sku'i gsang ba byin gyis brlab par
T02D2510-1:136a-36: bya'o // de la 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:136a-37: de'i rigs kyi rdo rje rin chen gzung ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D2510-1:136a-38: nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste //
T02D2510-1:136a-39: kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yin //
T02D2510-1:136a-40: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2510-1:136a-41: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D2510-1:136a-42: zhes bya ba de kho na nyid 'dis rdo rje rin chen gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136a-43: bsam pa thams cad grub rnams kyi //
T02D2510-1:136b-0: @136b bsam pa grub pa dam pa yin //
T02D2510-1:136b-1: de yang 'dod pa rab grub phyir //
T02D2510-1:136b-2: 'dod dang thar pa bde ba che //
T02D2510-1:136b-3: zhes bya ba'i chos kyis rin po che'i dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136b-4: mi phan pa yang sbyin bya zhing //
T02D2510-1:136b-5: 'dod dang bde ba thams cad kyis //
T02D2510-1:136b-6: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi //
T02D2510-1:136b-7: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par bya //
T02D2510-1:136b-8: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi mchog ste /
T02D2510-1:136b-9: 'dis rin po che'i rigs kyi sku'i gsang ba byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136b-10: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136b-11: de la 'di ni padma rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:136b-12: de'i rigs kyi rdo rje padma gzung ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D2510-1:136b-13: de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2510-1:136b-14: sangs rgyas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /'dul ba yi ni thabs mdzad pa //
T02D2510-1:136b-15: dga' ba'i rol mos gar mdzad do //
T02D2510-1:136b-16: zhes bya ba'i de kho na nyid 'dis rdo rje padma gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136b-18: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
T02D2510-1:136b-19: de bzhin srid gsum dag pa ni //
T02D2510-1:136b-20: gnas kyi nyes pas mi gos so //
T02D2510-1:136b-21: zhes bya ba'i chos 'dis padma'i dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136b-22: bya ba gang dang gang gis ni //
T02D2510-1:136b-24: padma rigs mchog sbyor ba'i bdag / de dang des ni sbyang bar bya //
T02D2510-1:136b-25: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ste /
T02D2510-1:136b-26: 'dis padma'i rigs kyi sku'i gsang ba byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136b-27: de nas brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:136b-28: aom padma ha sta badzra dharmma tamba la ya /
T02D2510-1:136b-30: rdo rje'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:136b-31: de nas 'di la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:136b-33: rigs kyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin //
T02D2510-1:136b-34: thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni //
T02D2510-1:136b-35: de bzhin sdig pa chags mi 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:136b-36: de la 'dir chos nyid ni de yin no //
T02D2510-1:136b-37: rdo rje las kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2510-1:136b-40: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bshad pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:136b-41: de nas slob ma la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas
T02D2510-1:136b-42: bstod la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par
T02D2510-1:136b-43: mchod par bya'o // de nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal dang /
T02D2510-1:137a-1: bstod pa'i phyag rgyas slob ma thams cad lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-2: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
T02D2510-1:137a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2510-1:137a-4: srid pa kun du grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2510-1:137a-5: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02D2510-1:137a-6: kye rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo /
T02D2510-1:137a-7: siddha sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:/
T02D2510-1:137a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bcings te /
T02D2510-1:137a-9: g-yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02D2510-1:137a-10: g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-11: 'di ni gzengs bstod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-12: dbugs dbyung ba'i cho ga ni dpal mchog dang po la sogs pa'i cho ga las shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-13: dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas
T02D2510-1:137a-14: pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:137a-15: 'khor du 'jug pas nye bar mtshon pa'i cho ga
T02D2510-1:137a-16: rgyas pa yin pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug
T02D2510-1:137a-17: pa'i cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-18: rim pa 'di nyid dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug
T02D2510-1:137a-19: pa la sogs pa'i cho gas sbyang ba byas nas
T02D2510-1:137a-20: / don gyi dngos grub la sogs pa bsgrub pa la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:137a-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:137a-22: de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:137a-23: sbyang ba byas pa'i rjes thogs la dngos grub bsgrub
T02D2510-1:137a-24: cing bskyed pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o
T02D2510-1:137a-25: // de la don ni gser la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-26: de bskyed pa'i dngos grub ni thob pa ste de nyid grub pa'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-27: de'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje gter gyi tshul la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-28: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-29: de bslab par bya ste zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-30: 'di skad ston te man ngag gis de'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:137a-31: shes par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bsgom pa bslab pa
T02D2510-1:137a-32: de de la bstan par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:137a-33: de lta bu ni thams cad du yang phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi sgra'i don yin no //
T02D2510-1:137a-34: rdo rje'i dbyibs ni gter gnas pa //
T02D2510-1:137a-35: snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya //
T02D2510-1:137a-36: zhes bya ba ni dang por re zhig rang gi lha'i sbyor ba bya'o //
T02D2510-1:137a-37: de nas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i steng du
T02D2510-1:137a-38: yi ge aom gser gyi mdog can las gser gyi
T02D2510-1:137a-39: bum pa rin po ches yongs su gang ba de'i
T02D2510-1:137a-40: steng du yi ge h'um las rdo rje gser gyi
T02D2510-1:137a-41: mdog can bsams la zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2510-1:137b-1: lo gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:137b-2: de nas gsal ba nyid du gyur pa dang /
T02D2510-1:137b-3: mtshan thog thag bsgoms pa'i rjes la gang du gter
T02D2510-1:137b-4: yod par re ba'i skas la sogs pa mthong ba
T02D2510-1:137b-5: dang / der song la 'byor pa ci yod pas mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:137b-6: phyi rol du gtor ma byin la rdo rje lcags sgrog gis gter bcing ba dang /
T02D2510-1:137b-7: gnas dang zhing skyong bcing ba dang /
T02D2510-1:137b-8: bden pa'i byin rlabs kyang byas la bzlas ba dang bsgom pa byas na /
T02D2510-1:137b-9: bsgoms sa na gnas pa'i gter ni de'i sa mthong bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D2510-1:137b-10: rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang //
T02D2510-1:137b-11: nam mkha'i ngos la bsgom par bya //
T02D2510-1:137b-12: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:137b-13: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2510-1:137b-14: la dpral bar yi ge kham las me tog dmar
T02D2510-1:137b-16: de'i steng du yi ge tram las rdo rje dang
T02D2510-1:137b-17: 'dra bar bskyed la sngags zlos shing yid kyis 'phral
T02D2510-1:137b-19: nam mkhar yongs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:137b-20: de nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad
T02D2510-1:137b-21: byas la yod par re ba'i gnas su de bzhin
T02D2510-1:137b-22: du rdo rje'i gzugs bris la nam mkhar yongs su
T02D2510-1:137b-24: gang du lhung bar mthong ba der //
T02D2510-1:137b-25: gter yod par ni rnam par bshad //
T02D2510-1:137b-26: blo ldan mi yi rdo rje'i dbyibs //
T02D2510-1:137b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:137b-28: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:137b-29: rang gi lce la yi ge pa gur gum gyi
T02D2510-1:137b-30: mdog can de'i steng du hr'i: mdog ser po las
T02D2510-1:137b-32: de nas snga ma bzhin du bsgom pa dang bsgrub
T02D2510-1:137b-33: pa byas la gang du yod par re ba der
T02D2510-1:137b-34: song ste / de bzhin du bden pa'i tshig byas nas /
T02D2510-1:137b-35: blo ldan mi yi rdo rje'i dbyibs //
T02D2510-1:137b-36: lce yi steng du bsgoms na ni //
T02D2510-1:137b-37: 'di na yod ces bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2510-1:137b-38: bden pa nyid du smra bar 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:137b-39: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lces rtog ba med pa'i tshul gyis smra bar byed do //
T02D2510-1:137b-40: bdag gi lus ni thams cad la //
T02D2510-1:137b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du
T02D2510-1:137b-42: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2510-1:137b-43: nas / yi ge aa mdog ser po las sna
T02D2510-1:137b-44: tshogs rdo rjer bdag nyid bsams la bsgom pa de
T02D2510-1:137b-45: byas nas bsgrub par bya ba'i gter gyi gnas su
T02D2510-1:137b-46: bden pa'i byin rlabs byas te /
T02D2510-1:138a-0: @138a * // de yang de bzhin du bsgoms la gang gi tshe /
T02D2510-1:138a-1: babs par gyur nas gang gnas pa //
T02D2510-1:138a-2: gter ni de na yod par bshad //
T02D2510-1:138a-4: de nas dang por brkos la de'i rjes la blangs
T02D2510-1:138a-5: na su yang bgegs byed par mi 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2510-1:138a-7: de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul te /
T02D2510-1:138a-8: sems kyi 'byor pa nyid gang yin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:138a-9: de'i dngos grub ste de nyid grub pa'o //
T02D2510-1:138a-10: de'i phyag rgya ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rdo rje dbab pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:138a-11: de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste /
T02D2510-1:138a-12: de bslab par bya zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:138a-13: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas rdo rje phra
T02D2510-1:138a-14: mo bsgom pa zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bya'o
T02D2510-1:138a-15: // de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba
T02D2510-1:138a-16: zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgoms nas brtan par
T02D2510-1:138a-17: // gyur pa dang / mtshan thog thag rdo rje phra mo spro ba'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:138a-18: de nas rdo rje phra mo'i spro ba'i sbyor bas /
T02D2510-1:138a-19: chu rdo rje phra mo'i rang bzhin du ji srid
T02D2510-1:138a-20: mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi
T02D2510-1:138a-22: de nas rdo rje'i tshig gis badzra dzva la zhes zlos shing chu'i steng du bcag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:138a-23: de ltar dbab par byas nas kyang //
T02D2510-1:138a-25: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2510-1:138a-26: rdo rje phra mo bsgom par byas na des de 'grub bo //
T02D2510-1:138a-27: gang gi gzugs su bdag gi lus //
T02D2510-1:138a-29: 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha gang dang gang gi gzugs su bdag nyid ston par 'dod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:138a-30: de dang de nyid du rang gi lus su bsgom zhing badzra r'u pa zhes bzlas nas /
T02D2510-1:138a-31: sangs rgyas kyi skur yang bdag nyid kyis rang mthong zhing /
T02D2510-1:138a-32: gzhan rnams la yang ston nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:138a-33: de ltar bdag la phan nas kyang //
T02D2510-1:138a-35: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas de bzhin du
T02D2510-1:138a-36: rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa rdzogs par byas la
T02D2510-1:138a-37: / bdag ni nam mkha'o zhes rang gi bdag nyid bsgoms te ;
T02D2510-1:138a-38: badzra a'a k'a sha zhes zlos shing bsgoms na ji
T02D2510-1:138a-39: srid 'dod pa de srid kyi bar du mi snang
T02D2510-1:138a-40: bar 'gyur ro // rdo rje dbab par bdag gyur nas //
T02D2510-1:138a-41: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin rdo rje phra
T02D2510-1:138a-42: mo bsgom pa byas la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2510-1:138a-43: go // rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na //
T02D2510-1:138b-0: zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid rdo rje @138b rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su bsam pa'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-3: zhes bya ba ni rang gi gnas nas brtsams te
T02D2510-1:138b-4: ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du rdo rje'i skas
T02D2510-1:138b-5: kyi phreng bas khyab par bsams la /
T02D2510-1:138b-6: badzra ma ham zhes zlos shing ched du bsams pa'i
T02D2510-1:138b-7: skas kyi phreng ba nas ji tsam mngon par 'dod
T02D2510-1:138b-10: rdo rje'i skas ni nam mkha' la //
T02D2510-1:138b-11: bsgoms te mngon par 'dzegs na ni //
T02D2510-1:138b-12: ji srid du yang 'dzeg pa'i gnas //
T02D2510-1:138b-13: de srid nam mkhar 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2510-1:138b-15: rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:138b-16: rdo rjes nye bar mtshan pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-17: de'i dngos grub ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub ste de nyid grub pa'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-19: zla ba'i dbyi bas cig bris nas ni //
T02D2510-1:138b-20: steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te //
T02D2510-1:138b-21: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-22: de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste de bslab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-23: zla ba'i dbyibs cig bris nas ni //
T02D2510-1:138b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:138b-25: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02D2510-1:138b-26: badzra dha ra zhes brjod de /
T02D2510-1:138b-27: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i sku zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsams la /
T02D2510-1:138b-28: de nyid zlos shing zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam /
T02D2510-1:138b-29: lo gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-30: de nas mtshan ma thob pa dang /
T02D2510-1:138b-32: rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:138b-33: rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na //
T02D2510-1:138b-34: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas nas /
T02D2510-1:138b-35: ratna dha ra zhes zlos shing /
T02D2510-1:138b-36: bdag nyid nam mkha'i snying po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02D2510-1:138b-37: rdo rje rin chen 'dzin pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-38: bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod //
T02D2510-1:138b-39: ces bya ba ni bsgom pa 'dis gang gi tshe
T02D2510-1:138b-40: nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs su bdag nyid nyin re
T02D2510-1:138b-41: zhing mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D2510-1:138b-42: dag pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:138b-43: de nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bsam pas mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:138b-44: de nas de'i mod la nam mkha'i spyod yul ji
T02D2510-1:138b-45: srid 'gro bar 'dod pa de srid kyi bar du
