T02D2510-1:176b-11: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la rdo rje ni mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2510-1:176b-12: dkyil 'khor dam pa ni mchog ste /
T02D2510-1:176b-13: de rab tu bshad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:176b-15: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
T02D2510-1:176b-17: sprul pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'dir rdo rje dbyings te de dang 'dra'o //
T02D2510-1:176b-18: ming ji skad bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:176b-19: rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:176b-20: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02D2510-1:176b-22: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2510-1:176b-23: dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya //
T02D2510-1:176b-24: zhes bya ba ni phyi dang nang du bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:176b-25: dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni //
T02D2510-1:176b-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D2510-1:176b-27: ma rdo rje thugs kyi rang gi dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2510-1:176b-29: dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni //
T02D2510-1:176b-31: sangs rgyas phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:176b-32: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D2510-1:176b-33: de rnams kyi mtshan ma bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:176b-34: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:176b-35: mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa //
T02D2510-1:176b-36: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02D2510-1:176b-38: de la khri ni rig pa'i rten te /
T02D2510-1:176b-39: de'i steng du ji ltar grags pa'i mchod rten bri
T02D2510-1:176b-40: ba 'di ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo zhes
T02D2510-1:176b-41: bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2510-1:176b-44: kha khyer gsum pa'i rig pa'i gnas kyi khri bris la /
T02D2510-1:176b-46: de'i yang steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2510-1:176b-47: de'i steng du mchod rten dbu nub tu bltas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:176b-48: rdo rje sems ma nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:177a-1: mtshan ma yang re re zhing rig pa'i khri'i steng du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:177a-2: rdo rje brtsegs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa chur gnas pa bris la /
T02D2510-1:177a-3: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis pa
T02D2510-1:177a-4: mgo shar du bltas par rdo rje la rdo rje
T02D2510-1:177a-5: bri ba ni rdo rje brtsegs zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:177a-6: rdo rje thugs zhes bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:177a-7: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can mi bskyod pa'i thugs ni rdo rje'i thugs so //
T02D2510-1:177a-8: de ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya la rdo rje thugs zhes btags pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:177a-9: 'di ni mi bskyod pa'i gnas su bya'o //
T02D2510-1:177a-10: rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng //
T02D2510-1:177a-12: rdo rje rtse lnga pas rtse mo mtshan pa'i yid
T02D2510-1:177a-13: bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che mgo lho phyogs
T02D2510-1:177a-14: su bltas pa / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas
T02D2510-1:177a-15: su rang gi dbang bskur ba'i ming gi phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:177a-16: su bltas pa / bri bar bya'o // rdo rje padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:177a-17: padma dmar skya 'dab ma bcu drug pa la /
T02D2510-1:177a-18: 'di'i dbus na padma 'dab ma brgyad pa kha legs par bye ba /
T02D2510-1:177a-19: steng gi brgyad kha ma bye ba /
T02D2510-1:177a-20: de'i lte ba na rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnas
T02D2510-1:177a-21: pa 'di ni rdo rje padmo zhes bya ba ste
T02D2510-1:177a-22: / 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su mgo nub
T02D2510-1:177a-23: tu bltas bar bri ba 'di ni mtshon cha zhes
T02D2510-1:177a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ral gri'i
T02D2510-1:177a-26: gzugs kyi mtshon chas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam
T02D2510-1:177a-27: par rtog pa 'joms pas na mtshon cha zhes bya
T02D2510-1:177a-28: bar bshad ces bya ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:177a-29: las kyi rdo rje ni rtse mo bcu gnyis pa'i
T02D2510-1:177a-30: ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje las ma'i gzugs mgo
T02D2510-1:177a-31: byang du bltas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje 'di ni
T02D2510-1:177a-32: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su bya bas na
T02D2510-1:177a-33: rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad ces bya'o //
T02D2510-1:177a-34: rdo rje bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni rdo
T02D2510-1:177a-35: rje sems dpa'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2510-1:177a-36: 'greng ba bri'o // rdo rje rgyal po'i gnas su lcags kyu gnyis so //
T02D2510-1:177a-37: rdo rje chags pa'i gnas su rdo rje gnyis 'khyud pa chung du bri'o//
T02D2510-1:177a-38: rdo rje legs pa'i gnas su mkhrig ma'i bar du
T02D2510-1:177a-39: yod pa rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis
T02D2510-1:177a-40: kyis legs so zhes sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2510-1:177a-41: rdo rje rin chen gyi gnas su yid bzhin gyi
T02D2510-1:177a-42: nor bu rin po che ji skad du bshad pa'i
T02D2510-1:177a-44: rdo rje nyi ma'i gnas su ni nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:177b-0: @177b 'khor lte ba na rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2510-1:177b-1: yod pa 'di ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2510-1:177b-2: // dpal gyi gnas su ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-3: bzhad pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje gnyis kyi bar
T02D2510-1:177b-4: du so'i phreng ba gnyis bris pa ni bzhad pa'i
T02D2510-1:177b-5: phyag rgya'o // rdo rje chos kyi gnas su ni
T02D2510-1:177b-6: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo rje padma'i
T02D2510-1:177b-7: dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa yod pa bri'o
T02D2510-1:177b-8: phyag rgya'o // // rdo rje rnon po'i gnas su ni rdo rje ral gri'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-9: rdo rje rgyu'i gnas su ni 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
T02D2510-1:177b-10: pa rtsibs rnams rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur
T02D2510-1:177b-11: bya'o // rdo rje smra ba'i gnas su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'i lce'o ;
T02D2510-1:177b-12: / rdo rje las kyi gnas su ni ji skad
T02D2510-1:177b-13: du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sna tshogs rdo
T02D2510-1:177b-14: rje kun du rtse mo zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-15: rdo rje srung ba'i gnas su ni go cha'i phyag
T02D2510-1:177b-16: rgya mtha' gnyis su rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis
T02D2510-1:177b-17: dang ldan pa'o // rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gnas
T02D2510-1:177b-18: su ni mche ba gnyis rtsa ba'i cha na rdo
T02D2510-1:177b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gyi gnas su ni dam tshig
T02D2510-1:177b-21: gi khu tshur gyis yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:177b-22: rtse lnga pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-23: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa ni rdo rje
T02D2510-1:177b-24: dbyings su gsungs pa nyid bri ba'i cho ga yin
T02D2510-1:177b-25: no // sgeg mo'i gnas su ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis so //
T02D2510-1:177b-26: phreng ba ma'i gnas su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-27: glu ma'i gnas su ni rdo rje pi wang ngo //
T02D2510-1:177b-28: gar ma'i gnas su ni mkhrig ma'i bar dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis /
T02D2510-1:177b-29: rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang bcas pas gar byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-30: bdug pa ma'i gnas su ni spos snod do //
T02D2510-1:177b-31: me tog ma'i gnas su ni me tog gi snod rdo rje me tog gis gang ba'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-32: mar me'i gnas su ni rdo rje mar me'i sdong bu'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-33: byug pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje dri'i dung chos so //
T02D2510-1:177b-34: rdo rje lcags kyu'i gnas su ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-35: zhags pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje zhags pa'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-36: lcags sgrog gi gnas su ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02D2510-1:177b-37: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i gnas su ni rdo rje dril bu bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-38: phyag rgya thams cad kyang rdo rje 'bar bas bskor ba'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-39: mi bskyod pa'i rigs las byung ba rnams ni mgo shar du bltas pa'o //
T02D2510-1:177b-40: gzhan dag ni mgo lho dang /
T02D2510-1:178a-2: mtshams su gnas pa rnams ni mgo mtshams su bltas pa bya'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-3: phyi rol du yang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:178a-4: 'khor gyi khyams la ji ltar rigs pa'i tshul dang
T02D2510-1:178a-5: mi 'gal bar byams pa la sogs pa rang gi
T02D2510-1:178a-6: mtshan ma yang dag par bri bar bya ste /
T02D2510-1:178a-7: de nyid bshad pa ni byams pa la sogs pa rang gi mtshan /
T02D2510-1:178a-8: ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri //
T02D2510-1:178a-9: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:178a-10: ji ltar dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-1:178a-11: shar phyogs kyi khams kyi nang du rdo rje rtse
T02D2510-1:178a-12: lnga pa nyis brgya lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshang
T02D2510-1:178a-13: ba bri'o // de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni rdo rje rin po che'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-14: nub tu ni rdo rje padma'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-15: byang du ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-19: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms
T02D2510-1:178a-20: pa'i blo gros kyi mtshan ma shar phyogs kyi khyams
T02D2510-1:178a-21: kyi nang du snga ma bzhin du rdo rje bzhi
T02D2510-1:178a-22: bri'o // spos kyi glang po dang /
T02D2510-1:178a-25: ye shes tog ni lho phyogs su rin po che bzhi'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-29: dra ba can gyi 'od ni nub tu rdo rje padma bzhi'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-31: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
T02D2510-1:178a-33: kun du bzang po ni byang phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-34: aom sarbba sam ska ra pa ri shuddha dharma te
T02D2510-1:178a-35: ma h'a n'a ya pa ri w'a re sv'a h'a
T02D2510-1:178a-36: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag
T02D2510-1:178a-37: thams cad kyi sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa ste
T02D2510-1:178a-38: / 'di dag gis ni byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:178a-39: gnas de nyid du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2510-1:178a-40: ga rgyas pa yin te zhes bya ba ni 'jug
T02D2510-1:178a-41: pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gang yin
T02D2510-1:178a-42: pa de ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga
T02D2510-1:178a-43: rgyas pa ste / sogs pa'i sgras ni rdo rje chu btung ba dang /
T02D2510-1:178a-49: dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02D2510-1:178a-52: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D2510-1:178b-0: rang @178b gi ming nas brjod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:178b-1: rdo rjes dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang /
T02D2510-1:178b-3: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:178b-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i
T02D2510-1:178b-5: cho ga thams cad bya bar ston to //
T02D2510-1:178b-6: de nyid ni de la thog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'grel te /
T02D2510-1:178b-7: de la re zhig thog ma rdo rje slob dpon
T02D2510-1:178b-8: gyis 'og nas bshad pa'i sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i
T02D2510-1:178b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sa ma ya stvam h'um
T02D2510-1:178b-10: badzra bandha zhes bya bas rang gis bcing bar bya'o
T02D2510-1:178b-11: // de nas sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:178b-12: zhugs nas lan cig bskor te zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2510-1:178b-13: phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:178b-14: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rdo rje snyems pa'i gzugs 'dzin par bsams la /
T02D2510-1:178b-15: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas /
T02D2510-1:178b-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsam par bya ste ;
T02D2510-1:178b-17: de lta bus ni de phul ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:178b-18: rang gi snying gar tshul bzhin du bkrol te zhes
T02D2510-1:178b-19: bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-1:178b-20: por gsungs pa'i cho gas bdag nyid la dbab pa
T02D2510-1:178b-22: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab ba
T02D2510-1:178b-23: nye bar bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2510-1:178b-24: go // de nas me tog dor ba la sogs
T02D2510-1:178b-25: pa'i cho ga rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-1:178b-26: po las ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul du spyad par
T02D2510-1:178b-27: go // bya'o // 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2510-1:178b-28: ga 'di dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2510-1:178b-29: rje sems dpa' slob dpon du gyur pas mdzad par
T02D2510-1:178b-30: bsam zhing rang nyid kyi rjes su spyad par bya'o
T02D2510-1:178b-31: go // bya'o // // 'dir gsang ba'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:178b-32: ni dang po'i rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyis
T02D2510-1:178b-33: rdo rje dang bdag po'i dbang bskur ba bya bar
T02D2510-1:178b-35: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs
T02D2510-1:178b-36: pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02D2510-1:178b-37: bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang
T02D2510-1:178b-38: ldan pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la
T02D2510-1:178b-39: sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi tshul
T02D2510-1:178b-40: 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi lha mo thams cad bsdu bar
T02D2510-1:178b-41: bya'o // de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:179a-0: sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas zhes bya ba la gzungs @179a * //
T02D2510-1:179a-1: kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-2: badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes zlos shing mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-3: de'i rigs kyi tshul rdo rje thugs la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams bkug la /
T02D2510-1:179a-5: shar phyogs kyi sgo dang nye bar rig pa'i lha mo'i gzugs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:179a-6: de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-8: don yod par grub pa dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-9: de'i rigs kyi tshul gyis gzugs rnams rang rang gi sgo dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-11: de nas badzra p'a sha h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02D2510-1:179a-12: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag
T02D2510-1:179a-13: rgyas rang rang gi sgo nas mchod rten la sogs
T02D2510-1:179a-14: par bcug nas / badzra spho ta bam zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-15: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las kyi phyag rgyas de dag thams cad bcings la /
T02D2510-1:179a-16: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-17: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas thams cad dbang du bya'o //
T02D2510-1:179a-18: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du thams cad bsgrubs la /
T02D2510-1:179a-20: las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02D2510-1:179a-21: dbang bskur la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2510-1:179a-22: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:179a-23: phyir phyung la rdo rje slob ma sngar bshad pa'i cho ga nyid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:179a-25: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzud pa'i
T02D2510-1:179a-26: tshul du gzud do zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin
T02D2510-1:179a-27: no // dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan
T02D2510-1:179a-28: ma chad pas g-yogs la byin te zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:179a-29: ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnams 'grub
T02D2510-1:179a-30: no // pa'i phyir dang / gsang ba'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:179a-31: sor bzhi pa ji nas kyang sus kyang mi mthong
T02D2510-1:179a-32: bar byos shig ces bsgo la /
T02D2510-1:179a-33: slob dpon gyis slob ma la sbyin par bya ba yin pas na de'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:179a-34: chad pas g-yogs la zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:179a-35: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2510-1:179a-36: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:179a-38: dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2510-1:179b-0: mngon par @179b 'dod pa'i don gyi dngos grub kyi man ngag bstan par bya ba yin pas /
T02D2510-1:179b-1: rdo rje gsang ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:179b-2: rdo rje gsang ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:179b-3: de'i phyag rgya ni der 'dod pa'i don sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-4: de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste de bslab bo zhes bya ba ni de bstan par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-5: phyag rgya de rnams kyang rnam pa mang po yod pas de'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:179b-6: dang por re zhig ces bya ba gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-7: rdo rje gsang ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:179b-8: de'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-10: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2510-1:179b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:179b-12: rkang pa dang lag pas thal mo sbyar ba gang yin pa de ni /
T02D2510-1:179b-13: rkang lag thal mo sbyar zhing zhes bya ba ste rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-14: de la lag pa'i thal mo rdo rje thal mo ste khong stong ngo //
T02D2510-1:179b-15: rkang pa'i thal mo ni sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo //
T02D2510-1:179b-17: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas la //
T02D2510-1:179b-18: steng du thal mo sbyin byed pa //
T02D2510-1:179b-20: 'dis ni lus kyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid yang dag par gnas pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:179b-22: kha glal bar byed pa dang /
T02D2510-1:179b-23: ldan zhing rdo rje bsgom par byas nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-24: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsgoms nas bsgom pa
T02D2510-1:179b-25: 'dis rdo rje ma yang zhes pa rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:179b-26: dpa'i btsun mo yang chags par byed cing dbang du
T02D2510-1:179b-27: byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-29: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:179b-30: de'i 'og tu gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i
T02D2510-1:179b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas
T02D2510-1:179b-32: / aom badzra satva guhya sa ma ye h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:179b-33: de nas badzra r'a ga ya ho zhes zlos shing /
T02D2510-1:179b-34: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D2510-1:179b-35: 'di thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar bsgoms la
T02D2510-1:179b-36: de'i tshad tsam gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng
T02D2510-1:179b-37: du bdag nyid dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog
T02D2510-1:179b-38: dmar ba / 'od zer dmar po shin tu 'khrug pa /
T02D2510-1:180a-0: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa @180a * //
T02D2510-1:180a-2: mdun du yang badzra satva guhya sa ma ye h'um
T02D2510-1:180a-3: zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid la
T02D2510-1:180a-4: kun du bzang mo sprul la /
T02D2510-1:180a-5: bsdu bas spyan drangs nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas /
T02D2510-1:180a-6: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgyar nams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D2510-1:180a-9: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bsgrubs la /
T02D2510-1:180a-10: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis
T02D2510-1:180a-11: rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis
T02D2510-1:180a-12: dbang bskur nas / sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod
T02D2510-1:180a-13: pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas
T02D2510-1:180a-14: dbang bskur nas / la / badzra r'a ga ya
T02D2510-1:180a-15: ho zhes yang zlos shing bdag ni rdo rje can
T02D2510-1:180a-16: gyi lha mo kun du bzang mo'o zhes nga rgyal
T02D2510-1:180a-17: dbang bskur nas / la / bskyed de / 'di
T02D2510-1:180a-18: dag dang 'og nas bshad pa'i sbyor ba la yang
T02D2510-1:180a-19: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:180a-20: de bas na der mdun du brtan par byas la /
T02D2510-1:180a-21: de'i rjes la yang badzra r'a ga ya ho zhes
T02D2510-1:180a-22: bya bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar bsams la
T02D2510-1:180a-23: / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te /
T02D2510-1:180a-24: rdo rje thal mo bcings nas /
T02D2510-1:180a-25: badzra r'a ga ya ho aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2510-1:180a-26: badzra r'a ga ya ho zhes bya ba rdo rje'i
T02D2510-1:180a-27: tshig gis zlos shing bcom ldan 'das yum mdun du
T02D2510-1:180a-28: bsgom pa ni / thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2510-1:180a-31: ji srid de mngon sum du mthong ba'i bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:180a-32: de nas zla ba nya la cho ga thams cad
T02D2510-1:180a-33: rjes su spyad de nyi ma nub pa'i dus su
T02D2510-1:180a-34: de bzhin du rdo rje thal mos bdag nyid byin
T02D2510-1:180a-35: gyis brlabs la dal gyis 'gro bas de chags par
T02D2510-1:180a-36: byas la / kha glal ba dang bcas pas chags shing chags pas 'dzum pas 'khyud cing bzlas nas /
T02D2510-1:180a-37: de 'di'i dbang du 'gyur zhing 'khyud par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:180a-38: de'i lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:180a-39: de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:180a-40: dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang //
T02D2510-1:180a-41: mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D2510-1:180a-43: dpung pa g-yon pa bskum pa'i lag pas lcags kyu
T02D2510-1:180a-44: dang mgo la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par
T02D2510-1:180a-45: bya'o // lag pa yis ni 'bod byed cing //
T02D2510-1:180b-0: zhes bya ba ni @180b lag pa g-yas pas se gol gyi sgra byed cing ngo //
T02D2510-1:180b-1: lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs par byed //
T02D2510-1:180b-2: ces bya ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i btsun mo 'ang bsgoms pa'i 'dis 'gugs par byed do //
T02D2510-1:180b-3: 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:180b-4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs
T02D2510-1:180b-5: pa'i cho gas rdo rje rgyal po'i sbyor ba ji
T02D2510-1:180b-6: lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02D2510-1:180b-7: de'i 'og tu gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i
T02D2510-1:180b-8: rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po ji lta
T02D2510-1:180b-10: badzra aam gu sha dza: zhes bya ba zlos shing
T02D2510-1:180b-11: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
T02D2510-1:180b-12: nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:180b-13: de nas de'i tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:180b-14: de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal por bsams
T02D2510-1:180b-15: la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi mdun du
T02D2510-1:180b-16: / aom badzra guhya badzra aam gu h'um zhes bya
T02D2510-1:180b-17: bas rdo rjer gyal po btsun mo rdo rje lcags
T02D2510-1:180b-19: de bzhin du bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-1:180b-20: badzra aam gu sha dza: zhes bya ba ji lta
T02D2510-1:180b-21: ba bzhin du zlos shing des snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-1:180b-22: bsgom par bya'o // de nas zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2510-1:180b-23: zla ba drug gi mthar mngon du byas nas de
T02D2510-1:180b-24: bzhin du mtshan thog thag dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags
T02D2510-1:180b-25: kyu dang / mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya //
T02D2510-1:180b-26: lag pa yis ni 'bod byed cing //
T02D2510-1:180b-27: lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs byed par //
T02D2510-1:180b-28: zhes bya ba bdag nyid dmar ba /
T02D2510-1:180b-30: dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu 'od dmar po 'bar ba /
T02D2510-1:180b-31: kun du 'khrug pas snying ga'i padma nas bzung la dgug par bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:180b-32: / mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis ni /
T02D2510-1:180b-33: glal zhing snying gar 'phangs nas ni //
T02D2510-1:180b-34: nyid kyi rdo rje dga' ma yang //
T02D2510-1:180b-35: bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed //
T02D2510-1:180b-36: ces bya ba ni mda' 'phen pa'i tshul ni rdo rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:180b-37: des mda' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis kha glal ba dang
T02D2510-1:180b-38: ldan par byed cing bsgrub par bya ba'i lha mo'i
T02D2510-1:180b-39: snying gar te / snying la mda' bsnun par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:180b-40: de bzhin du de'i rgyab kyis phyogs par sems dpa'
T02D2510-1:180b-41: bsad pas bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed cing
T02D2510-1:180b-42: mngon du phyogs par dbang du bya'o //
T02D2510-1:181a-0: ji srid gang dang gang rdo rje chags pa'i sbyor @181a * //
T02D2510-1:181a-2: rdo rje dga' ma rang nyid kyang //
T02D2510-1:181a-3: zhes bya ba rdo rje chags pa'i btsun mo rang nyid kyang rnal 'byor pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2510-1:181a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs
T02D2510-1:181a-6: pa'i tshogs rdo rje chags pa'i rnal 'byor byas la
T02D2510-1:181a-7: / de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs
T02D2510-1:181a-8: pa'i rdo rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2510-1:181a-9: / te / aom badzra guhya r'a ga r'a ga ya h'um zhes byas la /
T02D2510-1:181a-10: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya phat ches zlos shing /
T02D2510-1:181a-11: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsam mo ;
T02D2510-1:181a-12: / de nas de'i tshe nam mkha'i tshad tsam gyi
T02D2510-1:181a-13: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de'i steng du rdo rje
T02D2510-1:181a-14: chags pa sku mdog dmar po rgyan thams cad kyis
T02D2510-1:181a-15: brgyan par bdag nyid bsams nas /
T02D2510-1:181a-16: aom badzra guhya r'a ga ya h'um zhes bya bas
T02D2510-1:181a-17: rdo rje chags pa'i btsun mo rdo rje dga' ma
T02D2510-1:181a-18: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid kyi mdun du sprul
T02D2510-1:181a-19: la / bsdu ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-1:181a-20: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya phat ces zlos shing
T02D2510-1:181a-21: snga ma bzhin du de dang de bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-1:181a-22: // de nas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug
T02D2510-1:181a-23: gam lo gcig gis de mngon du byas nas rdo
T02D2510-1:181a-24: rje chags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-1:181a-25: mtshan thog thag de'i las kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas
T02D2510-1:181a-26: mda' dmar po snying gar 'phen zhing kha gal ba
T02D2510-1:181a-27: dang ldan par byas la mda' des bsnun nas phug
T02D2510-1:181a-28: la bsgrub par bya ba dmar zhing sgrub pa po
T02D2510-1:181a-29: la gcig tu chags par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:181a-30: bdag gi lus kyi snying ga ru //
T02D2510-1:181a-31: rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-1:181a-32: dbung pa bsnol ba bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-1:181a-33: sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed //
T02D2510-1:181a-34: ces bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2510-1:181a-35: de dpung ba bsnol ba'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gar bdag nyid 'khyud la /
T02D2510-1:181a-36: rdo rje chas yan lag thams cad go bskon par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:181a-37: rdo rje cha'i sbyor ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:181a-38: thams cad kyang mi phyed par gal te gnod par
T02D2510-1:181a-39: byed pa rtsom pa na de yang bsrung bar 'gyur
T02D2510-1:181a-40: na gzhan dag lha smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D2510-1:181a-41: 'dir yang sangs rgyas nyid kyang zhes bya ba'i tshig 'dis /
T02D2510-1:181b-0: rnal 'byor @181b pa gnod pa'i khyad par chen po las srung nus par ston to //
T02D2510-1:181b-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje legs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas /
T02D2510-1:181b-3: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:181b-4: legs pa'i las kyi phag rgya bcings la aom badzra
T02D2510-1:181b-5: guhya s'a h'um shva ri h'um zhes brjod la badzra
T02D2510-1:181b-6: bandha ra ksha ham zhes zlos shing snga ma bzhin
T02D2510-1:181b-7: du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nam mkhar gyur
T02D2510-1:181b-9: de nas nam mkha' phyogs der stong gsum gyi sangs
T02D2510-1:181b-10: rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:181b-11: 'khor de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje legs par
T02D2510-1:181b-12: rnam par bsams la stan de nyid la mdun du
T02D2510-1:181b-13: / aom badzra guhya sandhi sha ri h'um zhes bya
T02D2510-1:181b-14: bas rdo rje legs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i legs ldan
T02D2510-1:181b-15: / ma sbrul la / bsdu ba la sogs pa'i chog rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-1:181b-16: bandha raksha ham zhes zlos shad snga ma bzhin du bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:181b-17: / de nas zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug
T02D2510-1:181b-18: gam lo gcig gi mthar nyi ma nub pa'i dus
T02D2510-1:181b-19: su rang gi lus kyi dbung pa bsnol bas bzung
T02D2510-1:181b-20: la zhugs te gcig tu gyur par bsgoms te /
T02D2510-1:181b-21: ji srid sgrub pa po'i lus su zhugs te gcig
T02D2510-1:181b-22: tu gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas par
T02D2510-1:181b-23: bya'o // de nas rdo rje legs pa nyid du
T02D2510-1:181b-24: 'gyur zhing legs pa ma yin pa'i tshul gyis rnam
T02D2510-1:181b-25: par rtog pa rnams las bdag nyid bsrung ba byas
T02D2510-1:181b-26: bya'o // par 'gyur ro // gzhan srung bar byed
T02D2510-1:181b-27: par 'dod na zla ba gcig tsam bsnyen pa byas
T02D2510-1:181b-28: lam thar mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2510-1:181b-29: de nas gang gi tshe mi la sogs pa'i 'jigs sgrag cung zad 'byung bar mthong na /
T02D2510-1:181b-30: de'i tshe rdo rje legs pa'i rnal 'byor pas de
T02D2510-1:181b-31: bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sten du gnas
T02D2510-1:181b-32: las sems can de lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug
T02D2510-1:181b-34: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi steng du 'dug
T02D2510-1:181b-35: par bsams la snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi
T02D2510-1:181b-36: snying gar dpung ba bsnol ba bcings nas /
T02D2510-1:181b-37: rdo rje go cha'i sbyor bas bsrung bar gyur na sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:181b-38: de ltar lus kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:181b-39: lta ba'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:182a-1: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:182a-2: lta ba nyid phyag rgya yin pas na lta ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:182a-3: de'i ye shes ni nges pa ste de bslab pa'o //
T02D2510-1:182a-4: rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni /
T02D2510-1:182a-5: dga' bas mig ni rab tu brgyad //
T02D2510-1:182a-7: chags pa ni mngon par 'dod pa ste /
T02D2510-1:182a-8: de las byung ba'i rab tu dga' ba ni kun du chags pas rab tu dga' ba'i yid do //
T02D2510-1:182a-9: des mig rab tu bgrad cing gdangs pa'i lta ba'i
T02D2510-1:182a-10: phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni chags pas te
T02D2510-1:182a-11: / dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrad //
T02D2510-1:182a-12: ces bya ba lta ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i lta ba'o //
T02D2510-1:182a-13: di dang badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02D2510-1:182a-14: rdo rje'i lta ba bskyed de /
T02D2510-1:182a-15: des bltas na bud med rnams nges par dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:182a-16: lta ba 'di la sgeg pa'i nyams thams cad sbyar par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:182a-17: rab tu myur bar zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:182a-18: la rab tu dga' bas myug ba ni rab tu
T02D2510-1:182a-19: myur ba ste / rings par zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:182a-20: rab tu bskul bas na rab tu bskul te /
T02D2510-1:182a-21: de gang zhe na mig gnyis te /
T02D2510-1:182a-22: 'dis mig gi rje ma dgug cing 'dren par byed pa yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:182a-23: rab tu myur bar mig rab bskul //
T02D2510-1:182a-24: mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa'i //
T02D2510-1:182a-25: zhes bya ste de lta bu'i lta ba gang yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2510-1:182a-26: lta ba yang yin la gzi can yang yin pas
T02D2510-1:182a-27: na lta ba gzi can te gzi brjid can no
T02D2510-1:182a-28: // yin par bshad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T02D2510-1:182a-29: d'i pta dri shat aam gu sha dza: zhes bya
T02D2510-1:182a-30: ba mig gnyis su bkod la bskyed de 'gugs pa'i
T02D2510-1:182a-31: las rnams la 'bar ba'i lta bas sbyar bar bya'o
T02D2510-1:182a-32: // khro gnyer zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:182a-33: gang gis khro gnyer gyi gnyer ma bsdus shing /
T02D2510-1:182a-34: gsal ba gang yin pa de ni gnyer ma rab tu bsdus pa'o //
T02D2510-1:182a-35: de nas khro ba'i mig btsums pas lta ba gang
T02D2510-1:182a-36: yin pa de ni khro bo'i lta ba yin pas
T02D2510-1:182a-37: de la // khro gnyer ma rab bsdus pa //
T02D2510-1:182a-38: khro ba'i mig ni btsums pa ste //
T02D2510-1:182a-40: de lta bu'i khro bo'i lte ba byas shing mnyam par bzhag na ni /
T02D2510-1:182a-41: khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed //
T02D2510-1:182b-0: kro dha dri shti hri zhes bya ba @182b mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02D2510-1:182b-1: khro bo'i nyams thams cad kyis khro bo'i lta ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:182b-2: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la ri rab ni ri'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2510-1:182b-5: de dang 'dra bar brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:182b-6: 'dzum pa med pa ni mi g-yo ba ste ;
T02D2510-1:182b-7: rdzi ma dang mig mi 'gyur ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni /
T02D2510-1:182b-8: ri rab ri'i brag ca 'dra bar brtan pas 'dzum
T02D2510-1:182b-9: pa med pa'i mig byams pa'i lta ba yin par
T02D2510-1:182b-11: dri dha tri ta shat ta zhes bya bas mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02D2510-1:182b-12: brtan pa'i lta ba bskyed nas /
T02D2510-1:182b-13: de'i 'og tu bsrung ba la sogs pa'i las 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:182b-14: de la gang gi tshe lta ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis las byed pa de'i tshe /
T02D2510-1:182b-15: rang gi lha'i sbyor bas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'di
T02D2510-1:182b-16: dag zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du goms par
T02D2510-1:182b-17: bya'o // de la re zhig yi ge ma las
T02D2510-1:182b-18: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ta aa med pa las mig
T02D2510-1:182b-20: yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar
T02D2510-1:182b-21: po mig gnyis kyi mig gi 'bras bur bsams la
T02D2510-1:182b-22: badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya bas byin gyis

T02D2510-1:182b-24: badzra dri shti ma ta zhes zlos shing bsgoms la /

T02D2510-1:182b-28: yi ge dza: las mig g-yas dang g-yon du nyi
T02D2510-1:182b-29: ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2510-1:182b-30: d'i pa ta dri shti aam gu sha dza: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2510-1:182b-31: rdo rje lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od zer rnams spro ba dang /

T02D2510-1:182b-33: de nas zla ba'i mthar de bzhin du bsgrubs pas

T02D2510-1:182b-35: ba'i lta ba'i lcags gyu lta bu'i 'od zer rnams
T02D2510-1:182b-36: kyis bsgrub par bya ba dgug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:182b-37: de bzhin du rang gi lta'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:182b-38: yi ge yi zhes bya bas mig gnyis su rdor je nyi ma bsam /
T02D2510-1:182b-39: yi ge h'um thung du las mig 'bras khro bo'i
T02D2510-1:182b-40: rdo rjer bsams la gro dha dri shti hri zhes
T02D2510-1:183a-2: ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan yid can gyi khro bo'i lta ba dang /
T02D2510-1:183a-3: kro dha dri shti hri zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183a-4: de nas de bzhin du rab tu bsgrubs la /

T02D2510-1:183a-6: de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:183a-7: sems can gyi khams rnams su byams pa spros te /
T02D2510-1:183a-8: yi ge ma las mig g-yas par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor zhi ba /
T02D2510-1:183a-9: ta aa me dpa las mig g-yon par zla ba'i
T02D2510-1:183a-10: dkyil 'khor bsam pa dri dha dri shti tra ta
T02D2510-1:183a-11: zhes bya bas byin phyis brlabs nas /
T02D2510-1:183a-12: dri dha dri shati ta ta zhes zlos shing ji skad du bshad pa'i lta ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183a-13: de nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gi mthar bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183a-14: de nas tsha ba'i rims la zla ba rdo rje
T02D2510-1:183a-15: lta bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba
T02D2510-1:183a-16: la brlas la bya ba cing tsha ba bsal bar
T02D2510-1:183a-17: bya'o ; / grang ba'i rims la ni nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis grangs ba bsal bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183a-18: gdon gyis zin pa la ni 'bar ba'i lta ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis gzhom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183a-19: tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bstab po zhes bya

T02D2510-1:183a-21: skad gsungs ba'i sbyor bas lha'i rnal 'byor ni thams
T02D2510-1:183a-22: cad du bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183a-23: de nas rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:183a-24: phyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang gi las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-1:183a-25: ho ho ho ho zhes bdag nyid zlos shing kha dog dmar por bsams la /
T02D2510-1:183a-26: badzra ho zhes zlos shing zla ba gcig gi bar du thun bzhir bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183a-27: de nas zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom mo //
T02D2510-1:183a-28: de nas de bzhin du las kyi dus su yang
T02D2510-1:183a-29: lha'i rnal 'byor byas la bsgrub par bya ba dang
T02D2510-1:183a-30: lhan cig zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la gnas
T02D2510-1:183a-32: ho ho ho ho zhes zlos shing bsgrub pa'i lus
T02D2510-1:183a-33: la yi ge ho bzhi bcug la des de'i lus
T02D2510-1:183a-34: thams cad dmar por byas nas badzra ho zhes zlos
T02D2510-1:183a-35: shing rang gi lus las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar
T02D2510-1:183a-36: po 'bar bas 'khyud bzhin par bsams ni nges par

T02D2510-1:183b-5: yi ge dzdza:bzhi lan gsum bzlas la /
T02D2510-1:183b-6: dzdza:dzdza: zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam bsgoms nas mthar mtshan thog thag bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183b-7: de nas de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /

T02D2510-1:183b-17: zhes zlos shing bkug na nges par 'gugs par byed
T02D2510-1:183b-18: do // snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /

T02D2510-1:183b-20: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas yi ge h'um bzhi
T02D2510-1:183b-21: bzlos shing khro bo'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom par
T02D2510-1:183b-22: bya'o // de nas badzra h'um zhes zlos shing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183b-23: de nas zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183b-24: yang las kyi dus su de bzhin du yang rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:183b-25: yi ge h'um bzhi rang dang gzhan gyi rna ba'i
T02D2510-1:183b-26: rnam par shes pas gzung du rung ba'i sgra'i tshig
T02D2510-1:183b-27: tu brjod pa gsal bar brjod cing bsgrub par bya
T02D2510-1:183b-28: ba'i lus 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung dang 'dra ba
T02D2510-1:183b-29: des / rnam par gtor bar 'gyur bar bsam zhing /
T02D2510-1:183b-30: badzra h'um zhes bzlas na ri rab kyang lhung bar byed do //
T02D2510-1:183b-31: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2510-1:183b-32: la gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i las kyi
T02D2510-1:183b-34: yi ge h'um bzhi'i go chas bdag nyid go bgos par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:183b-35: de nas badzra ham zhes bya ba'i phra ba'i tshig
T02D2510-1:183b-36: yongs su zlos shing snga ma bzhin du bsgom par
T02D2510-1:184a-0: bya'o // de nas zla ba gcig gi mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom @184a * //
T02D2510-1:184a-2: yang las kyi dus su de bzhin du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /

T02D2510-1:184a-7: ham ham ham ham zhes yongs su zlos shing lha

T02D2510-1:184a-13: yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na rnam pa
T02D2510-1:184a-14: thams cad do // de nyid mchog ste dam pa'o ;

T02D2510-1:184a-20: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid de rang nyid bsgom par byas na de yang ;

T02D2510-1:184a-22: ces pa rang dbang du byed pa'o //

T02D2510-1:184a-27: bcings te / sarbba ta th'a ga ta sa m'a
T02D2510-1:184a-28: dza:ma dha stha badzra p'a ni pa sha m'a na
T02D2510-1:184a-29: bcings te / ya / barbba baddha na ho //
T02D2510-1:184a-30: zhes zlos shing ji skad sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
T02D2510-1:184a-31: pa'i dbus na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpar bdag

T02D2510-1:184a-33: kyi bar du rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid bsgom
T02D2510-1:184a-34: par bya'o // de nas mtshan thog thag bzlas pas

T02D2510-1:184a-36: 'dzin pa chen po nyid stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:184a-37: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:184a-38: de'i 'og tu gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pas
T02D2510-1:184a-39: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po

T02D2510-1:184a-42: bcings te / ba gcig gam / zla ba drug gam /

T02D2510-1:184b-10: rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te

T02D2510-1:184b-21: bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:184b-22: zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o //

T02D2510-1:184b-25: // rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba la rdo

T02D2510-1:185a-27: sbrul la des dbab par bya ba'i lus kun du

T02D2510-1:185a-36: 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje las ma bcings la
T02D2510-1:185a-37: / las kyi rdo rje bsgrub par bya'o //

T02D2510-1:197b-30: gyi las kyi cho ga dang chos kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:197b-31: du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
T02D2510-1:197b-32: gsungs so ; / de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-1:197b-33: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2510-1:197b-34: de yang 'dir 'og nas bshad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i
T02D2510-1:197b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas sna'i rtse mor dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:198a-0: bsgoms nas / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor @198a * //
T02D2510-1:198a-1: dang de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po bya ba nas /
T02D2510-1:198a-2: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags thams cad bzlas brjod 'bum bya ba'am /
T02D2510-1:198a-3: mtshan ma 'byung ba'i bar du ting nge 'dzin gsum
T02D2510-1:198a-4: sngon du 'gro bas chos kyi dkyil 'khor bsgoms par
T02D2510-1:198a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge de
T02D2510-1:198a-7: 'dzin gyi ye shes ni ting nge 'dzin sum cu
T02D2510-1:198a-8: rtsa bdun gyi nges pa dang rdo rje phra mo
T02D2510-1:198a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa ni drug ste /
T02D2510-1:198a-11: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
T02D2510-1:198a-12: cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon
T02D2510-1:198a-13: par shes pa'o // de bsgrub pa ni sngon du bya ba ste de'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:198a-14: 'di zhes bya ba ni thus la gnas pa'o //
T02D2510-1:198a-15: rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes ni rdo rje phra mo ste /
T02D2510-1:198a-16: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor de bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:198a-17: de nyid bstan pa ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:198a-18: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnas skabs te 'di brtsam par bya'o zhes bya'o ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:198a-19: de yang gang gi phyir ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:198a-20: du 'jug pa med par phra mo'i dkyil 'khor las
T02D2510-1:198a-21: gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2510-1:198a-22: de bas na yang dag par bshad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:198a-23: chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
T02D2510-1:198a-24: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2510-1:198a-26: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
T02D2510-1:198a-27: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:198a-28: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad do zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:198a-29: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02D2510-1:198a-30: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag / ces bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:198a-31: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra
T02D2510-1:198a-32: bar dkyil 'khor thams cad bris la rnam par snang
T02D2510-1:198a-33: mdzad la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po rnams go
T02D2510-1:198a-34: rims de nyid kyis gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:198a-35: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags zlos shing yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:198a-36: ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:198a-37: rdo rje'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri //
T02D2510-1:198b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa ldan ni @198b ji skad du bshad pa'i gdan la /
T02D2510-1:198b-1: rdo rje lnga ba legs pa bri la /
T02D2510-1:198b-2: de dag gi chang gzungs la rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-1:198b-3: la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bri bar
T02D2510-1:198b-4: bya'o // sang rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang //
T02D2510-1:198b-5: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2510-1:198b-6: pa'i dkyil 'khor ni sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D2510-1:198b-7: te de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin yin
T02D2510-1:198b-8: pa'i phyir ro // sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing //
T02D2510-1:198b-10: dra rnams su rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:198b-11: sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par bri bar
T02D2510-1:198b-12: bya'o // de bzhin thugs ka nyid phyag rgya //
T02D2510-1:198b-13: zhes bya ba la 'di rnams kyi thugs kar de
T02D2510-1:198b-14: nyid dra rang gi phyag rgya rdo rje la sogs
T02D2510-1:198b-15: pa'i phyag rgya / ji ltar de'i dbus su sangs
T02D2510-1:198b-16: rgyas bri ba de bzhin du sems dpa' chen po
T02D2510-1:198b-18: bzhugs tshul ji lta bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa bri bar bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:198b-19: ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang //
T02D2510-1:198b-21: rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas la mnyam par gzhag pa'i
T02D2510-1:198b-22: tshul gyi spyod lam gyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya'o
T02D2510-1:198b-23: tha tshig go // phyag gnyis rdo rje 'ching bar bcings //
T02D2510-1:198b-24: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2510-1:198b-25: pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar 'di rnams ni
T02D2510-1:198b-26: phyag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pas rang gi mtshan mnas
T02D2510-1:198b-27: 'bras kyi tshad tsam rang gi thugs kar bzhag nas
T02D2510-1:198b-28: rdo rje bsdams pa bkan te phreng ba'i tshul du
T02D2510-1:198b-29: bzhag nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
T02D2510-1:198b-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:198b-31: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D2510-1:198b-32: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bdag nyid 'jug pa
T02D2510-1:198b-33: la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de
T02D2510-1:198b-34: / bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs //
T02D2510-1:198b-35: ji lta bar ni bka' nod do //
T02D2510-1:198b-36: de ltar bgyis nas bdag mi brjod //
T02D2510-1:198b-37: de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba //
T02D2510-1:198b-38: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02D2510-1:198b-39: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-1:198b-40: se gol mang po gdab bgyis la //
T02D2510-1:198b-41: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02D2510-1:198b-42: de tshe sang rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D2510-1:198b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas //
T02D2510-1:198b-44: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
T02D2510-1:199a-2: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
T02D2510-1:199a-3: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2510-1:199a-4: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2510-1:199a-5: cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02D2510-1:199a-6: de nas 'dus pa dgyes pa na //
T02D2510-1:199a-7: de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par gyur //
T02D2510-1:199a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa //
T02D2510-1:199a-9: grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas //
T02D2510-1:199a-10: zhes gang gsungs pa 'di dag gi rjes thogs nyid
T02D2510-1:199a-11: la zhes de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to
T02D2510-1:199a-12: // dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
T02D2510-1:199a-13: yin te zhes bya ba ni dgug pa la sogs
T02D2510-1:199a-14: pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ste /
T02D2510-1:199a-16: de ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug
T02D2510-1:199a-17: pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:199a-18: byas la zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya de rnams
T02D2510-1:199a-19: bcug la lcags sgrog gis de rnams bcings te rdo
T02D2510-1:199a-21: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2510-1:199a-22: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2510-1:199a-23: aom badzra sandhi bam zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la /
T02D2510-1:199a-24: aom badzra raksha ham zhes bya bas rdo rje bsrung
T02D2510-1:199a-25: ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bsrung ba thams cad yang
T02D2510-1:199a-27: chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:199a-28: dpa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la
T02D2510-1:199a-29: mchod yon phul te chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs
T02D2510-1:199a-30: pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de bzhin
T02D2510-1:199a-31: gshegs pa la sogs pa lha thams cad bsgrub par
T02D2510-1:199a-34: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab dbang bskur
T02D2510-1:199a-35: ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur nas mchod yon
T02D2510-1:199a-36: phul lo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
T02D2510-1:199a-37: sogs pa mchod pa thams cad la kyis ji lta
T02D2510-1:199a-38: ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod de phyag byas
T02D2510-1:199a-39: nas nas 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje phra mo thogs
T02D2510-1:199a-40: phul lo // la / rdo rje slob ma gzhug par du ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:199a-41: snga ma bzhin du rjes su gnang ba nod par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:199a-42: 'di ni dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:199a-43: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du gzhug pa la sogs
T02D2510-1:199a-44: pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:199a-45: ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs
T02D2510-1:199b-0: pa'i rdo rje slob ma @199b gzhug pa la sogs
T02D2510-1:199b-1: pa'i cho ga 'dir yang de bzhin du byas nas
T02D2510-1:199b-2: so // ye shes kyi mtshan ma zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:199b-3: ni 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje phra mo lag tu
T02D2510-1:199b-4: so // byin no // de las slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2510-1:199b-5: slob ma yang chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad nas /
T02D2510-1:199b-6: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2510-1:199b-7: rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi man
T02D2510-1:199b-8: ngag sbyin par bya ba yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:199b-9: rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyag
T02D2510-1:199b-10: rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:199b-11: gsungs te / rang nyid kyi sems ni rang gi sems te /
T02D2510-1:199b-12: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:199b-13: de'i las su bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:199b-14: rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa ni 'di rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:199b-15: de'i don gyi phyag rgya yin la chen po yang yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:199b-17: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje phra mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:199b-18: de'i ye shes bslab bo zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:199b-19: lce ni rkan la gzhag bya zhing //
T02D2510-1:199b-20: sna yi rtse mor bsam par bya //
T02D2510-1:199b-21: zhes bya ba ni lce'i rtsa ba nas so'i rtse mo'i bar dang lce'i steng gi cha sbyar la /
T02D2510-1:199b-22: sna rtse zhes bya ba sna'i rtse mor rdo rje
T02D2510-1:199b-23: phra mo gnas pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i
T02D2510-1:199b-24: rtse mo ste / de bsam par bya zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:199b-26: rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas //
T02D2510-1:199b-27: sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:199b-29: sna'i rtse mor rdo rje mor phra mo bsams pa
T02D2510-1:199b-30: des bde ba'i rang bzhin gyi reg pa ni bde
T02D2510-1:199b-31: reg pa ste / rdo rje phra mo'i bde ba'i reg par 'gyur la /
T02D2510-1:199b-32: rdo rje phra mo bde ba reg par 'gyur ba de las /
T02D2510-1:199b-33: sems mnyam par gzhag cing rtse gcig par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:199b-34: rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa'o //
T02D2510-1:199b-35: mtshan ma gal te byung ba na //
T02D2510-1:199b-36: zhes bya ba ni sems la gang gi tshe rdo
T02D2510-1:199b-37: rje phra mo'i bde ba'i reg pa mtshan ma lus
T02D2510-1:199b-38: dang sems kyi 'byung bar gyur pa de'i tshe de
T02D2510-1:199b-40: mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba //
T02D2510-1:199b-41: sems des kun du khyab par bya //
T02D2510-1:199b-42: zhes bya ba ste khyab par bya zhes bya ba ni rgya cher bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:199b-43: de la mtshan ma ni gzugs dang /
T02D2510-1:199b-44: reg pa'i mtshan ma gnyis so //
T02D2510-1:200a-0: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan ma @200a * //
T02D2510-1:200a-1: gnyis po de nyid kyi sems de phyogs bcur spro bar bya bas na /
T02D2510-1:200a-2: sems de kun du khyab par bya zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:200a-3: ji ltar thams cad du khyab cing spro bar bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:200a-4: ji tsam 'dod par khyab ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:200a-5: ji tsam 'dod par spro ba ni ji tsam 'dod par khyab pa'o ;
T02D2510-1:200a-7: sems de khams gsum du yang khyab par bya zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:200a-9: zla ba gnyis sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa na /
T02D2510-1:200a-10: gang gi tshe nyin re zhing de mthong ba de'i
T02D2510-1:200a-11: tshe rnal 'byor pa de'i lus thams ca rdo rje
T02D2510-1:200a-12: phra mo'i reg pa'i bde bas tshim par 'gyur ro
T02D2510-1:200a-13: // rdo rje phra mo'i gzugs bsgoms pa'i stobs des
T02D2510-1:200a-14: gang gi tshe rang gi lus thams cad khyab par
T02D2510-1:200a-15: mthong ba de'i tshe de bzhin gcig tu 'phel bar
T02D2510-1:200a-16: 'dod na rdo rje phra mos khyab par bsam par
T02D2510-1:200a-17: // bya'o // de nas grong la sogs pa ro //
T02D2510-1:200a-18: de nas yang khams gsum pa'i bar du spro bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:200a-19: de nas yang bsdu ba ni //
T02D2510-1:200a-20: sna'i rtse mo'i bar du gnas //
T02D2510-1:200a-21: zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma de yang
T02D2510-1:200a-22: rdo rje pha mo lta bu gang gis khams khyab
T02D2510-1:200a-24: sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra mor bsgoms
T02D2510-1:200a-25: pa'i stobs kyis gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha
T02D2510-1:200a-26: tshig go // de ltar spro ba dang bsu ba'i
T02D2510-1:200a-27: tshul gyis rdo rje phra mo zla ba gsum gyi
T02D2510-1:200a-28: bar du bsgoms na cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-1:200a-29: de nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2510-1:200a-30: pa gang ci yang rung ba shin tu mnyam par
T02D2510-1:200a-31: gzhag cing rtse gcig pas bsgoms pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-1:200a-32: po la sogs pa de kun te /
T02D2510-1:200a-33: de dag thams cad brtan pa nyid du byed par 'gyur te /
T02D2510-1:200a-34: mngon sum du byed par gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:200a-35: nyid kyi sgra ni nges par gzung ba dang tha
T02D2510-1:200a-36: dad pa'i rim pa yin par shes par bya ste
T02D2510-1:200a-37: / brtan par byed pa nyid yin no //
T02D2510-1:200a-38: ting nge 'dzin ye shes ni rdo rje pha mo'i ting nge 'dzin gyi nges pa'o //
T02D2510-1:200a-39: des brtags pa ni bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:200a-40: de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no //
T02D2510-1:200a-41: sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo bsgoms pa dang /
T02D2510-1:200a-44: brtan par bya ba rnams kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:200b-0: rdo rje dbyings @200b kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i
T02D2510-1:200b-1: cho ga rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas pa'i rjes
T02D2510-1:200b-2: la / chos kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i / rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2510-1:200b-3: lce rkan la sbyar bar byas nas /
T02D2510-1:200b-4: badzra n'a bi ta th'a ga ta h'um zhes bya
T02D2510-1:200b-5: ba 'dis rang gi lte ba'i phyogs su rdo rje
T02D2510-1:200b-6: phra mo bskyed la yang badzra n'a ni ta th'a
T02D2510-1:200b-7: ga ta h'um zhes zlos shing lte ba'i phyogs rdo
T02D2510-1:200b-9: sna khung nas sna'i rtse mor bsgreng ste gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:200b-10: de nas s'u kshma badzra zhes zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:200b-11: bsdu ba'i dus su sna khung nas bcug la rang gi sning ga'i zla pa la /
T02D2510-1:200b-12: badzra dri dha ti shtha zhes bya bas bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:200b-13: de ltar nyin de zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgoms na /
T02D2510-1:200b-14: nges par mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:200b-15: de nas mtshan ma thob cing brtan par gyur nas /
T02D2510-1:200b-16: spar na badzra zhes zlos shing sna'i rtse mor gnas
T02D2510-1:200b-17: pa'i rdo rje phra mo las byung ba'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:200b-18: phra mo khams gsum ma lus shing lus pa med
T02D2510-1:200b-20: bsgoms pas dub par 'gyur nas ha ra na badzra zhes bya bas de rnams bsdus la /
T02D2510-1:200b-21: rang gi sna'i rtse mor gnas pa'i rdo rje phra
T02D2510-1:200b-22: mo gzhug par bya zhing yang de bzhin du rang
T02D2510-1:200b-23: gi snying gar gzhug par bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:200b-24: / tshul 'dis zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:200b-25: de nas ni rdo rje phra mo'i ring nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:200b-26: rdzogs par gyur pa yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D2510-1:200b-27: kyis gsungs te / de nas gang ci bsgoms pa thams cad mngon sum du byed do //
T02D2510-1:200b-28: sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni ;
T02D2510-1:200b-29: / zhes bya ba ni gang la zhig la zhig
T02D2510-1:200b-30: la rgyu med par phan pa dang bde bas nye
