T02D2510-1:212a-52: spro ba bskyed pa rnam par 'phel par bya zhing
T02D2510-1:212a-53: / gar gyi phyag rgya bcings la des bdag nyid mchod par bsams par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:212b-0: de ltar byas bas rnal 'byor ba de @212b sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:212b-1: de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa'i bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:212b-2: da ni nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag
T02D2510-1:212b-3: rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la
T02D2510-1:212b-4: sogs pas tshogs kyi mchod pa gsungs pa yin te
T02D2510-1:212b-5: / sangs rgyas thams cad la rnam pa bzhi'i phyag la sogs pa'i mchod pa ni phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:212b-6: de'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:212b-7: lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2510-1:212b-8: lus dang ngag dang sems ni lus dang ngag sems so //
T02D2510-1:212b-9: de nyid ni mi phyed bas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2510-1:212b-10: de rnams kyi mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D2510-1:212b-12: bdag nyid kyis dngos po 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D2510-1:212b-13: cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub
T02D2510-1:212b-14: sems dpa' chen po las sna tshogs pa'i gzugs kyis
T02D2510-1:212b-15: 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i
T02D2510-1:212b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal ba dang
T02D2510-1:212b-17: / de bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis
T02D2510-1:212b-18: mchod na sems can thams cad kyi phyag bya bar
T02D2510-1:212b-19: / 'os pa dang / mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:212b-20: sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che //
T02D2510-1:212b-22: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyang yin la /
T02D2510-1:212b-23: chen po yang yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:212b-24: de rnams kyang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:212b-25: sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje skyes //
T02D2510-1:212b-26: zhes bya ba ste sku dang gsung dang /
T02D2510-1:212b-27: thugs rdo rje las byung ba de la rjes su
T02D2510-1:212b-28: yi rang ba de nyid ni mchod pa yin zhing
T02D2510-1:212b-29: de nyid kyis rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa
T02D2510-1:212b-30: de ni rjes su yi rang ba'i mchod pa'i bdag
T02D2510-1:212b-31: go // de lta bus ni myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:212b-32: bdag dbul ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:212b-33: phyogs bcur byang chub sems dpa'i kun du bzang po'i
T02D2510-1:212b-34: gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs
T02D2510-1:212b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyen bskur ba'i gzugs su bdag nyid dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:212b-38: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis //
T02D2510-1:212b-39: lha rdzas kyi ni zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no ;
T02D2510-1:212b-41: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsnyen
T02D2510-1:212b-42: bskur ba byang chub sems dpa'i chen po kun du
T02D2510-1:212b-43: bzang po'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02D2510-1:212b-44: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchod pa
T02D2510-1:212b-45: kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams te de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:213a-1: par bya'o zhes sems kyis bsams te /
T02D2510-1:213a-2: mchod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:213a-3: dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni //
T02D2510-1:213a-4: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
T02D2510-1:213a-6: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi //
T02D2510-1:213a-7: yongs su bsngo pa'i mchod pa yis //
T02D2510-1:213a-9: 'dis ni sgrub pa'i mchod par 'gyur ba yin te
T02D2510-1:213a-10: yongs su bsngo pa'i mchod pa de rnams kyis cir
T02D2510-1:213a-11: 'gyur zhe na / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:213a-13: de ltar tshogs kyi mchod pa gsungs nas /
T02D2510-1:213a-14: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos kyi mchod pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:213a-15: chos kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni shes rab kyi
T02D2510-1:213a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos bsgom pa ste de'i
T02D2510-1:213a-18: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D2510-1:213a-19: zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin te /
T02D2510-1:213a-20: ngo bo nyid kyis dri ma med pas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2510-1:213a-21: de dag kyang gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:213a-22: chos rnams te padma'i rigs kyi tshul rnams so //
T02D2510-1:213a-23: ci'i phyir de rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:213a-24: gang gi phyir gzod nas dag ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:213a-25: chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D2510-1:213a-26: dag ba bzhin du dag par 'dod //
T02D2510-1:213a-28: de bas na gdod ma nas dag pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:213a-29: de rnams kyi gdod ma nas dag pa de yang
T02D2510-1:213a-30: gang gis kyang byas pa ma yin no zhes bstan
T02D2510-1:213a-32: ngo bo nyid kyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:213a-33: chos de rnams rang bzhin gyis gdod ma nas dag pa yin gyi /
T02D2510-1:213a-34: de rnams gzhan gyis dag par byas pa ma yin no //
T02D2510-1:213a-35: de ltar rnal 'byor pas chos 'di dag bdag med
T02D2510-1:213a-36: par bsgoms pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgrub pa'i mchod
T02D2510-1:213a-37: pa nges de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa
T02D2510-1:213a-38: byas pa de ni chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D2510-1:213a-39: dag par bsgoms pas chos bdag med pa'i ngo bo
T02D2510-1:213a-40: las byung ba'i bde ba thob cing nyams su myong
T02D2510-1:213a-41: bar 'gyur ro // aa zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod //
T02D2510-1:213a-42: ces bya ba ni aa ni gdod ma nas ma
T02D2510-1:213a-43: skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes de
T02D2510-1:213a-44: ltar brjod cing bsgom zhing smra ba'o //
T02D2510-1:213a-45: de la yi ge aa ni ma skyes pa'i don ston pa yin la /
T02D2510-1:213a-46: de ni sgo ste sgo des chos bdag med pa
T02D2510-1:213b-0: mngon sum du @213b byed pas chos bdag med pa
T02D2510-1:213b-3: chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi //
T02D2510-1:213b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:213b-5: 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni phan tshun tha dad
T02D2510-1:213b-6: par gnas par gnas pa rnams chos bdag med pa'i
T02D2510-1:213b-7: tshul gcig tu sdud pa ste /
T02D2510-1:213b-8: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yongs su spyod pa zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:213b-9: chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni //
T02D2510-1:213b-10: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-1:213b-11: ma skyes par bsgoms pa'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
T02D2510-1:213b-12: de yis sdug bsngal thams cad gcod //
T02D2510-1:213b-13: ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2510-1:213b-14: phyin pa'i ral gris chos bdag med pa bsgoms pa
T02D2510-1:213b-15: de'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud
T02D2510-1:213b-16: pa'i sdug bsngal mang po gcod cing med par byed
T02D2510-1:213b-17: do // 'dir ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:213b-18: la chos rnams kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin
T02D2510-1:213b-19: pas na chos thams cad de byang chub kyi sems
T02D2510-1:213b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de thams cad dang /
T02D2510-1:213b-22: 'jig rten pa rnams bskyed pa'i rgyu ni de bzhin
T02D2510-1:213b-23: gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje
T02D2510-1:213b-24: chen po'i mtshan nyid rdo rje rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:213b-25: yang dag par bsgom pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
T02D2510-1:213b-26: lo'i mchod pa bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i rang bzhin 'dis
T02D2510-1:213b-27: mchod cing mnyes par byas pas rnal 'byor ba chos
T02D2510-1:213b-28: ni 'dzin par 'gyur zhes bya ba rdo rje rgyur
T02D2510-1:213b-29: 'gyur ro // chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2510-1:213b-30: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i chos
T02D2510-1:213b-31: thams cad rang bzhin te ngo bo nyid kyis so
T02D2510-1:213b-32: // sgra brnyan dag dang 'dra bar bshad //
T02D2510-1:213b-34: de la sgra brnyan ni brag ca ste /
T02D2510-1:213b-35: ji ltar 'khrul pa tsam ni rnam par dpyad na
T02D2510-1:213b-36: ma skyes pa yin pa de bzhin du snying po
T02D2510-1:213b-39: rig pa rnams kyi sgra'i tshul ni med skyes pa yin no zhes bsgoms la /
T02D2510-1:213b-40: chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis //
T02D2510-1:213b-41: zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa bsgoms pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mchod na /
T02D2510-1:213b-42: sangs rgyas gsung yang thob ces bya ba ste /
T02D2510-1:213b-43: chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar ston pa'i
T02D2510-1:213b-44: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhags thob par 'gyur ba ste
T02D2510-1:213b-45: rdo rje de smra bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:213b-46: tha tshig go // de ltar chos kyi mchod pa bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:213b-47: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2510-1:214a-0: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa gsungs pa @214a *
T02D2510-1:214a-2: de nas zhes bya ba rjes thogs nyid la ting
T02D2510-1:214a-3: nge 'dzin gyi rang bzhin can gyi mchod pa'i phyag
T02D2510-1:214a-4: rgya ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ste
T02D2510-1:214a-5: de'i ye shes de bstan zhing bslab bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:214a-6: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la //
T02D2510-1:214a-7: rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams //
T02D2510-1:214a-8: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:214a-9: chen po las gsungs pa'i chogs rang gi lha'i rnal
T02D2510-1:214a-10: 'byor byas la / rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi lus rdo rje dang /
T02D2510-1:214a-11: rang gi lce rdo rje dang /
T02D2510-1:214a-12: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba dang /
T02D2510-1:214a-13: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sems kyi rdo rje de
T02D2510-1:214a-14: rnams la rang gi lce bdag nyid kyi rtul ni
T02D2510-1:214a-16: rtul phra rab ji snyed cig lus dang ;
T02D2510-1:214a-17: ngag dang sems rdo rje la yod pa de rnams
T02D2510-1:214a-18: tshad med pa'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni
T02D2510-1:214a-19: zhes bya ba de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' dang
T02D2510-1:214a-21: lus dang ngag dang sems zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang zhing rings par thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:214a-23: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas pa'i rjes la /
T02D2510-1:214a-24: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2510-1:214a-26: las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:214a-27: de nas lus dang dag dang /
T02D2510-1:214a-28: sems kyi rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs lta bur nyin
T02D2510-1:214a-29: re zhing bsgom pa'i dus su de'i gzugs su dus
T02D2510-1:214a-30: ji srid kyi mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi
T02D2510-1:214a-32: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms nar lha'i sku mi
T02D2510-1:214a-33: chod pa dang mi shigs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid
T02D2510-1:214a-34: can 'grub par 'gyur zhing lus de nyid kyis bla
T02D2510-1:214a-35: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D2510-1:214a-36: tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro
T02D2510-1:214a-37: // lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi //
T02D2510-1:214a-38: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2510-1:214a-39: sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:214a-43: don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02D2510-1:214a-44: 'di dag thams cad kyang nges pa can gyi dus su bsgom par bya ba yin la /
T02D2510-1:214a-45: 'on kyang gang la lhag par mos par bya ba gcig bu de nyid kyi skus /
T02D2510-1:214a-46: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rdo rje thams cad
T02D2510-1:214a-47: kyi phra rab kyis gsal bar khyab pa'i dbye bas
T02D2510-1:214a-48: phye ba tshad med pa'i gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar
T02D2510-1:214a-49: rang gi ngo bo byas par ji srid mngon sum
T02D2510-1:214b-0: du mthong zhing @214b brtan par gyur pa de srid
T02D2510-1:214b-1: kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:214b-2: de nas sangs rgyas kyi sku de rnams kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par bsam mo //
T02D2510-1:214b-3: bsgom pas dbu par gyur na snga ma bzhin du
T02D2510-1:214b-4: bsdus la sangs rgyas kyi sku brtan par byas te
T02D2510-1:214b-5: ldang bar bya'o // ji srid sangs rgyas kyi sku
T02D2510-1:214b-6: rnams kyis nam mkha' khyab par mthong ba de srid
T02D2510-1:214b-7: kyi bar dub sgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:214b-8: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms nas sangs rgyas rjes
T02D2510-1:214b-9: su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2510-1:214b-10: // de nas lus de nyid kyis bla na med
T02D2510-1:214b-11: pa dbyang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon du
T02D2510-1:214b-13: chos kyis kur ni myur du 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:214b-15: lus dang dag sems rdo rje yi //
T02D2510-1:214b-16: rang gi rtul ni phra mo rnams //
T02D2510-1:214b-17: zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra ste rang
T02D2510-1:214b-18: gi lus kyi phra rab tu rdo rje dang dril
T02D2510-1:214b-19: bu bsnams pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsam par
T02D2510-1:214b-20: bya'o // de nas snga ma bzhin du brtan par byas la /
T02D2510-1:214b-21: mtshan thog thar bsgoms na rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:214b-22: lus dang ngag dang sems zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2510-1:214b-23: sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na //
T02D2510-1:214b-24: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:214b-25: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du cho ga thams
T02D2510-1:214b-26: cad rjes su spyad la mtshan thog thag bzlas na
T02D2510-1:214b-27: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:214b-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du gyur //
T02D2510-1:214b-29: zhes bya ba snga ma dang 'di la khyad par ci zhig yod ce na /
T02D2510-1:214b-30: snga ma ni gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba sangs rgyas
T02D2510-1:214b-31: bsgom pa'i sgo nas chos kyi sku bsgom pa gsungs
T02D2510-1:214b-32: pa yin la / 'dir gzugs kyi sku bsgom pa nyid yin pas khyad par 'di yod do //
T02D2510-1:214b-33: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsang bar 'os par shes nas so //
T02D2510-1:214b-34: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes zhes bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:214b-35: de la gsang ba'i sgras ni lus kyi 'khyud pa
T02D2510-1:214b-36: la sogs pa'i bsgom pa bzhi po la bya bar
T02D2510-1:214b-37: bshad de / de las byung ba'i bde ba ni gsang bar gyur pa yin pas na gsal ba'o//
T02D2510-1:214b-38: de nyid ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya de sgrub pa'i tshul yin la /
T02D2510-1:214b-39: de'i ye shes brtag cing brtan par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:214b-40: lus kyang yin la kun kyang yin pas na lus kun te /
T02D2510-1:214b-41: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i chos kyi sku dang gzugs kyi sku'o //
T02D2510-1:215a-0: de yongs su 'khyud pa ni gcig tu gyur par lhag par mos pa @215a * //
T02D2510-1:215a-2: de bsam gtan las byung ba'i bde ba gang zhig
T02D2510-1:215a-3: skyes pa de thams cad ni lus kun gyi 'khyud
T02D2510-1:215a-4: pa'i bde ba'o // de nyid ni mchod pa ste sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2510-1:215a-5: su zhig la mchod ce na /
T02D2510-1:215a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul zhing bstan par bsgoms pas myur du 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:215a-9: rdo rje sems dpa'i dang 'dra bar rnal 'byor ba de 'gyur te /
T02D2510-1:215a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:215a-12: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs
T02D2510-1:215a-13: pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas pa'i rjes
T02D2510-1:215a-14: la las kyis dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i bcom ldan
T02D2510-1:215a-15: 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:215a-16: de nas mdun du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2510-1:215a-17: dpa' bsdus pa ras ris la sogs par spyan drangs
T02D2510-1:215a-18: la / las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo
T02D2510-1:215a-19: rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:215a-24: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis
T02D2510-1:215a-25: rgyas btab nas dbang bskur la mchod pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:215a-26: kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas de
T02D2510-1:215a-27: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbus na gnas pa'i
T02D2510-1:215a-28: yid dang / de las 'khyud par bya zhing chos
T02D2510-1:215a-29: kyi sku'i tshul dang gzugs kyi sku'i tshul gyis de
T02D2510-1:215a-30: dang lhan cig bdag nyid tha mi dad cing dbyer
T02D2510-1:215a-31: med par ji srid mngon sum su rang nyid mthong
T02D2510-1:215a-32: ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:215a-33: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtul
T02D2510-1:215a-34: phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:215a-35: cad kyi gzugs dang chos kyi sku la rang rang
T02D2510-1:215a-36: gi ngo bo rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang 'khyud
T02D2510-1:215a-37: pa'i sbyor ba nyid dbul zhing /
T02D2510-1:215a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2510-1:215a-39: gyur pa de srid skyo bar ma gyur pa ji
T02D2510-1:215a-40: srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:215a-41: dub par gyur na snga ma bzhin du bsdu bar bya zhing brtan par byas la ldang bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:215a-42: de ltar nyin re zhing ji srid nam mkha' thams
T02D2510-1:215a-43: cad rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba
T02D2510-1:215a-44: de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:215a-45: de nas mtshan thog thag bsgoms na rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:215a-46: shin tu chags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:215b-0: la shin tu chags pa yang yin @215b la rjes
T02D2510-1:215b-1: su chags pa yang yin pas na shin tu chags
T02D2510-1:215b-2: pa ste / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo
T02D2510-1:215b-3: rje rin chen bsgoms pas de'i rang bzhin du 'gyur
T02D2510-1:215b-4: pa ste / ba'o // sbyor ba des 'phags pa
T02D2510-1:215b-5: nam mkha'i snying po dang ldan cig tu gyur par
T02D2510-1:215b-6: pa ste / ba'o // nges pa ste / de
T02D2510-1:215b-7: nyid skra nas dam du bzung ba dang 'dra bar
T02D2510-1:215b-8: rnam par rtog pas phyed par mi nus par dam
T02D2510-1:215b-9: du bzung ba'i sgros ston to //
T02D2510-1:215b-10: shin tu chags par sbyor ba des sgra nas bzung
T02D2510-1:215b-11: ba las bde ba gang zhig skyes pa de ni
T02D2510-1:215b-12: shin tu chags pa'i sbyor bas dam du gzung ba
T02D2510-1:215b-14: de ltar bshad pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub pa'i
T02D2510-1:215b-15: tshul gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyis ku la phul bar
T02D2510-1:215b-16: gyur na rdo rje rin chen dang 'dra bar 'gyur
T02D2510-1:215b-17: ro // shin tu dga' ba mnga' bas na shin tu dga' zhing ste /
T02D2510-1:215b-18: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos so //
T02D2510-1:215b-19: de'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas /
T02D2510-1:215b-20: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pas nas
T02D2510-1:215b-21: bskyod par mi nus pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'i
T02D2510-1:215b-22: dga' ba'i rang bzhin skye bar yin pa de bas
T02D2510-1:215b-23: na de shin tu brtan par 'gyur ba yin no
T02D2510-1:215b-24: // shin tu brtan pa'i dga' ba des rdo rje
T02D2510-1:215b-25: chos dang ldan cig yang dag par sbyor ba bsgoms
T02D2510-1:215b-26: pa las rnal 'bro pa rnams la bde ba gang
T02D2510-1:215b-27: zhig skye ba de ni shin tu dga' zhing bde
T02D2510-1:215b-28: // ba'o // der chags pas na shin tu dga' zhing bde ba la chags pa ste /
T02D2510-1:215b-29: des brtan par gyur pas chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D2510-1:215b-30: gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i ting nge
T02D2510-1:215b-31: 'dzin gyis rdo rje chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin dang
T02D2510-1:215b-32: gzugs kyi sku'i rang bzhin mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:215b-33: de nyid ni mchog ste dam pa'o //
T02D2510-1:215b-34: de las byung ba'i bde ba sngar bshad pa'i tshul
T02D2510-1:215b-35: gyis sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni rdo rje
T02D2510-1:215b-37: dbang po gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gnyis kyi dbang por ni dbang po gnyis te /
T02D2510-1:215b-38: sgrub pa po dang rdo rje las kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:215b-39: de'i dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba ni snyoms par 'jug pas gcig tu bya'o //
T02D2510-1:215b-40: de'i sgom pa ni dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyor ba'i kun nas sbyor ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2510-1:215b-41: de las byung ba'i dbang por gnyis mnyam par kun du sbyor ba'i bde ba ste /
T02D2510-1:215b-42: de thams cad du ste phyogs bcur mchod phyir zhes
T02D2510-1:215b-43: mchod pa'i don du phul par gyur na byang chub
T02D2510-1:215b-44: sems dpa'i rdo rje las kyi ngo bo nyid dang
T02D2510-1:216a-1: dngos po thams cad rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:216a-2: mchod pa'i rnam pa nyi shu po 'di dag gi nang nas byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2510-1:216a-4: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pas bdag nyid yang dag
T02D2510-1:216a-5: par mchod la gang yang rung ba cig bsgoms te
T02D2510-1:216a-6: bsgrub par bya'o // de ltar dngos grub kyi ye
T02D2510-1:216a-7: shes bstan nas las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i
T02D2510-1:216a-8: dngos grub rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:216a-9: las gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:216a-10: de nyid las gsungs pa'i chog byas nas /
T02D2510-1:216a-11: de'i rjes la las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2510-1:216a-12: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:216a-13: las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ras ris la sogs pas lha rnams spyan drangs nas /
T02D2510-1:216a-14: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis
T02D2510-1:216a-15: rgyas gdab bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2510-1:216a-16: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:216a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:216a-18: de'i phyag rgya chen po ni sku ston par byed pas lag pas byed pa'i tshul te /
T02D2510-1:216a-19: de'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:216a-20: snying ga'i rtsib logs rgyab sbyar ba //
T02D2510-1:216a-22: rdo rje de dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis rang
T02D2510-1:216a-23: gi snying ga'i phyogs su 'dzin pa 'di ni rab
T02D2510-1:216a-24: tu dga' zhing bde ba ma'i phyag rgya chen po'o
T02D2510-1:216a-25: // rtsib logs g-yas par lcags kyu bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216a-26: rtsib logs g-yon par mda' dang gzhur bcas pa ni
T02D2510-1:216a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed ma'i'o
T02D2510-1:216a-28: // rgyab tu legs so zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216a-29: dpral ba la sogs pa de bzhin du zhes bya
T02D2510-1:216a-30: ba ni rdo rje rin po che dang bcas pa'i
T02D2510-1:216a-31: lag pa gnyis dpral ba'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni
T02D2510-1:216a-32: dbang mo che'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:216a-33: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i nyi ma'i mgo'i rgyab tu gzhag pa ni snang ba chen mo'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216a-34: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bcas ba'i rgyal mtshan
T02D2510-1:216a-35: phrag par gzhag pa ni rin po che'i char 'bebs
T02D2510-1:216a-36: ma'i'o // rdo rje gnyis kyi nang du chud pa'i
T02D2510-1:216a-37: so'i phreng ba dang ldan pa dgod pa'i tshul du
T02D2510-1:216a-38: yongs su bzlog nas kha'i thad kar gzhag pa 'di
T02D2510-1:216a-40: kha dang rna ba mgo ltag pa //
T02D2510-1:216a-41: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'i padma'i
T02D2510-1:216b-0: lag pa gnyis @216b po khar gzhag pa ni ye
T02D2510-1:216b-2: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i ral gri rna ba g-yas
T02D2510-1:216b-3: par gzhag pa ni dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang
T02D2510-1:216b-4: ma'i'o // rdo rje dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo rna
T02D2510-1:216b-5: ba g-yon par gzhag pa ni dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2510-1:216b-7: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lce lhag pa ste mgo
T02D2510-1:216b-8: bo'i rgyab tu gzhag pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa
T02D2510-1:216b-9: ma'i'o // spyi bo phrag pa kha rked gzhag /
T02D2510-1:216b-10: ces bya ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje lag pa
T02D2510-1:216b-11: gnyis spyi bor gzhag pa ni sems ma can gyi
T02D2510-1:216b-13: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i go cha phrag bar gzhag
T02D2510-1:216b-14: ba ni byang chub chen po'i yan lag can ma'i'o
T02D2510-1:216b-15: // rdo rje dang bcas pa'i mched khar gzhag pa ni mig ldan ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-16: dam tshig gi khu tshur dang bcas pa'i lag pa
T02D2510-1:216b-17: gnyis rked par gzhag pa ni dri ldan ma'i phyag
T02D2510-1:216b-18: rgya chen po mo yin no //
T02D2510-1:216b-19: phyag rgya chen po ma gsungs pa rnams ni rdo
T02D2510-1:216b-20: rje dbyings kyi dum bu dang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:216b-21: las gsungs pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-22: de nas zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam
T02D2510-1:216b-24: tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes
T02D2510-1:216b-25: bya ba ni mchod pa'i las kyi rgyu'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:216b-27: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni thugs kyi gsang
T02D2510-1:216b-28: ba ston par byed pa ste de'i ye shes ni
T02D2510-1:216b-29: nges pa ste ; de bstan cing bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i mchod pa'i las te /
T02D2510-1:216b-30: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-1:216b-31: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas la //
T02D2510-1:216b-32: snying ga la sogs gnas rnams su //
T02D2510-1:216b-33: bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do //
T02D2510-1:216b-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsang pa bcings te
T02D2510-1:216b-35: snying gar gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:216b-36: cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ba ma'i dam
T02D2510-1:216b-38: g-yas logs su gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-39: g-yon logs su gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-40: g-yon logs su gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad mnyes par byed ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-41: ltag par gzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyes pra byed ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-42: dpral bar gzhag pa ni dbang mo chen mo'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-43: mgo bo'i rgyab tu gzhag pa ni snang ba chen mo'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-44: phrag pa g-yon par gzhag pa ni rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-45: khar dgod pa'i tshul gyis rab tu sbyar ba ni rab tu dga' zhing ma gu ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:216b-46: khar gzhag pa ni dbyangs chen mo'i'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-1: g-yas par gzhag pa ni dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-2: rna ba g-yon par gzhag pa ni dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-3: mgo bo'i ltag tu gzhag pa ni sngags kyi spyod ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-4: spyi bor gzhag pa ni sems ma can gyi'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-5: phrag pa gnyis su gzhag pa ni byang chub chen po'i yan lag can gyi'o ;
T02D2510-1:217a-6: / khar gzhag pa ni mig ldan ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-7: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la rked pa'i phyogs su
T02D2510-1:217a-8: gzhag pa ni dri ldan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2510-1:217a-9: rgya'o // gzhan dag ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dum
T02D2510-1:217a-10: bu dang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa nyid
T02D2510-1:217a-11: dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin no //
T02D2510-1:217a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:217a-14: de'i chos ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:217a-15: de'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-16: aom gya spya sa ti ram kam na kham sham h'um hi sha ho shi ho /
T02D2510-1:217a-17: zhes bya ba'i bar 'di dag ni rab tu dga' zhing bde ba ma nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:217a-18: lha mo dri ldan ma'i bar gyi chos kyi phyag
T02D2510-1:217a-19: rgya yin te lce la bkod nas bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2510-1:217a-20: // rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ni gzungs
T02D2510-1:217a-21: kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa nyid bzung la bsgrub
T02D2510-1:217a-22: // par bya'o // las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus nas //
T02D2510-1:217a-23: las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya //
T02D2510-1:217a-24: zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi las ston par
T02D2510-1:217a-25: byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni las kyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2510-1:217a-26: // mdor bsdus na zhes bya ba ni mdo nyid du bsdus pa'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-27: las zhes bya ba ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:217a-28: de'i phyag rgya ni dri ldan ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-29: de gnyis su bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D2510-1:217a-30: dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i tshul du sbyar
T02D2510-1:217a-31: na / thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:217a-32: de'i mtshan nyid ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-1:217a-34: rked par gzhag pa'i rdo rje bcings //
T02D2510-1:217a-35: zhes bya ba de gnyis su byas la //
T02D2510-1:217a-36: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2510-1:217a-37: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2510-1:217a-38: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2510-1:217a-39: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-40: mi g-yo ba yis reg pa //
T02D2510-1:217a-41: de bzhin rin chen mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:217a-42: tshe dpag med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D2510-1:217a-43: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2510-1:217a-44: mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya //
T02D2510-1:217a-45: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams //
T02D2510-1:217a-46: rdo rje'i las rnams byed pa ste /
T02D2510-1:217a-47: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02D2510-1:217b-0: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa @217b dang //
T02D2510-1:217b-1: mda' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni //
T02D2510-1:217b-2: legs so zhes ni snying gar gzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02D2510-1:217b-3: snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya //
T02D2510-1:217b-4: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02D2510-1:217b-5: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02D2510-1:217b-6: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
T02D2510-1:217b-7: snying gar g-yon par ral gri 'dud //
T02D2510-1:217b-8: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02D2510-1:217b-9: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02D2510-1:217b-10: rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis //
T02D2510-1:217b-11: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha
T02D2510-1:217b-12: ma the chung mche ba mchog / khu tshur gnyis
T02D2510-1:217b-13: kyis mnan pa'o // rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2510-1:217b-14: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02D2510-1:217b-15: phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung //
T02D2510-1:217b-16: rdor je gar ni bskor ba yin //
T02D2510-1:217b-17: rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-1:217b-18: bdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
T02D2510-1:217b-19: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yin //
T02D2510-1:217b-20: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:217b-21: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni /
T02D2510-1:217b-22: mthe chung la steng lcags kyu che //
T02D2510-1:217b-23: mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub //
T02D2510-1:217b-24: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02D2510-1:217b-27: de ltar rgya chen po la dga' ba'i sems can rnams las brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:217b-29: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2510-1:217b-30: rgya chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pa bar ma la
T02D2510-1:217b-31: dga' ba'i sems can rnams las brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:217b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsdus par gyur pa phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:217b-33: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-1:217b-34: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thog nyid la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:217b-35: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo
T02D2510-1:217b-36: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i
T02D2510-1:217b-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbrul pa yin par gzung ngo
T02D2510-1:217b-38: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de mi bskyod
T02D2510-1:217b-39: pa la sogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya
T02D2510-1:217b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas
T02D2510-1:217b-42: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:217b-43: dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed nas de
T02D2510-1:217b-44: ltar gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
T02D2510-1:217b-45: ; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2510-1:217b-46: la sogs pa 'di dang 'brel pa'i rtog pa chen
T02D2510-1:217b-47: po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi por bstan
T02D2510-1:217b-48: pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i don du ji
T02D2510-1:217b-49: skad bshad pa'i don gyi dngos grub la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:217b-50: nye bar bsdu zhing yang dag par bsdus pa de'i
T02D2510-1:218a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:218a-2: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor te gang gi phyir des
T02D2510-1:218a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dngos grub thams cad
T02D2510-1:218a-4: bsdus par gyur pas sems can gyi khams ma lus
T02D2510-1:218a-5: pa rgyas 'debs shing dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par
T02D2510-1:218a-6: nus pa'i gzugs brnyan bskyed la phyag rgya de'i snying
T02D2510-1:218a-7: po rang gi thugs la gnas pa'i 'di smras pa
T02D2510-1:218a-8: ni gsungs pa'o // de ltar re zhig bcom ldan
T02D2510-1:218a-9: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rang gi phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:218a-11: da ni mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:218a-14: don yod grub pa rang rang gi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:218a-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:218a-16: thams cad rang gi phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rang nyid kyis sprul cing /
T02D2510-1:218a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:218a-18: 'dir yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang rdo rje
T02D2510-1:218a-19: sems dpa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dang po
T02D2510-1:218a-20: sbyor ba'i dus su nges par bya dgos te /
T02D2510-1:218a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gcig tu byon pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2510-1:218a-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i med par dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lor 'jug pa yod pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2510-1:218a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi 'khor
T02D2510-1:218a-24: los sgyur ba de nyid du dbang bskur ba yin
T02D2510-1:218a-25: pa'i phyir ro // yang na 'og min du mngon
T02D2510-1:218a-26: par byang chub pa tsam na dang po'i sbyor ba
T02D2510-1:218a-27: nyid du bshad pa der yang rang gi rigs sprul
T02D2510-1:218a-28: pa bkod pa byin gyis brlab pa dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2510-1:218a-29: rgyal po mchog ni ri rab kyi steng du rdo
T02D2510-1:218a-30: rje sems dpa' dang bcas pas phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:218a-32: de bas na phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor re re sprul pa la /
T02D2510-1:218a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02D2510-1:218a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' bya dgos so //
T02D2510-1:218a-35: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga
T02D2510-1:218a-36: las kyang thams cad gcig tu gyur nas phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:218a-37: bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:218a-38: la snyoms bar zhugs te gnas par bya'o zhes bshad
T02D2510-1:218a-39: pa yin no // gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni phyag
T02D2510-1:218a-40: rgya'i dkyil 'khor rgyal pa mchog gi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:218a-42: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlabs pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:218a-43: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor por gsungs pa'i chogs
T02D2510-1:218b-0: las kyi @218b rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:218b-2: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par byas pas
T02D2510-1:218b-3: mtshan ma thob pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:218b-4: chen po las gsungs pa'i chogs rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2510-1:218b-5: rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas
T02D2510-1:218b-6: la phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bris te /
T02D2510-1:218b-7: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos
T02D2510-1:218b-8: grub thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dam
T02D2510-1:218b-9: tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bsgrub par bya
T02D2510-1:218b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2510-1:218b-12: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:218b-13: rang gi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:218b-14: dmigs su med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid
T02D2510-1:218b-15: can gyi rang gi nus so //
T02D2510-1:218b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas
T02D2510-1:218b-17: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:218b-18: 'khor chen po la sogs pa bzhi bskyed do //
T02D2510-1:218b-19: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ni sngar bshad pa ste de'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:218b-20: rdo rje dngos grub ces bya ba ni sems dpa'i
T02D2510-1:218b-21: rdo rje rtse lnga pa las dngos grub grub pa'i
T02D2510-1:218b-22: 'di la mnga' bas na rdo rje dngos grub ste
T02D2510-1:218b-23: / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2510-1:218b-24: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje dngos grub ces bya ba ste /
T02D2510-1:218b-25: dkyil 'khor de bshad do zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal ba ste /
T02D2510-1:218b-26: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:218b-27: bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2510-1:218b-28: to // de nas zhes bya ba la gang gi
T02D2510-1:218b-29: phyir bar ma la dga' ba rnams phyag rgya bzhi'i
T02D2510-1:218b-30: dkyil 'khor du ji srid dam tshig ma thob cing
T02D2510-1:218b-31: dbang ma bskur ba de srid kyi bar du rdo
T02D2510-1:218b-32: rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2510-1:218b-33: rnams bsgrub pa'i skal ba dang ldan par gyur pa
T02D2510-1:218b-34: ma yin pas rgyu des na des rjes su gzung
T02D2510-1:218b-35: bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rab tu phye
T02D2510-1:218b-37: ci zhig bshad par bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:218b-38: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
T02D2510-1:218b-40: phyag rgya rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2510-1:218b-41: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog ste /
T02D2510-1:218b-42: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i tshul gyis dam par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:218b-43: dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2510-1:218b-44: rdo rje dbyibs dang 'dra bas na //
T02D2510-1:218b-46: sprul pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:219a-2: rdo rje dngos grub ces kyang grags shing bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:219a-4: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:219a-5: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyings su
T02D2510-1:219a-6: su mkhas pas srad bu bi bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:219a-7: thog mar sangs rgyas thugs bzhag ste /
T02D2510-1:219a-8: phyag rgya bzhi ni bri bar bya //
T02D2510-1:219a-9: zhes bya ba ni dang por bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2510-1:219a-10: par snang mdzad sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can dbus
T02D2510-1:219a-11: su bzhag la / mi bskyod pa'i gnas su satva
T02D2510-1:219a-12: bi dra zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems ma rin
T02D2510-1:219a-13: chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su ra tan badzri zhes
T02D2510-1:219a-14: bya bas rin chen sems ma /
T02D2510-1:219a-15: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su ni dha rnam badzri zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma /
T02D2510-1:219a-16: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su karmma badzri zhes
T02D2510-1:219a-17: bya bas rdo rje las mar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2510-1:219a-18: can legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:219a-20: phyag rgya bzhi ni bri bar bya //
T02D2510-1:219a-21: zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:219a-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2510-1:219a-23: rdo rje phyag rgya la sogs bri //
T02D2510-1:219a-25: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:219a-26: gang gi zhe na slob dpon rang nyid de rdo
T02D2510-1:219a-27: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i tshul
T02D2510-1:219a-28: gyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2510-1:219a-29: ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:219a-30: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2510-1:219a-31: bdag la byin gyis brlab la sogs //
T02D2510-1:219a-32: ji lta bar ni bka' nod do //
T02D2510-1:219a-33: de ltar bgyid nas bdag mi brjod //
T02D2510-1:219a-34: de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba //
T02D2510-1:219a-35: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa'i yis //
T02D2510-1:219a-36: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2510-1:219a-37: se gol mang po brdabs bgyis la //
T02D2510-1:219a-38: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02D2510-1:219a-39: de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni //
T02D2510-1:219a-40: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas //
T02D2510-1:219a-41: dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams //
T02D2510-1:219a-43: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D2510-1:219a-44: phyag rgya chen pos gom byed cing //
T02D2510-1:219a-45: ming rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2510-1:219a-46: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi'o //
T02D2510-1:219a-48: rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir /
T02D2510-1:219a-49: dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:219a-50: de bzhin du btsud de zhes bya ba ni phyag
T02D2510-1:219a-51: bzhi byed du bcug la sems ma rdo rje ma
T02D2510-1:219a-52: ji lta ba bzhin du 'ching du bcug ste de
T02D2510-1:219a-55: khyod kyis gsang ba'i le'u 'di su la'ang ma bstan
T02D2510-1:219a-56: cig ces bya ba ni gsang ba ni sngags te
T02D2510-1:219a-57: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
T02D2510-1:219b-0: dam tshig gi dngos grub bsdus @219b pa de ni
T02D2510-1:219b-2: rgya chen po la dga' ba dang /
T02D2510-1:219b-3: mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la khyed kyis brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D2510-1:219b-4: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ci'i phyir 'di bdag gis bstan par mi bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:219b-5: log par lta ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:219b-6: sems can 'di lta bu dag kyang yod do //
T02D2510-1:219b-9: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rnam par sprul pa la mi mos pa'o //
T02D2510-1:219b-10: ci'i phyir de log par lta ba yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:219b-11: gang gi phyir sdig pa'i las byed pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:219b-12: dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa las kyi
T02D2510-1:219b-13: sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu des na brtson 'grus chung
T02D2510-1:219b-14: ba'o // brtson 'grus chung ba nyid kyis na /
T02D2510-1:219b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pa dang /
T02D2510-1:219b-16: bsam pa dang bsgom pa la mngon par brtson pa
T02D2510-1:219b-17: med pa nyid kyis na rdo rje sems pa'i la
T02D2510-1:219b-18: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa yongs
T02D2510-1:219b-19: su mi shes pas de'i phyir ba med pa yin
T02D2510-1:219b-20: no // sbyor ba la mkhas kyang ri mo'i las mi shes pa yod de /
T02D2510-1:219b-21: de lta bu de dag ni rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhir mi 'jug ste /
T02D2510-1:219b-22: de dag gi don du 'du byin gyis brlabs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:219b-23: de bas na gzhan dag la bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D2510-1:219b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:219b-25: 'khor zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2510-1:219b-26: cad rdo rje sems dpa'i la sogs pa ni de
T02D2510-1:219b-27: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:219b-28: ro // de rnams kyi dam tshig tu gyur pa ni mi 'da' ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:219b-29: dam tshig ces bya ba ste dkyil 'khor 'di ni
T02D2510-1:219b-30: mi 'da' ba yin zhing de rnams 'di'i nang du
T02D2510-1:219b-31: 'dus pa de rnams kyi dam tshig tu gyur pa'o
T02D2510-1:219b-33: 'di bris pas rdo rje dbyibs pa sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bris par gyur pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:219b-34: gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'dir zhugs na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par gyur cing /
T02D2510-1:219b-35: 'dir dbang bskur na thams cad du dbang bskur ba yin zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2510-1:219b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam
T02D2510-1:219b-37: pa dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs zhes
T02D2510-1:219b-38: bya ba la / rdo rje ste sangs rgyas dang
T02D2510-1:219b-39: byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi dam pa yin pas
T02D2510-1:219b-40: bya ba la / na / rdo rje dam pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2510-1:220a-0: de'i dngos grub grub cing rdzogs pa de'i @220a * //
T02D2510-1:220a-1: rgyur byin gyis brlabs so zhes pa'o //
T02D2510-1:220a-2: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdo rje sems dpa'i la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D2510-1:220a-3: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de ni dngos
T02D2510-1:220a-4: grub thams cad kyi rgyu bshad ma thag pa dang
T02D2510-1:220a-5: / 'brel pa'i don 'di byin gyis brlabs shing /
T02D2510-1:220a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:220a-7: 'khor bsdu pa'i tshul gyis bstan par bya ba yin
T02D2510-1:220a-8: pas na khyed kyi tya che bas 'jigs shing sgra
T02D2510-1:220a-9: pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi
T02D2510-1:220a-10: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnam la
T02D2510-1:220a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang yin la rigs
T02D2510-1:220a-13: kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:220a-14: rigs so // de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:220a-15: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni rigs thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:220a-16: dngos grub gcig tu bsdus pa yin pas 'di ni
T02D2510-1:220a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub bsdus
T02D2510-1:220a-18: pa ste / gang gi phyir 'di dag dang ldan
T02D2510-1:220a-19: pa'i gsang ba la yid mi ches par mi bya
T02D2510-1:220a-20: zhing ma dad par ma byed cig / gzhan du
T02D2510-1:220a-21: na dad par bya ba nyid yin no zhes brjod
T02D2510-1:220a-22: pa ste / do // ma dad na nyes ba cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-1:220a-23: khyod sems can dmyal ba dang /
T02D2510-1:220a-25: yi dags kyi khams su ltung bar 'gyur ba'am zhes
T02D2510-1:220a-26: bya ba ma dad par gyur na dam pa'i chos
T02D2510-1:220a-28: de nas kyang dmyal ba la sogs par ltung zhing
T02D2510-1:220a-29: bde ba las nyams par 'gyur ro zhes ston pa
T02D2510-1:220a-30: yin no // mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus
T02D2510-1:220a-31: ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bya
T02D2510-1:220a-32: ba ni mi bde ba ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:220a-34: des rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i phyag rgya gcig kyang
T02D2510-1:220a-35: khas blang par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di khas len
T02D2510-1:220a-36: par mi byed pa ni mi bde ba'am yang ba
T02D2510-1:220a-37: ma spangs pa'o // khas ma blangs pa des tshe'i
T02D2510-1:220a-38: lhag ma yod du zin kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro
T02D2510-1:220a-39: ma spangs pa'o // // dkyil 'khor 'dir dam tshig dang /
T02D2510-1:220a-40: dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2510-1:220a-41: slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su gsungs
T02D2510-1:220a-42: pa'i dngos grub thams cad bslab par bya'o zhes bstan
T02D2510-1:220a-44: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:220a-45: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas /
T02D2510-1:220a-46: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02D2510-1:220b-0: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs @220b pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar ro //
T02D2510-1:220b-1: de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni dkyil 'khor bzhi las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:220b-2: de rnams kyi dam tshig ni gzhung lugs su gzhag pa 'da' bar mi bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:220b-3: smros shig ces bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:220b-4: bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi / zhes bya
T02D2510-1:220b-5: ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gang
T02D2510-1:220b-6: dang gang gi'o // phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa //
T02D2510-1:220b-7: zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:220b-8: 'khor bzhi las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po gang
T02D2510-1:220b-10: de'i bzlas pa badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba nas
T02D2510-1:220b-11: badzra a'a be sha zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos
T02D2510-1:220b-12: shing / don gyis ni zhes bya ba bshad ma
T02D2510-1:220b-13: thag pa'i badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-1:220b-14: pa sgra'i don ni snying po'i don te /
T02D2510-1:220b-15: snying po'i don des nying po'i don la lhag par
T02D2510-1:220b-16: mos pas badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2510-1:220b-17: pa'i snying po zlos shing phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o
T02D2510-1:220b-18: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:220b-19: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bsgrub par bya
T02D2510-1:220b-20: ba de dag kyang rang gi bdag nyid yin par
T02D2510-1:220b-21: bsgom gyi mdun du ni ma yin no zhes bstan
T02D2510-1:220b-23: der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D2510-1:220b-25: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-1:220b-26: ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni //

T02D2510-1:223b-32: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul des rab tu mnyam par
T02D2510-1:223b-33: bzhag pas sems rtse gcig tu bsdus te bsgom par
T02D2510-1:223b-34: bya'o // ci zhig bsgom par bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:223b-35: rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2510-1:223b-37: rdo rje phra mos nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T02D2510-1:223b-38: rdo rje phra mo ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:223b-39: gang zhig byed cing bsgom zhe na /
T02D2510-1:223b-40: rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2510-1:224a-2: ting nge 'dzin dbang du byed cing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:224a-3: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:224a-4: snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la
T02D2510-1:224a-5: sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi snying po rnams kyis rang
T02D2510-1:224a-6: gi snying gar chos kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la rdo
T02D2510-1:224a-7: rje phra mo'i tshul gyis rang gi snying gnas bton
T02D2510-1:224a-8: te / sna'i rtse mor bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:224a-9: de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags
T02D2510-1:224a-10: kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa bkod la
T02D2510-1:224a-11: / snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid chos kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:224a-12: 'khor yin no zhes chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nga
T02D2510-1:224a-13: rgyal ji lta ba bzhin du bskyed la chos kyi
T02D2510-1:224a-14: dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags
T02D2510-1:224a-15: zlos shing zla ba gnyis kyi bar du nyin re
T02D2510-1:224a-16: zhing chos kyi 'khor lo sna rtser bsgom par bya'o
T02D2510-1:224a-17: / // bsgoms pas dub na sna bu gnas rang gi snying gar bcug la /
T02D2510-1:224a-18: badzri dri dha ti shat zhes bya bas brtan par bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:224a-19: / de yang zla ba gcig rtsam spro ba dang bsdu ba'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:224a-20: de lta bus ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:224a-21: de ltar chos kyi dkyil 'khor grub par byed pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya gsungs nas /
T02D2510-1:224a-22: da ni las kyi dkyil 'khor sgrub par byed pa yang brtan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:224a-23: rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la //
T02D2510-1:224a-24: de gnyis rdo rje dam du bzung //
T02D2510-1:224a-25: mdzub mo mthe chung bsnol ba ni //
T02D2510-1:224a-26: rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:224a-28: de la rdo rje'i phyag gnyis ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis te de bcings la gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:224a-29: ci zhig gzung bar bya zhe na /
T02D2510-1:224a-30: rdo rje ste sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2510-1:224a-31: de yang de gnyis dang 'brel pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe 'u chung bsnol ba ste /
T02D2510-1:224a-32: mdzub mo gnyis bcings pa dang /
T02D2510-1:224a-33: mthe'u chung gnyis bcings pas dam du gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:224a-34: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:224a-35: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la mdun du phyogs par sbyar te /
T02D2510-1:224a-36: rang rang gi mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung mdud pas
T02D2510-1:224a-37: sna tshogs rdo rje gzung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:224a-38: chen po las gsungs pa'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2510-1:224a-39: sngags kyis sna tshogs rdo rje gzung par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:224b-0: de ltar sna tshogs rdo rje thogs @224b pa ni
T02D2510-1:224b-1: rdo rje dgos mchog gi dkyil du las kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:224b-2: 'khor bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma yin no zhes bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:224b-3: don to // 'di yang snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po bskyed la /
T02D2510-1:224b-4: sngar bshad pa'i rigs kyi snying po lngas rang gi snying gar la skyi dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02D2510-1:224b-5: las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams
T02D2510-1:224b-6: kyis lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dgod pa
T02D2510-1:224b-7: byas na tshig thams cad rjes su spyad de bdag
T02D2510-1:224b-8: nyid la ni ma las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang
T02D2510-1:224b-9: bzhin yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed la nyin re
T02D2510-1:224b-10: zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa thams cad khri
T02D2510-1:224b-11: khri bzla bar bya ba ste /
T02D2510-1:224b-12: de lta bus ni las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:224b-13: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2510-1:224b-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos
T02D2510-1:224b-15: grub rnams ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-1:224b-16: po'i phyag rgya bzhis rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor rdo
T02D2510-1:224b-17: rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa
T02D2510-1:224b-18: nyid kyis byas la bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs te
T02D2510-1:224b-19: / ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:224b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs
T02D2510-1:224b-21: pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:224b-23: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa nas rdo rje
T02D2510-1:224b-24: 'bebs pa'i bar de rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2510-1:224b-25: la sogs pa'o // de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen
T02D2510-1:224b-26: po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag
T02D2510-1:224b-28: dam tshig dang chos dang las kyi phyag rgya chen po yin pas /
T02D2510-1:224b-29: phyag rgya yang yin la chen po yang yin pa'i phyir phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2510-1:224b-30: de rnams kyi bcing ba bzhi po bslab pa ni bstan pa ste /
T02D2510-1:224b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing pa'i mtshan nyid //
T02D2510-1:224b-32: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa nyid brtan par bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:224b-33: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga
T02D2510-1:224b-34: rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:224b-35: ni / de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing rdo rje bstod pa'i glu blangs nas /
T02D2510-1:224b-36: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o //
T02D2510-1:224b-37: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:224b-38: badzra satva mu: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi cho ga bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:225a-0: rdo rje'i dngos grub ni bcom ldan 'das @225a * //
T02D2510-1:225a-2: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems ma
T02D2510-1:225a-3: la sogs pa rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dang bcas
T02D2510-1:225a-4: par bri ba ji lta ba bzhin du ste /
T02D2510-1:225a-5: de bzhin du mi g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D2510-1:225a-6: pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings
T02D2510-1:225a-7: kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor bris
T02D2510-1:225a-8: la / dbus su rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas
T02D2510-1:225a-9: su glang po che'i gdan la badzra dh'a tu zhes
T02D2510-1:225a-10: bya bas mi bskyod pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:225a-11: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2510-1:225a-12: steng du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo
T02D2510-1:225a-14: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rdo rje rgyal po'i lcags kyu /
T02D2510-1:225a-15: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su rdo rje chags pa'i mda' dang gzhu /
T02D2510-1:225a-16: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das
T02D2510-1:225a-17: rdo rje legs pa'i mgu pa'i phyag rgya badzra tva
T02D2510-1:225a-19: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rigs kyi snying po zlos shing bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:225a-20: mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-1:225a-21: dbus su ri'i khri la rin chen 'byung lnga /
T02D2510-1:225a-22: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su la ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bcom ldan 'das dro rje rin chen //
T02D2510-1:225a-23: rin chen 'byung lags kyi gnas su rdo rje zi brjid kyi nyi ma'i phyag rgya /
T02D2510-1:225a-24: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su dpal gyi rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya /
T02D2510-1:225a-25: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su bzhad pa'i so'i
T02D2510-1:225a-26: phreng ba rdo rje gnyis kyi bar du chud pa
T02D2510-1:225a-27: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang
T02D2510-1:225a-28: gi snying po'am / rigs kyi snying pos bri bar bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:225a-29: / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-1:225a-30: dbus su rma bya'i gdan la bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa /
T02D2510-1:225a-31: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su rdo rje chos kyi padma'i phyag rgya /
T02D2510-1:225a-32: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su rnon po'i phyag rgya /
T02D2510-1:225a-33: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su rgyu'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya /
T02D2510-1:225a-34: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su smra ba lce'i
T02D2510-1:225a-35: phyag rgya rang gi snying po'am rigs kyi snying pos
T02D2510-1:225a-36: bri bar bya'o // 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2510-1:225b-0: dbus su nam mkha' lding gi gdan gyi steng du bcom ldan @225b 'das don yod par grub pa'o //
T02D2510-1:225b-1: mi bskyod pa'i gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D2510-1:225b-2: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su go cha /
T02D2510-1:225b-3: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su mche ba gnyis /
T02D2510-1:225b-4: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su khu chur gyi phyag rgya sngar bshad pa'i rang gi snying po'am //
T02D2510-1:225b-5: rigs kyi snying pos bris bar bya ste /
T02D2510-1:225b-6: 'di ni don yod par grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:225b-7: 'di dag kyang rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:225b-8: dngos grub thams cad kyi kyang 'grub bo //
T02D2510-1:225b-9: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag
T02D2510-1:225b-10: rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dngos grub gang gsungs pa
T02D2510-1:225b-11: / de thams cad mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:225b-14: don yod par grub pa'i phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:225b-15: du yang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha
T02D2510-1:225b-16: tshigs // de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2510-1:225b-17: ni phyi'o yo byad med par shin tu sbyangs pa
T02D2510-1:225b-19: de ltar zhes bya ba ni sa la ji lta ba bzhin du ras dang /
T02D2510-1:225b-21: nam mkha' dang gnas thams cad du mngon par bris pa rnams so //
T02D2510-1:225b-22: dngos grub thams cad 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:225b-23: sgrub pa po spro ba bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:225b-24: dus nges pa'i 'bras bu gsungs pa ni /
T02D2510-1:225b-25: dkyil 'khor rtag pa nas brtsams te //
T02D2510-1:225b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:225b-27: de la dkyil 'khor rtag pa ni kun du bris pa ste /
T02D2510-1:225b-28: dkyil 'khor bris pa de nas brtsams shing de nas mgo bzung nas so //
T02D2510-1:225b-29: la la ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid
T02D2510-1:225b-30: kyi tshe zhes bya ba la 'jug pa'i rjes thogs
T02D2510-1:225b-32: la la ni nyin zhag gcig gis zhes bya ba ni nyin mtshan gcig gis so //
T02D2510-1:225b-33: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang zhes bya ba /
T02D2510-1:225b-34: pha dang ma dang dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:225b-35: dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang /
T02D2510-1:225b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi kyis khrag phyung ba byas pa spang ngo //
T02D2510-1:225b-37: 'di sa ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:225b-38: sdig pa chen po byed pa rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos //
T02D2510-1:225b-39: de bas na thams cad bsgrub pa la 'bad par bya'i //
T02D2510-1:225b-40: bdag ni sdig pa byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:226a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bdag nyid la brnyas par mi bya'o //
T02D2510-1:226a-3: ji ltar 'dod par zhes bya ba ni dus ji
T02D2510-1:226a-4: tsam bsgom par nus par gyur pa'i dus de srid
T02D2510-1:226a-5: du byed pa'o // bde blag tu zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:226a-6: ni bya ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i bsdams pa'i sdug
T02D2510-1:226a-8: rnal 'byor dang rjes su mthun pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa bsten pas so //
T02D2510-1:226a-10: dka' thub dka' spyad mi bzad pas //
T02D2510-1:226a-11: lus skabs 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal la //
T02D2510-1:226a-12: sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g-yeng ba //
T02D2510-1:226a-13: rnal 'byor la ni sbyor ba mi 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:226a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:226a-15: don thams cad byed cing zhes bya ba ni sgrub
T02D2510-1:226a-16: pa'i yan lag thams cad ni don dam thams cad
T02D2510-1:226a-17: de / de rnams rgyun mi 'chad par nyams su len pa'o //
T02D2510-1:226a-18: de yang gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gang
T02D2510-1:226a-19: zhig ji skad du gsungs pa'i chog mi byed pa
T02D2510-1:226a-20: de ni dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2510-1:226a-22: thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang //
T02D2510-1:226a-23: zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyang yin la rjes
T02D2510-1:226a-24: su dga' ba yang yin pas na thams cad rjes
T02D2510-1:226a-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bsgom pa'am /
T02D2510-1:226a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad bsgom pa ni /
T02D2510-1:226a-29: re ba thams cad de sogs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:226a-30: thams cad rjes su dga' ba'i ro dang /
T02D2510-1:226a-32: spyod lam thams cad las bde ba gang zhig skyes
T02D2510-1:226a-33: pa de ni thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang
T02D2510-1:226a-36: spyod lam thams cad kyi bde ba'o //
T02D2510-1:226a-37: de rnams nyams su myong ba ni nyams su tshor ba'o //
T02D2510-1:226a-38: lo gcig gis ni mchog grub po //
T02D2510-1:226a-39: zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D2510-1:226a-40: dpa'i gnas rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das
T02D2510-1:226a-41: kyis gsungs so // phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D2510-1:226a-43: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2510-1:226a-44: sems can mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:226a-45: rdo rje dbyings kyi dum bu las gsungs pa'i dngos
T02D2510-1:226b-0: grub @226b thams cad bsdus par gyur pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:226b-1: gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:226b-2: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-1:226b-3: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:226b-4: de la yang dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:226b-5: ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las
T02D2510-1:226b-6: gsungs ba nyid yin par gzung ngo //
T02D2510-1:226b-7: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'i
T02D2510-1:226b-8: dkyil 'khor la ltos nas yang zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2510-1:226b-9: to // de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams
T02D2510-1:226b-10: cad kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:226b-11: to // de / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2510-1:226b-12: kyi rtul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang
T02D2510-1:226b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2510-1:226b-14: de rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:226b-15: de'i dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2510-1:226b-16: de la dmigs pa de rdo rje ltar mi phyed
T02D2510-1:226b-17: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la mi 'di nyid ces
T02D2510-1:226b-18: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs
T02D2510-1:226b-19: pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i
T02D2510-1:226b-20: rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:226b-21: tha tshig go // 'di zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa ste /
T02D2510-1:226b-22: phyung ngo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:226b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen
T02D2510-1:226b-24: po de'i mngon par rtogs pa ni thugs su chud
T02D2510-1:226b-25: pa ste / ming de skad ces bya ba'i de
T02D2510-1:226b-26: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
T02D2510-1:226b-27: mngon par rtogs pa ston par byed pa'i de bzhin
T02D2510-1:226b-28: gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gang yin pa
T02D2510-1:226b-29: der rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ba ni badzra
T02D2510-1:226b-30: sa tva zhes bya ba ston pa'o //
T02D2510-1:226b-31: gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag
T02D2510-1:226b-32: rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces
T02D2510-1:226b-33: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa bstan pa yin
T02D2510-1:226b-34: no // de nas bsdu ba byas nas las kyi
T02D2510-1:226b-35: mchog de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba

T02D2510-1:227b-30: ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /

T02D2510-1:227b-34: dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa gang yin
T02D2510-1:227b-35: pa de ni dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs
T02D2510-1:227b-36: pa ste / rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings pa dang /
T02D2510-1:227b-38: dbang du bya ba nas brtsams te /

T02D2510-1:227b-45: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2510-1:227b-46: zhes bya ba sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:228a-1: pa thams cad kyi dngos grub ni rdo rje sems dpa' grub pa ste /
T02D2510-1:228a-2: de'i ye shes ni phyag rgya chen por nges pa'i tshul te /
T02D2510-1:228a-3: de bskyed par bya ba ni bslab pa bya zhing
T02D2510-1:228a-4: nye bar bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2510-1:228a-5: go // de la dang po kho nar mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:228a-6: 'di ni khyod kyi zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:228a-7: dam tshig ma mthong ba zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'o //
T02D2510-1:228a-8: khong du ma chud pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par mi mkhas pa ste /
T02D2510-1:228a-9: gsang ba de rnams kyi skal ba dang mi ldan
T02D2510-1:228a-10: zhing phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig
T02D2510-1:228a-11: dang dbang bskur ba ma thob pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2510-1:228a-12: gsang ba 'di zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:228a-14: zhes 'og nas bshad pa gang yin pa de lta bu de ni /
T02D2510-1:228a-15: skye bo thams cad la bstan du mi rung bas gsang ba yin no //
T02D2510-1:228a-16: de la gsang ba 'di smras na nyes pa cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-1:228a-17: khyod ngan song thams cad du ltung ba'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:228a-18: khyod shi nas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /

T02D2510-1:228a-34: phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung nas //

T02D2510-1:228b-2: dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o zhes

T02D2510-1:228b-4: // de rnams gang gis yongs su bzung zhing bcings
T02D2510-1:228b-5: pa de ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su bzung

T02D2510-1:228b-10: 'di'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /

T02D2510-1:228b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2510-1:228b-13: de'i phyag rgya chen po dang /

T02D2510-1:228b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid bsgoms na /

T02D2510-1:228b-22: don 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes rab tu bstan pa'i

T02D2510-1:228b-35: ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /

T02D2510-1:228b-44: kyang ni ma byed cig ces bya ba yin te
T02D2510-1:229a-0: / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @229a * //

T02D2510-1:229a-6: bar ma byed cig ces pa ste de spangs pa
T02D2510-1:229a-7: ni nyan thogs dang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba
T02D2510-1:229a-8: ma yin no zhes ston pa yin no //

T02D2510-1:229a-11: slob dpon gyi slob ma rnams kyi nyan thos dang
T02D2510-1:229a-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D2510-1:229a-13: sems dang bral ba'i bsam pas sngags 'di gdon par
T02D2510-1:229a-14: bya'o // de nas mna'i snying po sbyin no zhes
T02D2510-1:229a-15: bya ba ni khyed kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma
T02D2510-1:229a-16: mthong ba la smra bar ma byed cig / dam
T02D2510-1:229a-17: tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02D2510-1:229a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2510-1:229a-19: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
T02D2510-1:229a-20: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2510-1:229a-21: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02D2510-1:229a-23: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'i rigs thams
T02D2510-1:229a-24: cad kyi dkyil 'khor du byang chub kyi sems yongs

T02D2510-1:229a-28: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ji
T02D2510-1:229a-29: skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams ni rdo rje

T02D2510-1:229a-31: gi lha'i rnal 'byor du byin gyis brlabs nas bsgrub

T02D2510-1:229a-40: ji ltar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2510-1:229a-41: phyag rgya bzhis 'grub par 'gyur ba 'dir yang de

T02D2510-1:229a-46: ba de bzhin du ras ris la sogs pa brtags

T02D2510-1:229b-17: slob dpon gyis rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2510-1:229b-18: rje sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya bas mnyes
T02D2510-1:229b-19: par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D2510-1:229b-21: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas zhes
T02D2510-1:229b-22: bya ba la yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni slar
T02D2510-1:229b-23: yang zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2510-1:229b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo ni
T02D2510-1:229b-27: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i
T02D2510-1:229b-28: phyir ro // de nyid kyis na byang chub kyi sems chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2510-1:229b-29: stong pa nyid ston par byed pa'i rdo rje rtse
T02D2510-1:229b-30: lnga de'i phyag na mnga' bas na phyag na rdo
T02D2510-1:229b-31: rje chen po'o // de la rdo rje dgyes pa'i
T02D2510-1:229b-32: legs so zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya snying po 'di
T02D2510-1:229b-33: zhes bya ba thugs la gnas pas so //

T02D2510-1:241b-41: kyis mnyes par byed pa'i bar du byas pa dang
T02D2510-1:241b-42: / de ltar dam tshig gis bcings te /
T02D2510-1:242a-0: da bzhin du thams cad byas @242a * //

T02D2510-1:242a-6: nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
T02D2510-1:242a-8: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:242a-9: kun du bzang zhing sdig med de //

T02D2510-1:242a-12: 'di nyis la rab tu gcod pa med pas na sdig med pa'o //
T02D2510-1:242a-13: ngo mtshar ba ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:242a-14: gang zhig sems can 'dul don du //
T02D2510-1:242a-16: gang gi phyir ma rungs shing gdug pa'i sems can 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:242a-18: mi mdzes pa'i khro bo'i gzugs kyis so //
T02D2510-1:242a-21: yid du 'ong ba dang 'dod par gyur pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:242a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:242a-23: mi bskyod pa'i gnas na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du phyogs pas gnas pa'o //

T02D2510-1:242a-25: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur bas bka'
T02D2510-1:242a-26: nod cing bzhugs pa yin la /

T02D2510-1:242a-28: de'i don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:242a-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin
T02D2510-1:242a-30: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i bcom ldan
T02D2510-1:242a-31: 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:242a-32: dang / sngags kyi rdo rje rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi skur mdzad nas /
T02D2510-1:242a-33: de nyid kyis de la rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D2510-1:242a-34: des na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:242a-35: kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa byang

T02D2510-1:242a-39: de nas rang gi ngo bor byas nas spyan drangs te /
T02D2510-1:242a-40: rnam par snang mdzad nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar
T02D2510-1:242a-41: thug gi bar du gnas pa rnams la rnam par
T02D2510-1:242b-0: snang mdzad @242b la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-1:242b-1: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i gzugs kyis khams
T02D2510-1:242b-2: gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la
T02D2510-1:242b-3: / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa rab tu bcug ste /
T02D2510-1:242b-4: aom badzra dzv'a la aagne pra ti pa ta la
T02D2510-1:242b-5: a'a karsha ya sarbba ta th'a ga ta ta na

T02D2510-1:242b-7: aom badzra a'a be sha ya sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba'i bar gyi sngags dang /
T02D2510-1:242b-8: skal ba bzang po rnams ni rang gi rig pas gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:242b-9: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes ji skad du

T02D2510-1:242b-11: pa'i tshul gyis dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje h'um
T02D2510-1:242b-12: mdzad kyi sku gcig tu gyur nas ;
T02D2510-1:242b-13: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku rdzogs par mdzad de /
T02D2510-1:242b-14: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la phyogs bcu na
T02D2510-1:242b-15: gnas pa rnams bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2510-1:242b-16: byung nas / rang rang gi gnas la gnas te /
T02D2510-1:242b-17: 'jig rten gsum bkug nas bka' bsgo ba mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:242b-18: da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D2510-1:242b-19: bka' bsgo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par mdzad pa de ni /
T02D2510-1:242b-20: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:242b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig khams gsum pa la bka' stsal nas /
T02D2510-1:242b-22: khro bo takkis 'gugs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:242b-23: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khams gsum pa bkug nas /
T02D2510-1:242b-24: bka' bsgo ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te /
T02D2510-1:242b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dam tshig gis 'gugs
T02D2510-1:242b-26: pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2510-1:242b-27: snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad de /
T02D2510-1:242b-28: khro bo takki bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:242b-29: de'i phrin las rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:242b-30: thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:242b-31: snyoms par zhugs nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2510-1:242b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-1:242b-33: 'di nyid ces bya ba'i thugs la gnas pa'o //

T02D2510-1:242b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu ni khro bo takki'o //
T02D2510-1:242b-36: de zhes bya ba ni yang gi sgra gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:243a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin @243a * //
T02D2510-1:243a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang /
T02D2510-1:243a-2: rang gi thugs kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje ye shes
T02D2510-1:243a-3: las khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po nges par skyed
T02D2510-1:243a-4: par mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:243a-5: phyung ba ni 'byin par mdzad pa'o //

T02D2510-1:243a-7: bskor zhing gnas pa rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas 'khod par gyur to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:243a-8: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:243a-11: sa steng gi 'jig rten gsum yin pas 'jig rten gsum mo //
T02D2510-1:243a-12: 'jig rten gsum po nyid 'jig rten gsum ste /
T02D2510-1:243a-13: 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-1:243a-14: chu lha'i mthar thug pa de thams cad 'jig rten
T02D2510-1:243a-15: pa thams cad kyi cha byad can gyi tshogs kyis
T02D2510-1:243a-16: bskor bas zhes bya ba ni grong dang /
T02D2510-1:243a-19: pho brang na gnas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i skye bo
T02D2510-1:243a-20: de dag thams cad kyi cha byad 'dzin pa ni
T02D2510-1:243a-22: tshogs ni de dag gi bdag po dang /
T02D2510-1:243a-23: 'khor rnams 'jig rten pa'i cha byad kyi tshogs so //
T02D2510-1:243a-24: bskor ba ni gnas dang bcas pa yongs su bskor zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:243a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:243a-26: bshad ma thag pa bka' bsgo ba de nyid kyi gzugs ni zhal bzhi pa dang /
T02D2510-1:243a-27: phyag brgyad pa sangs rgyas kyi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D2510-1:243a-28: khro bo 'dod pa'i rgyal po rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs can /
T02D2510-1:243a-29: rang gi thugs kar bsnams pa'i rdo rje gsor ba
T02D2510-1:243a-30: gang yin pa de rang gi snying gar 'degs pa'i
T02D2510-1:243a-31: tshul gyis bsnams pa de snying gar yang yang 'phen
T02D2510-1:243a-32: zhing 'dzin pa'o // khams gsum pa ji snyed pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:243a-33: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo
T02D2510-1:243a-34: ri rab ri'i rtse mo gang na ba der bkug
T02D2510-1:243a-35: pa der gzigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:243a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yang nyon
T02D2510-1:243a-38: cig ces bya ba de nyid gsungs pa bka' nyon
T02D2510-1:243a-39: cig ces bya ba ni nan tan du bya ba'o

T02D2510-1:243b-0: @243b 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po zhes bya ba ni 'byung bas na 'byung po ste /

T02D2510-1:243b-7: mi nyan no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:243b-8: chen po yang yin la gtum zhing khro ba yang
T02D2510-1:243b-9: yin pas na khro zhing gtum pa chen po ste

T02D2510-1:243b-13: 'bar ba yin la chen po yin pas na 'bar ba chen po ste nam mkha' khyab pa'o //

T02D2510-1:243b-15: dgod pas na dgong pa ste /

T02D2510-1:243b-17: ma rungs pa chen pos rtag tu dgong pa'o //
T02D2510-1:243b-18: kye lus srul po'o zhes bya ba ni mi'i sha za ba la sogs pa'i ro langs so //
T02D2510-1:243b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ni thugs rje chen po'o //

T02D2510-1:243b-21: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig ni rdo rje yang yin la chen po yang de yin pas na /
T02D2510-1:243b-22: rdo rje chen po de'i dam tshig ste /
T02D2510-1:243b-23: rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig go //

T02D2510-1:244a-2: 'di nyid rgyu yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab bo //

T02D2510-1:244a-4: gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar byed pas na bka' bzhin byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:244a-5: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa rnams la sngar bskyed pas na /
T02D2510-1:244a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thu bo'o //
T02D2510-1:244a-7: sems can thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:244a-8: gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can thams cad 'dul bas na 'dul byed do //
T02D2510-1:244a-9: lam ngan pa las bzlog nas lam bzang po la
T02D2510-1:244a-10: rab tu 'jog pa'i 'bras bu de nyid kyi rgyu
T02D2510-1:244a-11: de las bzlog pa'i dngos po ni sems can thams
T02D2510-1:244a-12: cad gdul bar bya ba'i don gyi phyir ro //

T02D2510-1:244a-14: sdig pa can gyi sems can rnams sbyang ba'i phyir
T02D2510-1:244a-15: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang zhes sdang dang
T02D2510-1:244a-16: gti mug med par snga nas mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis
T02D2510-1:244a-17: sdig pa rnams yongs su spangs shing zad pa yin
T02D2510-1:244a-18: no // de ltar khyab 'jug la sogs pa'i 'jig
T02D2510-1:244a-19: rten pa rnams gdul ba'i phyir 'khor la bka' stsal

T02D2510-1:244a-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:244a-22: dbang phyug chen po de gso bar bka' stsal pa de'i rjes su 'jug pa dang /
T02D2510-1:244a-23: yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir zhabs 'og tu dgug pa
T02D2510-1:244a-24: gsungs pa ni rkang pas dgug pa'i khro bo'i phyag
T02D2510-1:244a-25: na lcags kyu yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:244a-26: da ni de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:244a-27: dbang phyug chen po yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2510-1:244a-28: tshar gcod par bka' stsal pa dang /
T02D2510-1:244a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la
T02D2510-1:244a-31: thugs rje chen po bskyed de zhes bya ba la

T02D2510-1:244a-34: sdug bsngal kun zhi ba dang /
T02D2510-1:244a-35: bla na med pa'i bde ba dang /
T02D2510-1:244a-36: yid bde ba myong bar byas nas /
T02D2510-1:244a-37: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob pa ni /

T02D2510-1:244a-39: de la bla na med pa'i dngos grub ni sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:244a-40: de'i don du dbang bskur ba ni bla na med pa grub pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2510-1:244a-41: ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2510-1:244b-0: mtshan ma med pa dang @244b smon pa med pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:244b-1: rnam par thar pa ni brgyad do //
T02D2510-1:244b-2: gzungs ni tshig dang don rtog pa dang sngags so //
T02D2510-1:244b-3: ye shes ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:244b-4: mngon par shes pa drug go //
T02D2510-1:244b-5: bla na med pa'i grub pa'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:244b-10: rnam par shes pa ni bla na med pa bsgrub
T02D2510-1:244b-11: pa'i dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par
T02D2510-1:244b-12: thar pa'i gzungs kyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes
T02D2510-1:244b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to //
T02D2510-1:244b-15: de nas zhes bya ba ni dbang phyug chen po
T02D2510-1:244b-16: la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis reg par gyur
T02D2510-1:244b-18: lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i
T02D2510-1:244b-19: zhags kyi mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:244b-20: thams cad dang 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D2510-1:244b-22: rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste /
T02D2510-1:244b-23: ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:244b-24: gzungs ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:244b-25: rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:244b-26: myong ste zhes bya ba ni mngon sum brjod do //
T02D2510-1:244b-27: bcing ba byas zhes bya ba ni brjod te mi zad pa dang 'jig pas na yi ge'o //
T02D2510-1:244b-28: de'i tshig gis de la nas byang chub sems dpar
T02D2510-1:244b-29: gyur pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T02D2510-1:244b-30: tu sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched
T02D2510-1:244b-31: du brjod do // ae ma'o zhes bya ba ni ngo mtshar pa'o //
T02D2510-1:244b-32: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir gyi don to //
T02D2510-1:244b-33: ngo mtshar ba gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:244b-34: sangs rgyas ye shes ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes so //
T02D2510-1:244b-36: bla na med pas na bla na mad pa'o //

T02D2510-1:244b-39: yi ge'i tshig gis mnan nas su //

T02D2510-1:244b-41: de'i tshig gis de la mnan pa ni phyag na

T02D2510-1:244b-43: sangs rgyas su gzhag pa de ni 'dir ngo mtshar

T02D2510-1:245a-1: rtog pa thams cad bcom nas gdul bar bya ba

T02D2510-1:245a-8: 'khor du bcug nas dbang bskur zhing bka' stsal pa

T02D2510-1:245a-14: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //

T02D2510-1:245a-29: lag tu bab ces bya ba ni lag pa gnyis la bab pa ste /
T02D2510-1:245a-30: dbab pa ni snga ma bzhin no //

T02D2510-1:245a-32: gas thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu bcug
