T02D2510-1:245b-7: gsum pa la sogs pa dang /

T02D2510-1:245b-14: gsal bar bshad par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2510-1:245b-26: sbrang rtsir byed pa ni dpyid do //

T02D2510-1:245b-44: dbyug pa 'dzin ma ni spen pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:245b-45: skye ba 'phrogs ma ni mig dmar gyi'o //

T02D2510-1:245b-47: za ba ma ni dpyid kyi'o //

T02D2510-1:245b-50: zhi ba ma ni nor sbyin gyi'o //

T02D2510-1:246a-0: @246a * // sna chen ma ni log 'dren gyi'o //

T02D2510-1:246a-4: ba ni lha rang gi phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes
T02D2510-1:246a-5: so // rdo rje dam tshig ma'i snying po 'di
T02D2510-1:246a-6: sbyin no zhes bya ba ni las mi phyed cing

T02D2510-1:246a-8: rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //

T02D2510-1:246a-20: aom ha na sa ma ya h'um phat /

T02D2510-1:246a-40: te / lha rnams 'gugs pa dang lha rnams kyi
T02D2510-1:246a-41: sems dbang du byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig
T02D2510-1:246a-42: te / go // rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te //

T02D2510-1:247a-25: snying ga'i phyogs su yongs su bskor la /
T02D2510-1:247a-26: lcags kyu'i rtse mo gnyis rang gi snying gar bzhag ste ;

T02D2510-1:247b-24: bcas pas gar byed pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D2510-1:247b-25: sgra bton nas mchongs rgal ba ste gar byed cing
T02D2510-1:247b-26: mchongs rgal zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:247b-28: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams 'gugs pa la sogs pa gsungs nas /
T02D2510-1:247b-29: da ni rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dgug par bka' stsal nas /
T02D2510-1:247b-31: gzhom pa ni de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
T02D2510-1:247b-32: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D2510-1:247b-33: yin no // rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad
T02D2510-1:247b-34: dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:247b-35: ni rims la sogs pa thams cad 'gugs pa ni
T02D2510-1:247b-36: yin no // / bcom ldan 'das spyi ba'i gtsug
T02D2510-1:247b-37: tor gzhon nu ma spyan gsum ma rtse gsum pa
T02D2510-1:247b-38: yin no // / dang / lcags kyu phyag na
T02D2510-1:247b-39: bsnams pa de'i snying po gsungs pa ni brjod pa'o
T02D2510-1:247b-40: yin no // / dang / / snying po gsungs pa'i rjes thogs la /
T02D2510-1:247b-41: bcom ldan 'das spyi gtsug nas phyung nas /
T02D2510-1:247b-42: rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyi gnas su song ste /
T02D2510-1:248a-1: des bkug nas ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje
T02D2510-1:248a-2: nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu
T02D2510-1:248a-3: brtsegs pa'i phyi rol du de yis bskor zhing 'khod
T02D2510-1:248a-4: do // bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang
T02D2510-1:248a-5: gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes
T02D2510-1:248a-6: kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs pa ni rims
T02D2510-1:248a-7: la sogs pa'i nad kyis zin pa'i sems can rnams
T02D2510-1:248a-8: kyi bdag nyid kyi las ni rang gi las te
T02D2510-1:248a-9: do // / gang gis de dag rims la sogs pas gzir bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-1:248a-10: de rnam par dag par gyur pa ni yongs su zad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:248a-11: de shes pa ni las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes de nges pa'o //
T02D2510-1:248a-12: de rims la sogs pa'i nad kyis gzungs ba rnams la /
T02D2510-1:248a-13: spyi bo nas brtsams nas rkang mthil gyi bar du spyi gtsug gi phyag rgya bsgoms pas /
T02D2510-1:248a-14: rims dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes dgongs nas /
T02D2510-1:248a-15: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de'i snying po gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:248a-16: rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te /
T02D2510-1:248a-17: mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang ;
T02D2510-1:248a-18: / mthe bo mnyam ste sbyar nas ni //
T02D2510-1:248a-20: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo dam du sbyar te /
T02D2510-1:248a-21: mdzub mo gnyis bkug nas mthe bong nyis gdong sbyar ba byas nas /
T02D2510-1:248a-22: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2510-1:248a-24: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khro bo spyi gtsug
T02D2510-1:248a-25: gis gang bar bsams shing sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis
T02D2510-1:248a-26: bya bas pas myongs bar nges pa'i las kyi nad
T02D2510-1:248a-28: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2510-1:248a-29: aom badzra karma bi sho dha ya /
T02D2510-1:248a-30: sarba a'a pa ra na shuddha /
T02D2510-1:248a-31: saddhe nas ma ya h'um / zhes bya ba'i sngags 'bum bzlas pa'am /
T02D2510-1:248a-32: stong phrag bcu bzlas pas 'grub bo //
T02D2510-1:248a-33: de ltar rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-1:248a-34: bka' bsgo ba la sogs pa gsungs nas /
T02D2510-1:248a-35: da ni ngan song gsum dgug pa'i phyir bka' bsgo
T02D2510-1:248a-36: ba dang de dgug cing rnam par sbyang ba ni
T02D2510-1:248a-37: / de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2510-1:248a-40: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:248a-41: de la sgrib pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'o //
T02D2510-1:248a-42: chod pa ni 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /
T02D2510-1:248b-1: las kyi sgrib pa ni mtshams med pa lnga dang /
T02D2510-1:248b-2: dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa myong bar nges pa'i las rnams te /
T02D2510-1:248b-5: las kyi sgrib pa de dag thams cad rnam par sbyong ba dang /
T02D2510-1:248b-6: yongs su zad pa'i slad du'o //
T02D2510-1:248b-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas bdag nyid de
T02D2510-1:248b-8: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pas
T02D2510-1:248b-9: bsgrubs nas / rdo rje bcings ba dam byas nas //
T02D2510-1:248b-10: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su //
T02D2510-1:248b-11: tha ma bzhi yi rtse mo sbyar //
T02D2510-1:248b-12: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02D2510-1:248b-14: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung
T02D2510-1:248b-15: gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar nas phan tshun yang dang
T02D2510-1:248b-16: 'dral ba ni sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya ste
T02D2510-1:248b-17: / sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i phyag rgya 'di
T02D2510-1:248b-18: bcings pas ngan song gi 'khor lo thams cad bcom
T02D2510-1:248b-19: / pa yin no // ngan song gi sems can de yang tshe 'phos nas /
T02D2510-1:248b-20: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du /
T02D2510-1:248b-21: byang chub sems dpar gyur nas /
T02D2510-1:248b-22: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi
T02D2510-1:248b-23: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra mo
T02D2510-1:248b-24: thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2510-1:248b-25: sems dpas yongs su gang zhing /
T02D2510-1:248b-26: rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin lag mthil
T02D2510-1:248b-27: ltar mnyam pas ri rab la sogs pa'i snang ba
T02D2510-1:248b-28: dang bral zhing stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D2510-1:248b-29: dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:248b-30: du gyur te / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-1:248b-31: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi lha'i 'od zer gyi
T02D2510-1:248b-32: snang bas nyi ma dang zla ba yang mi mngon
T02D2510-1:248b-33: par gyur nas / 'gro ba lnga'i snang ba yang nub nas /
T02D2510-1:248b-34: rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D2510-1:248b-35: kyi sgras nam mkha'i khams gang bar gyur to zhes
T02D2510-1:248b-36: bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i rgyud rnams las
T02D2510-1:248b-37: shes par bya'o // gzhung 'di tsam gyis ni khro
T02D2510-1:248b-38: bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:248b-39: ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:248b-40: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:248b-41: rdo rje se gol gyi mtshan mdzad nas /
T02D2510-1:248b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsdu ba byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so//
T02D2510-1:249a-1: de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de'i tshe
T02D2510-1:249a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad se gol gyi mtshan
T02D2510-1:249a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya mtsho ji snyed thams cad nas /
T02D2510-1:249a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu
T02D2510-1:249a-6: phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang
T02D2510-1:249a-7: chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i rigs
T02D2510-1:249a-8: chen po'i gzugs dang bcas te /
T02D2510-1:249a-9: 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje
T02D2510-1:249a-10: dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa gang
T02D2510-1:249a-11: na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:249a-12: pa rnams par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs
T02D2510-1:249a-13: na ba dang / pa nas / ched du aom
T02D2510-1:249a-14: sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a da bandha nam ka
T02D2510-1:249a-16: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar bzlas shing /
T02D2510-1:249a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas /
T02D2510-1:249a-18: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02D2510-1:249a-19: ae ma'o byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02D2510-1:249a-20: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02D2510-1:249a-21: dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes /
T02D2510-1:249a-22: de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:249a-23: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus
T02D2510-1:249a-24: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems
T02D2510-1:249a-25: dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te /
T02D2510-1:249a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs
T02D2510-1:249a-27: kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par sang mdzad kyi thugs
T02D2510-1:249a-28: su zhugs so // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:249a-29: thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang chub
T02D2510-1:249a-30: sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te phyung
T02D2510-1:249a-31: su zhugs so // nas / bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2510-1:249a-32: khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor
T02D2510-1:249a-33: bu rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad
T02D2510-1:249a-34: kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te
T02D2510-1:249a-35: su zhugs so // nas / / zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do //
T02D2510-1:249a-36: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2510-1:249a-37: rgya chen gdod nas skye ba med ;
T02D2510-1:249a-38: / rdul phran thams cad ji snyed kyi /
T02D2510-1:249a-39: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02D2510-1:249a-41: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje h'um mdzad la dbang bskur bar mdzad nas /
T02D2510-1:249a-42: des thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2510-1:249b-0: dbang du byas la phyag rgya bzhis @249b rgyas btab ste /
T02D2510-1:249b-1: dbang bskur zhing phrin las la nges par sbyar bar bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:249b-2: las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:249b-3: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i dngos grub ni /
T02D2510-1:249b-4: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:249b-5: chen por dam tshig dang dbang bskur bas bsgrub par
T02D2510-1:249b-6: bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:249b-7: de nas phyag na rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:249b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
T02D2510-1:249b-9: nyid kyi dngos grub bstan pa'i 'bras bu thob par
T02D2510-1:249b-10: bgyi ba de'i slad du ma k'a mandalam pra be
T02D2510-1:249b-11: sha ya zhes bya ba ni ;
T02D2510-1:249b-12: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'o //
T02D2510-1:249b-13: dushta ro dhan ni ba r'a ya pra be bha zhes bya ba la /
T02D2510-1:249b-14: gdug pa ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-1:249b-15: bsam pa ma dag pa ni ma rungs pa ste /
T02D2510-1:249b-17: de ltar gyur pa de dag dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2510-1:249b-18: zhugs nas sdig pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams dang
T02D2510-1:249b-21: dur drishtha parya pan na ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:249b-22: gang log par lta ba can gang yin pa de ni lta ba ngan par zhugs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:249b-23: des kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa dang //
T02D2510-1:249b-24: dbab pa'i ye shes bskyed pas yang dag pa'i lta ba la sbyor ba ni so sor grol ba'o //
T02D2510-1:249b-25: bi sho dha ya bi n'a sha ya zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:249b-26: skal ba dang mi ldan pa gang yin pa de rnam par sbyang zhing rnam par 'jig pa ste /
T02D2510-1:249b-27: gang dag shi ba nyid rnam par sbyong ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:249b-28: ha ha ha he he zhes bya ba ni thog
T02D2510-1:249b-29: ma med pa nas skye ba'i rgyu dang bral ba
T02D2510-1:249b-31: / h'um zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bde ba dang /
T02D2510-1:249b-32: yid bde ba la zhugs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:249b-33: bde ba dang yid bde ba'i ngo bo rnal 'byor pa la yang gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-1:249b-34: bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2510-1:249b-35: mi rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2510-1:249b-36: thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig ces bya ba'i bar
T02D2510-1:249b-37: du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad las dngos
T02D2510-1:249b-38: su bka' nod pa'i tshig yin no //
T02D2510-1:249b-39: de nas aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a mandalam /
T02D2510-1:249b-40: pra be sha ya zhes bya ba nas ha ha ha ha h'um zhes bya ba'i bar ni /
T02D2510-1:250a-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag par ste /
T02D2510-1:250a-3: bka' mnos pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-4: phyag na rdo rjes yongs su bskyab pa dang 'bras
T02D2510-1:250a-5: bu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-1:250a-6: po 'di bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2510-1:250a-7: rdo rje chen po dam tshig las byung ba //
T02D2510-1:250a-9: rdo rje yang de yin la chen po yang de yin pas na rdo rje chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas
T02D2510-1:250a-11: pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de nyid dam tshig
T02D2510-1:250a-12: gi rgyu yin pas de las byung ba ni skyes
T02D2510-1:250a-13: pa'o // de gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:250a-14: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-15: de nas rab tu bsad bya ba //
T02D2510-1:250a-16: zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir 'jig rten gsum
T02D2510-1:250a-17: las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs
T02D2510-1:250a-18: pa med na / gdug cing ma rungs pa lta
T02D2510-1:250a-19: ba ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can skal ba med
T02D2510-1:250a-20: pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2510-1:250a-21: tu mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu de'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:250a-22: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste rab tu bshad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-23: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'i zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:250a-24: sprul pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-25: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pas na ;
T02D2510-1:250a-26: dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog go //
T02D2510-1:250a-28: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-1:250a-30: sa stengs dang sa bla'i mtshan nyid can las rgyal ba 'di la mnga' bas na /
T02D2510-1:250a-31: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-32: dam tshig ni mnga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-33: gdug cing ma rungs pa rnams 'dul ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa nyid kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-34: 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje las skyes pa ste /
T02D2510-1:250a-35: de nyid kyi phyir 'di rdo rje'i rigs su brjod do //
T02D2510-1:250a-36: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni //
T02D2510-1:250a-38: de 'byin par byed pa ni 'jug pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:250a-39: gdug pa ma rungs pa thams cad ji skad bshad
T02D2510-1:250a-40: pa de dag gis rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o
T02D2510-1:250a-41: // 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:250a-42: thog mar bdag dang gnas bsrung ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250a-43: de nas khrus bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250a-44: yang bdag dang gnas bsrung ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-0: mchod pa @250b rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-3: de la phyag btsal ba sngon du songs bas sdom pa gzung ba'i bar du bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-4: thal mo sbyar la de nas rdo rje thal mo dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-5: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-6: de nas bsdams pa dral bar bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-7: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab pa dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-8: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab pa bsdu ba nye bar bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-9: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing pa dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-10: sdig pa 'dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa dral ba dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-11: yang dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-1:250b-12: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la de'i sngags dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-13: aom badzra mu: zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod la
T02D2510-1:250b-14: rang gi snying gar rnam par snad mdzad la sogs
T02D2510-1:250b-16: de ltar phyag rgya gzhug pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:250b-18: rang gi snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2510-1:250b-19: rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i dbus su yi ge
T02D2510-1:250b-20: h'um yid kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:250b-21: de nyid yid kyis brjod pas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms la /
T02D2510-1:250b-22: yang yi ge h'um de nyid dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-23: dbyangs yig bcu drug las gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2510-1:250b-24: de nas de'i steng du yi ge h'um dang /
T02D2510-1:250b-25: yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa
T02D2510-1:250b-26: lta bu las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bsams
T02D2510-1:250b-27: nas yi ge h'um de nyid rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2510-1:250b-28: pa 'bar ba stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing

T02D2510-1:253b-9: nyin re bzhin thun bzha' sbyor bas zla ba drug gam /
T02D2510-1:253b-10: lo gcig gi bar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02D2510-1:253b-11: rnal 'byor chen po tsam byas la //
T02D2510-1:253b-12: 'chang par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:253b-13: gyi cho gas rang gi snying gar 'jig rten gsum
T02D2510-1:253b-14: las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ji
T02D2510-1:253b-15: srid mngon sum du gyur pa de srid du bsgom
T02D2510-1:253b-16: par bya ba'am / bsgom par mi nus pa des
T02D2510-1:253b-17: ni nyin re zhing rnal 'byor chen po lan cig
T02D2510-1:253b-18: par bya ba'am / byas la / de srid du
T02D2510-1:253b-19: dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyi sngags bzlas pa byed
T02D2510-1:253b-21: re re zhing bzlas pa'i grangs 'bum rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:253b-22: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2510-1:253b-23: dkyil 'khor chen po ting nge 'dzin gsum nas brtsams
T02D2510-1:253b-24: nas / gzhag bdun gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:253b-25: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:253b-26: de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i sa sbyang ba dang /
T02D2510-1:253b-28: khang ba brtsegs mar chud pa dang /
T02D2510-1:253b-29: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi ji skad bshad pa bzhin byas nas /
T02D2510-1:253b-30: khrus byas shing gdong dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02D2510-1:253b-31: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02D2510-1:253b-32: shin tu sngo ba'i gos kyis stod g-yogs dang /
T02D2510-1:253b-35: dpal rdo rje'i rigs su bshad pa'i chod phan dang /
T02D2510-1:253b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byas la /
T02D2510-1:253b-40: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2510-1:253b-41: rnal 'byor chen po nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:253b-42: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas ri rab kyi bar du bskyed la /
T02D2510-1:253b-43: rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas khams gsum rnam
T02D2510-1:253b-44: par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de re rab
T02D2510-1:253b-45: kyi rtse mor ba skyod de /
T02D2510-1:253b-46: deng ge'i gdan la sogs pa gdan thams cad bskyed nas /
T02D2510-1:254a-0: @254a * // dkyil 'khor sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyi la mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02D2510-1:254a-1: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2510-1:254a-2: ces bya ba la sogs pas spro ba bskyed par bya'o //

T02D2510-1:254a-4: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02D2510-1:254a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:254a-6: de nas ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgoms la rdo rje'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D2510-1:254a-7: rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /
T02D2510-1:254a-8: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom mo //
T02D2510-1:254a-9: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02D2510-1:254a-10: rdo rje dang dril bu bzung nas /
T02D2510-1:254a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus
T02D2510-1:254a-12: shing lus pa med pa rnams bskyab pa dang zhes
T02D2510-1:254a-13: bya ba la sogs pa las /
T02D2510-1:254a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba'i gnang ba nod pa dang /
T02D2510-1:254a-15: aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a manta la pra be
T02D2510-1:254a-16: sha ya zhes bya ba nas ha ha ha ha
T02D2510-1:254a-17: h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gnang ba byin par
T02D2510-1:254a-18: bsams te / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D2510-1:254a-19: ba'i phyag rgya h'um bzhi pas dkyil 'khor de bteg
T02D2510-1:254a-21: de nyid kyis bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2510-1:254a-22: phyag rgya de nyid snying gar bzhag nas /
T02D2510-1:254a-23: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i
T02D2510-1:254a-24: khro bo'i lta bas dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams
T02D2510-1:254a-25: nas bltas pas bgegs med pa'i rjes la /
T02D2510-1:254a-26: rang gi rkang pa'i mthil du yi ge aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed de /
T02D2510-1:254a-27: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:254a-28: rkang pa'i mthil gyi bar du yongs su bzung bas /
T02D2510-1:254a-29: ji srid ri rab kyi rtse mo nas /
T02D2510-1:254a-30: stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam
T02D2510-1:254a-31: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par mos shing bskor
T02D2510-1:254a-32: ba byas pas rim gyis rkang pa'i sna tshogs rdo
T02D2510-1:254a-33: rje sna tshogs rdo rjer byas la /
T02D2510-1:254a-34: h'um bzhi pa gdon par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:254a-35: khro bo'i lta bas phyogs dang /
T02D2510-1:254a-40: yang h'um zhes brjod cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams
T02D2510-1:254a-41: cad kyi rdul phra mo dang shing tu phra mo'i
T02D2510-1:254a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas
T02D2510-1:254a-43: phyung nas / 'jig rten gyi khams su rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'khrugs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa /
T02D2510-1:254b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs @254b pa'i khro bos h'um zhes bya ba'i sga 'jigs pas /
T02D2510-1:254b-1: lkog ma'i phyogs kun gang ba /
T02D2510-1:254b-2: padma'i sdong bu ltar g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2510-1:254b-3: rdo rje babs pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' las babs te /
T02D2510-1:254b-4: gar byas la me tog gi thal mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod la /
T02D2510-1:254b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su g-yon brkyang bas 'dug ste /
T02D2510-1:254b-6: bskal ba'i me'i phung po ltar 'jigs pa'i khro bo spros pas /
T02D2510-1:254b-7: bdud thams cad skrag par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:254b-8: de nas rnal 'byor pas dga' ba yongs su bsgyur
T02D2510-1:254b-9: ba'i 'gros kyis shar phyogs su songs la g-yon brkyang
T02D2510-1:254b-11: bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //

T02D2510-1:254b-13: de bzhin du bgegs rnams yongs su bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:254b-14: de nas gnas der gnas nas g-yas brkyang ba dang /
T02D2510-1:254b-15: g-yon brkyang ba dag gis nub phyogs su songs la /
T02D2510-1:254b-17: de bzhin du bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:254b-18: de nas gnas de nas nam mkha'i ma lus par
T02D2510-1:254b-19: khyab par gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams g-yo
T02D2510-1:254b-20: bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis byang phyogs su
T02D2510-1:254b-21: 'gro bar bya'o // de nas g-yas brkyang ba dang /
T02D2510-1:254b-26: rnam pa lngas shar phyogs su songs la bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:254b-27: de ltar bgegs thams cad stang stabs rnam pa bzhis bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:254b-28: cing lta ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khrul 'khor
T02D2510-1:254b-29: la sogs pa tha dad pa yang de bzhin du
T02D2510-1:254b-30: sbyar bar bya'o // de ltar 'khrul 'khor la sogs pas kyang bgegs bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:254b-31: stang stabs byed pa'i dus su rgyun mi 'chad par
T02D2510-1:254b-32: h'um zhes bya ba khro bo'i tshig gdon par bya'o
T02D2510-1:254b-33: // de nas khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:254b-34: bzhin bzangs langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:254b-35: la phyag gis shig / dkyil 'khor chen po mthong
T02D2510-1:254b-36: bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:254b-37: ji skad gsungs pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D2510-1:254b-38: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:255a-0: de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su dkyil @255a * //
T02D2510-1:255a-1: 'khor gyi gnas thams cad rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags bzlas pa'i spos chus byugs la /
T02D2510-1:255a-2: me tog la sogs pas kyang nye bar mdzes par byas nas /
T02D2510-1:255a-7: dkar po dru zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so
T02D2510-1:255a-8: sor kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag
T02D2510-1:255a-9: nas / h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: aa zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:255a-10: rang gi sa bon 'di las byung ba'i thig gi
T02D2510-1:255a-11: 'od zer gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rang
T02D2510-1:255a-12: gi phyogs na bzhugs pas yang dag par btang ba
T02D2510-1:255a-13: dang 'bar ba'i lcags kyus drangs te /
T02D2510-1:255a-14: rang gi lag na gnas pa'i srad bu legs par dgang bar bya zhing /
T02D2510-1:255a-15: aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta /
T02D2510-1:255a-17: pa ras pa r'a nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a /
T02D2510-1:255a-18: aa tyant'a nu pra bshti sarba dharm'a h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:255a-19: de nas srad bu de dri zhim pos bsgos te /
T02D2510-1:255a-20: gser gyi snod la sogs par bzhag la /
T02D2510-1:255a-22: rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la thig gi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:255a-23: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bdag po snga po rnams kyi sngags kyang bzla'o //
T02D2510-1:255a-24: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:255a-25: pa thams cad la mchong pa thams cad kyis yang
T02D2510-1:255a-26: dag par mchod la phyag bya'o //
T02D2510-1:255a-27: de la sngags 'dis srad bu bre bar bya'o zhes
T02D2510-1:255a-28: bya ba ni de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i cho
T02D2510-1:255a-29: ga 'di yin no zhes bya bar de la zhes
T02D2510-1:255a-30: bya ba'i sgras ston pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:255a-31: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:255a-32: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su sbyang
T02D2510-1:255a-33: nas mchod pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor yang dag
T02D2510-1:255a-34: par mchod la phyag byas te /
T02D2510-1:255a-35: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la ;
T02D2510-1:255a-36: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las grogs
T02D2510-1:255a-37: po h'um zhes bya ba 'dis khro bo rdo rje
T02D2510-1:255a-38: las kyi gzugs su dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:255a-39: yang de nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur pa las /
T02D2510-1:255a-40: mig g-yas g-yon gnyis su yi ge dza: las zla
T02D2510-1:255a-41: ba dang nyi ma ser por snang ba bskyed la
T02D2510-1:255a-42: / dza: zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas sgrub pa'i
T02D2510-1:255a-43: grogs mchog gi lag tu g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu
T02D2510-1:255a-44: tshur gyis srad bu de btang la /
T02D2510-1:255a-45: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra
T02D2510-1:255a-46: ma h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis khams gsum rnam
T02D2510-1:255a-47: par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad bu bre
T02D2510-1:255a-48: bar bya'o // gru bzhir bya zhing zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-1:255b-0: dkyil 'khor phyi rol srad @255b bu bre //
T02D2510-1:255b-1: zhes bya ba'i bar du sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2510-1:255b-2: shes rab can gyis de nang du //
T02D2510-1:255b-3: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i nang du yang dkyil 'khor gnyis pa /
T02D2510-1:255b-5: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las byung ba bzhin du rdo rje rin po ches brgyan pa /
T02D2510-1:255b-7: ka ba brgyad dang rtab bas bzhis brgyan pa /
T02D2510-1:255b-12: don yod par grub pa'i gnas rnams su rdo rje'i ri mo zlum po bris la /
T02D2510-1:255b-13: de la yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:255b-15: rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog tu //
T02D2510-1:255b-16: dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ste //
T02D2510-1:255b-18: de ltar zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:255b-19: rnams la lha thams cad kyi gzugs kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:255b-22: sgo rnams skyong bar bzhag nas ni //
T02D2510-1:255b-23: sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin //
T02D2510-1:255b-25: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni //
T02D2510-1:255b-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal
T02D2510-1:255b-27: 'byor pas khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:255b-28: bcings te / de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02D2510-1:255b-29: aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2510-1:255b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi lhag pa dang ma tshang ba nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang bltas la /

T02D2510-1:255b-33: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste /
T02D2510-1:255b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:255b-36: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bris nas ni //
T02D2510-1:255b-37: khro bo ti r'i nti ri bcings //
T02D2510-1:255b-38: yang dag lta ba byas nas ni //
T02D2510-1:255b-39: lan bdun bar du bskor bar bya //
T02D2510-1:255b-40: rdo rje dril bu rab dkrol bas //
T02D2510-1:255b-41: mkhas pas mtshang yongs su bskang /
T02D2510-1:255b-42: lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pa //
T02D2510-1:255b-44: yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni //
T02D2510-1:255b-45: bteg nas kyang ni dbye bar bya //
T02D2510-1:255b-46: 'khor lo yi ni dbus zhugs nas //
T02D2510-1:255b-47: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam bzhag nas //
T02D2510-1:255b-48: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi po //
T02D2510-1:255b-49: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02D2510-1:255b-50: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02D2510-1:255b-51: lcags kyu la sogs las rnams bya //
T02D2510-1:255b-53: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng du lha'i gzugs bris nas /
T02D2510-1:256a-0: sgo dbye ba la sogs pa bshad @256a * //

T02D2510-1:256a-3: gser ram dngul las byas pa'am //

T02D2510-1:256a-5: pha gu gru bzhi byas pa la //

T02D2510-1:256a-13: gzugs brnyan dang gcig tu byas nas /
T02D2510-1:256a-14: spyan drang ba'i snying pos spyan drang ngo //
T02D2510-1:256a-15: sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni //
T02D2510-1:256a-16: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi shar phyogs kyi cha la /

T02D2510-1:256a-27: yid kyis rim mo bteg nas ni //

T02D2510-1:256a-30: rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung //
T02D2510-1:256a-32: tshon rtsi lnga'i skud pa'i ri mo bteg nas /
T02D2510-1:256a-33: 'og nas 'dzul bar yang bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:256a-34: de'i dbus su sems dpa' che //

T02D2510-1:256a-36: rdo rje h'um zhes bya bar 'dus ;
T02D2510-1:256a-38: phyag gnyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
T02D2510-1:256a-39: mche ba cung zad mngon pa ni mche ba cung zad phyung ba'o //
T02D2510-1:256a-40: de dag gi mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal gang la
T02D2510-1:256a-41: mnga' ba de ni mche ba cung zad rtsigs pa'i
T02D2510-1:256a-42: zhal mnga' ba'o // khro dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02D2510-1:256a-43: zhes bya ba ni khro ba dang bcas pa ni
T02D2510-1:256a-44: zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i zhal gang la mnga' ba
T02D2510-1:256a-45: de ni khro ba dang bcas pas 'dzum pa'i zhal

T02D2510-1:262a-7: chos dang mthun pa rnams thabs gang gis rjes su
T02D2510-1:262a-8: gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes
T02D2510-1:262a-9: bya ba ni / de skad du gsol ba 'debs par byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:262a-10: khro bo rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya snying
T02D2510-1:262a-11: gar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste zhes bya
T02D2510-1:262a-12: ba ni dbab pa bdag nyid la dbab pa byas
T02D2510-1:262a-13: nas / tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D2510-1:262a-14: phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba bya'o //
T02D2510-1:262a-15: lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:262a-16: bsdu ba byas nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do //
T02D2510-1:262a-17: rdo rje lcags kyu las kyi phyag rgyas sgo dang nye bar bzhag la /
T02D2510-1:262a-18: rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas sgor gnas
T02D2510-1:262a-19: pa rab tu bcug nas rdo rje lcags sgrog gi
T02D2510-1:262a-20: las kyi phyag rgyas bcings te /
T02D2510-1:262a-21: khro bo chen po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du byas nas /
T02D2510-1:262a-22: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgyas thams cad chings shig dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:262a-23: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2510-1:262a-25: phyag rgya chen po rnams rnam par snang mdzad nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-1:262a-26: phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi du bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:262a-27: dam tshig gi phyag rgya phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ji ltar yin par shes she na /
T02D2510-1:262a-28: de skad du yang rgyud phyi ma las bstan te /
T02D2510-1:262a-29: dam tshig phyag rgya mchog bcings pas //
T02D2510-1:262a-30: las rnams thams cad sgrub pa'o //
T02D2510-1:262a-31: zhes bya ba de nyid bshad pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:262a-32: de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas /
T02D2510-1:262a-33: bdug pa la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2510-1:262a-34: de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug
T02D2510-1:262a-35: cig ces bya ba ni slob ma rdo rje h'um
T02D2510-1:262a-37: cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:262a-38: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i cho gas sangs rgyas su byed pas so //
T02D2510-1:262a-39: rang gis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje slob dpon
T02D2510-1:262a-40: bdag nyis khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2510-1:262b-0: slob ma yang snying po 'di dang 'ching du chug cig ces bya @262b ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-1:262b-1: rdo rje dbab pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:262b-2: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i
T02D2510-1:262b-3: rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob
T02D2510-1:262b-4: ma la dbab pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2510-1:262b-5: de nas mna'i snying po byin cig ces bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:262b-6: 'jug pa byas pa'i de ma thag pa nyid du
T02D2510-1:262b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs
T02D2510-1:262b-8: su zhugs kyis / ngas khyod la rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya zhes bya ba na /
T02D2510-1:262b-9: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:262b-11: de nas gdong g-yogs bcings pa bkrol te dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:262b-12: chen po ji lta ba bzhin ston cing zhes bya
T02D2510-1:262b-13: ba ni / tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba dang /
T02D2510-1:262b-14: pra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes bya bas me tog dor ba dang /
T02D2510-1:262b-15: aom pra ti grihna sva mi m'am satvam ma h'a
T02D2510-1:262b-16: ba la zhes bya bas me tog gi phreng ba
T02D2510-1:262b-17: bcing ba dang / rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2510-1:262b-18: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad ;
T02D2510-1:262b-19: / rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02D2510-1:262b-20: de ring nyid du 'byed par byed //
T02D2510-1:262b-21: ces bya bas gdong g-yogs bcings pa dgrol bar bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:262b-22: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-1:262b-23: rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug gi bar du rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'o //
T02D2510-1:262b-24: des dkyil 'khor mthong bas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2510-1:262b-25: sdig pa thams cad las dgrol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D2510-1:262b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:262b-27: dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i stobs kyis sems phul du byung bar gyur te /
T02D2510-1:262b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
T02D2510-1:262b-29: pa'i mthus phul du byung ba'i ye shes skyes so
T02D2510-1:262b-30: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2510-1:262b-31: de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur te zhes
T02D2510-1:262b-32: bya ba la rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2510-1:262b-33: gzungs su de byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2510-1:262b-34: chu'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje
T02D2510-1:262b-35: dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas
T02D2510-1:262b-36: sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:262b-37: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um /
T02D2510-1:262b-38: aa bhi shinyts'a mi zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2510-1:262b-39: rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas /
T02D2510-1:262b-40: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:262b-41: rang gi mtshan ma'i rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:263a-0: lcags sam zangs las byas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga @263a * //
T02D2510-1:263a-1: pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi 'bar
T02D2510-1:263a-2: ba'i rdo rje rnon po de ni rdo rje rigs
T02D2510-1:263a-3: kyi rang gi mtshan ma de nyid yin no zhes
T02D2510-1:263a-4: bya ba'i don du bshad do //
T02D2510-1:263a-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho gas nyi ma 'char kar dkyil 'khor thig btab la /
T02D2510-1:263a-6: mig g-yas pa dang g-yon par yi ge hi las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2510-1:263a-7: khro bo'i lta bas kun nas bltas te sgo rnams dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263a-8: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas /
T02D2510-1:263a-10: tshon sna lnga la lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas la /
T02D2510-1:263a-11: yi ge his sbar bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263a-12: yang aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod cing /
T02D2510-1:263a-13: rdo rje dril bu bzung ba'i g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
T02D2510-1:263a-14: g-yas phyogs nas bri ba dang /
T02D2510-1:263a-15: phyi nas ni ci bde bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263a-21: thams cad kyi nang du dkar por bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263a-22: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa gzhi
T02D2510-1:263a-23: ni kha dog dkar po rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2510-1:263a-25: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi kha dog ser po /
T02D2510-1:263a-26: chos kyi h'um mdzad kyi kha dog dmar po /
T02D2510-1:263a-27: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi kha dog ljang gu'o //
T02D2510-1:263a-29: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
T02D2510-1:263a-30: lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa //
T02D2510-1:263a-31: nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste //
T02D2510-1:263a-32: byang ni ljang gu dang ldan pa //
T02D2510-1:263a-33: dbus kyi cha yi sa nyid ni //
T02D2510-1:263a-34: shel ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02D2510-1:263a-36: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba byas la /
T02D2510-1:263a-37: de la rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:263a-41: rdo rje las ma rnams kyi gdan rnams kyang bri bar bya'i //
T02D2510-1:263a-42: de ltar rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zlum por byas la /
T02D2510-1:263a-43: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:263a-47: khro bo legs pa rnams kyi gdan yang bri bar bya'o ;
T02D2510-1:263a-48: / de bzhin du rin chen h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2510-1:263a-50: las kyi h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor zlum por byas la /
T02D2510-1:263a-51: de rnams la gdan lnga lnga bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263a-52: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyi gnas rnams su zlum por byas la /
T02D2510-1:263a-53: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga lnga byas la /
T02D2510-1:263b-0: @263b lhag ma rnams ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-1: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gdan de rnams la bkod la /
T02D2510-1:263b-2: sgeg mo la de las gzhan yang khar dkrol brdung ba'i lha mo bzhin bskor ba dang /
T02D2510-1:263b-3: glu ma de las gzhan pa'i gling bu ma bzhi dang /
T02D2510-1:263b-4: phreng ba ma la rang gi gnas su de las gzhan pa rnga zlum brdung ba bzhi dang /
T02D2510-1:263b-5: gar ma la de las gzhan pa'i rnga rked nyag rdung ba bzhi dang /
T02D2510-1:263b-6: bdug pa ma la de las gzhan pa'i zang dung 'bud pa bzhi dang /
T02D2510-1:263b-7: me tog ma la de las gzhan pa rnga bo che brdung ba bzhi dang /
T02D2510-1:263b-8: mang me ma la de las gzhan pa rnga dra ba can brdung ba bzhi dang /
T02D2510-1:263b-9: byug pa ma la de las gzhan pa rnga 'da'
T02D2510-1:263b-10: ka brdung ba'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba bya ste
T02D2510-1:263b-11: / 'khor rnams kyang rang rang gi gnas su bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-12: de nas brdung ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2510-1:263b-13: badzra h'um ha khar dkrol gyi snying po'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-14: badzra ghu ghu rnga zlum gyi snying po'o ;
T02D2510-1:263b-15: / badzra h'um aom gling bu 'bud pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-16: badzra h'um stam rnga rked nyag brdung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-17: badzra ti ti zangs dung 'bung pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-18: badzra ta ta ta rnga bo che brdung pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-19: badzra ha du ha rnga dra ba can brdung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-20: badzra ha du rnga 'da' ka brdung ba'i ste lhag ma ni bshad zin to //
T02D2510-1:263b-21: de ltar rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02D2510-1:263b-22: dgongs ka'i dus su dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2510-1:263b-23: rnal 'byor pas rdo rje khro bo ti r'i nti
T02D2510-1:263b-25: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02D2510-1:263b-26: rdo rje shugs kyi h'um bzhi badzrod cing dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:263b-27: du zhugs la lan bdun bar du bskor pa byas
T02D2510-1:263b-28: te / lhag ma dor ba dang ma tshang ba bskang ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:263b-29: rdo rje dang dril bu dkrol zhing blta bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-30: de nas phreng ba de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la phul te /
T02D2510-1:263b-31: gar bya zhing blangs la yi ge h'um bzhis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:263b-32: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'jug ste /
T02D2510-1:263b-33: rnal 'byor pas legs par mnyam par byas nas /
T02D2510-1:263b-34: aom badzrod gha ta sa ma ya pra be sha
T02D2510-1:263b-35: ya h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di dang phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:263b-36: dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo rnams
T02D2510-1:263b-37: dbye bar bya'o // de nas rin po che'am /
T02D2510-1:263b-38: yang na sa las byas pa'i bum pa rtsa ba mi gnag pa /
T02D2510-1:264a-6: 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su bkang ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i ldum bus kha brgyan pa /
T02D2510-1:264a-7: mgrin pa ras bzang pos bcings pa /
T02D2510-1:264a-8: khro bo rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa'i skud pa btags pas bsrung ba /
T02D2510-1:264a-9: phyi rol kun nas dri zhim pos nye bar byugs pa /
T02D2510-1:264a-10: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa /
T02D2510-1:264a-11: rdo rje phreng ba rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i steng du bzhag nas phyin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D2510-1:264a-12: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin lan brgya bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul la /
T02D2510-1:264a-13: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2510-1:264a-14: rdo rje khro bo dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me
T02D2510-1:264a-15: tog gi lcug ma la de'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2510-1:264a-16: bzlas la / de nyid la rdo rje me dang /
T02D2510-1:264a-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis de bzhin du mchod yon phul nas /
T02D2510-1:264a-18: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas me tog gi lcug ma bzung la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2510-1:264a-19: de nas khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas me tog gi lcug ma bzung la /
T02D2510-1:264a-20: aom badzra au da ka h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa slar yang /
T02D2510-1:264a-21: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D2510-1:264a-22: dri dho me bha ba dza:h'um bam ho: phat /
T02D2510-1:264a-23: ces bya ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:264a-24: de nas bum pa de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2510-1:264a-25: h'um mdzad kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya zhing bum
T02D2510-1:264a-26: pa gnyis pa la yi ge h'um bzhi'i sngags bzla
T02D2510-1:264a-27: zhing 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par bzhag ste
T02D2510-1:264a-28: / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-1:264a-29: bdag dang slob ma des dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:264a-30: khro bo rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2510-1:264a-33: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D2510-1:264a-34: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bum pa dbul zhing bum
T02D2510-1:264a-35: pa gang ba yang rang gi rig pas dbul bar
T02D2510-1:264a-36: bya'o // de nas me tog gi shing brgya'am /
T02D2510-1:264a-37: ma rnyed na rnam pa bzhi dbul ba bya zhing /
T02D2510-1:264a-38: mchod pa rnam par lnga dang /
T02D2510-1:264a-39: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod cing /
T02D2510-1:264a-40: mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis yang mchod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:264a-41: de ltar dkyil 'khor mchod nas gos sngon po la
T02D2510-1:264a-42: khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags lan gsum
T02D2510-1:264b-0: @264b bzlas pa'i bdag nyid la stong g-yogs dang smad
T02D2510-1:264b-1: g-yogs byas te / gtsug tong dang gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02D2510-1:264b-2: sngags de nyid dang sgo rnam pa bzhi'i sngags yongs su bzlas pas gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02D2510-1:264b-3: phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro bas sdig pa bshags pa
T02D2510-1:264b-4: la sogs pa'i chog rjes su spyad nas sdom pa
T02D2510-1:264b-5: gzung bar bya'o // de nas phi rol na gnas
T02D2510-1:264b-6: pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur ba
T02D2510-1:264b-7: gzung bar bya'o // byas te / bdag nyid la mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2510-1:264b-8: lag na me tog thogs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:264b-9: khro bo ti'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2510-1:264b-11: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02D2510-1:264b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:264b-13: pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du mchis te
T02D2510-1:264b-14: / tshar gcad par rigs pa rnams ni tshang gcad do //
T02D2510-1:264b-15: rjes su gzung bar rigs pa rnams ni rjes su bzung nas de ji ltar bsgrub bar bgyi /
T02D2510-1:264b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol du gsol zhes brjod do //
T02D2510-1:264b-17: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:264b-18: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis g-yas pa'i rdo
T02D2510-1:264b-19: rje sems ma dral zhing yi ge aa: zhes brjod
T02D2510-1:264b-20: do // de nas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la /
T02D2510-1:264b-21: de nas phreng ba de blangs te rang gi spyi bor bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2510-1:264b-22: de nas gdong g-yogs bkrol la /
T02D2510-1:264b-23: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bltas te /
T02D2510-1:264b-24: dbab pa nye bar bsdu ba byas nas /
T02D2510-1:264b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:264b-27: rdo rje khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:264b-28: yang dang dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2510-1:264b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dang /
T02D2510-1:264b-31: rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba'ang blang bar bya ste /
T02D2510-1:264b-32: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02D2510-1:264b-33: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
T02D2510-1:264b-34: bcom ldan 'das slob dpon du gyur pas chag rgyas
T02D2510-1:264b-35: pa thams cad rim pa bzhin du bdag la mdzad
T02D2510-1:264b-38: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02D2510-1:264b-39: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2510-1:264b-40: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2510-1:264b-41: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02D2510-1:265a-0: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul @265a * //
T02D2510-1:265a-2: me tog dang sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pas phad ga nyid la yang dag par mchod la /

T02D2510-1:282b-0: sngar @282b bshad pa bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas sngags lan 'bum brjod pa dang /

T02D2510-1:283a-1: dkar po la ni rnam par snang mdzad dkar po'i gzugs kyis so //

T02D2510-1:285a-33: rnal 'byor chen po byas la 'jig rten gsum las

T02D2510-1:285b-12: dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams su //
T02D2510-1:285b-13: gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya //

T02D2510-1:285b-28: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus de la ji skad

T02D2510-1:285b-35: de bzhin du thams cad kyang rang gi rig pas

T02D2510-1:285b-39: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dang /

T02D2510-1:286a-1: h'um mdzad kyi gnas su mdung rtse gsum pa'i rtse mo g-yas su bltas pa bri bar byas la /

T02D2510-1:286a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje 'bar ba de dang /

T02D2510-1:286a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'bar bas kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:286a-11: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang /

T02D2510-1:286a-18: khro gnyer gyi dbus su rdo rje rin po che bri'o //

T02D2510-1:286a-28: khro bo rdo rje chos kyi gnas su 'dab ma
T02D2510-1:286a-29: bcu drug pa'i rdo rje padma 'bar ba'i dbus su

T02D2510-1:286a-32: khro bo rdo rje gsung ba'i gnas su rdo rje lce'o //

T02D2510-1:286a-34: de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D2510-1:286a-35: de'i mthar sna tshogs rdo rje tshad phra mos bskor ba /
T02D2510-1:286a-36: rdo rje las kyi gnas su sna tshogs rdo rje /
T02D2510-1:286a-37: srung ba'i gnas su rdo rje go cha /

T02D2510-1:286b-19: nub phyogs su rdo rje padma nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu dang /

T02D2510-1:286b-23: phyag rgya thams cad kyi gdan dang /

T02D2510-1:286b-25: de nas 'dir rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa

T02D2510-1:287a-14: aom he tu ma h'a kro dhe pra be sha tsakram pra be sha ya na sarbandi /

T02D2510-1:287a-17: rdo rje dhi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //

T02D2510-1:287a-21: aom badzra tsanda kro dhe ma h'a ya kshi ni

T02D2510-1:287b-15: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen

T02D2510-1:287b-28: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brdul zhugs kyi bar du

T02D2510-1:288a-13: nye ba'i phyag rgyar brjod do //

T02D2510-1:293b-28: g-yas pas g-yon par 'byed pa chos kyi h'um mdzad dang /

T02D2510-1:293b-30: gzungs kyi rdo rje chos ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-31: snying gar ral gri 'dzin pa ni rnon po'i gnas kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-32: mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba ltar byed pa ni rgyu'i gnas kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-33: rdo rje gnyis gyen du tshig 'byin pa ni gsang ba'i gnas kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-34: rdo rje gar bskor ba bkrol nas 'gram pa dang
T02D2510-1:293b-35: spyi bor 'jog pa ni las kyi h'um mdzad dang
T02D2510-1:293b-37: gzungs kyi las kyi rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-38: khrab 'dzin pa lta bu ni srung ba'i gnas kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-39: mthe'u chung gnyis mche ba lta bur byed pa ni /
T02D2510-1:293b-40: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gnas kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-41: khu tshur gnyis 'tshir ba ni gzungs kyi khro bo'i khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:293b-42: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i khu tshur gnyis su byas pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:293b-43: de bzhin du dam tshig rdo rje khu tshur gyi
T02D2510-1:293b-44: khro bo gzungs kyi khu tshur gnyis su byas nas
T02D2510-1:294a-1: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing bar yang shes par bya'o zhes blta bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:294a-2: sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni 'jig rten gsum
T02D2510-1:294a-3: las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs
T02D2510-1:294a-4: pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas /
T02D2510-1:294a-5: gar las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:294a-6: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-1:294a-7: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud pa dang //
T02D2510-1:294a-8: phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung //
T02D2510-1:294a-9: rdo rje gar ni rab bskor ba //
T02D2510-1:294a-10: thur du blugs dang gyen du gtor //
T02D2510-1:294a-11: mthe bo bsnyams te rab tu bsdams //
T02D2510-1:294a-12: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa yis //
T02D2510-1:294a-13: mchod pa'i sbyor ba byed pa'o //
T02D2510-1:294a-15: mdzub mo lcags kyur bcing ba ni //
T02D2510-1:294a-16: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02D2510-1:294a-17: mkhrig ma mdud la mdzub gnyis gdub //
T02D2510-1:294a-18: rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02D2510-1:294a-19: zhes bya ba ni sgeg mo nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-1:294a-20: gzungs kyi khro bo rdo rje 'bebs ma'i las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:294a-21: yang sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs
T02D2510-1:294a-22: ma'i bar gyi gzungs kyi khro bo khu tshur gyi
T02D2510-1:294a-23: dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas nas /
T02D2510-1:294a-24: gsang zhing gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bcing ba blta bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:294a-25: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02D2510-1:294a-27: // / de ltar 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D2510-1:294a-28: ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i
T02D2510-1:294a-30: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi
T02D2510-1:294a-31: phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pas 'dul ba'i sems can
T02D2510-1:294a-32: rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:294a-33: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D2510-1:294a-34: de nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:294a-35: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-1:294a-36: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:294a-37: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig
T02D2510-1:294a-38: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2510-1:294a-39: por bshad pa'i dang po sbyor ba nas brtsams nas
T02D2510-1:294a-43: las kyi h'um mdzad sprul pa'i mthar thug pa yin par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:294b-0: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos @294b pas na /
T02D2510-1:294b-1: yang zhes bya ba smos so //
T02D2510-1:294b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni /
T02D2510-1:294b-3: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:294b-4: rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes
T02D2510-1:294b-5: ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu'i bcom
T02D2510-1:294b-6: ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi chos kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:294b-7: 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes las skyes
T02D2510-1:294b-8: pa'i phyir dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes
T02D2510-1:294b-9: las skyes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin
T02D2510-1:294b-10: gyi ye shes zhes bshad do //
T02D2510-1:294b-11: de ltar de'i gzugs brnyan bskyed nas sems can gyi khams la rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:294b-12: des byin gyis brlabs pa ni sprul pa ston par
T02D2510-1:294b-13: byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa'i phyir ming
T02D2510-1:294b-14: de skad ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas
T02D2510-1:294b-15: / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum
T02D2510-1:294b-16: rnam par rgyal ba'i rang gi chos kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:294b-17: sprul par byed pa de ston par mdzad pa'i rnam
T02D2510-1:294b-18: par thugs rtse gcig mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2510-1:294b-19: / to // de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02D2510-1:294b-22: las kyi h'um mdzad rnams rang gi dkyil 'khor sprul
T02D2510-1:294b-23: par byed pa ston par mdzad pa'i rnam par thugs
T02D2510-1:294b-25: mdzad nas sngags rnams gsungs pa des dkyil 'khor lnga
T02D2510-1:294b-26: po bskyed pa bstan pa'i rnam par snang mdzad do
T02D2510-1:294b-27: // de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa'o //
T02D2510-1:294b-28: chos kyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i rjes thogs nyid la
T02D2510-1:294b-29: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2510-1:294b-30: rang gi rigs 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D2510-1:294b-31: ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sngags dang ting
T02D2510-1:294b-32: nge 'dzin dang bcas pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:294b-33: 'khor chen po'i dbyibs kyi tshul gyis rdzogs par mdzad
T02D2510-1:294b-34: pa'o // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2510-1:294b-35: phyogs dang mtshams rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D2510-1:294b-36: pa'o // la / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs
T02D2510-1:294b-37: pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
T02D2510-1:294b-38: gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen pos bzhugs
T02D2510-1:294b-39: pa'o // la / so // 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:294b-40: bshad ma thag pa'i rgyas par bshad pa gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:294b-41: rdo rje khro bo khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa'i snying po gsungs nas /
T02D2510-1:294b-42: lhag ma rnams ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D2510-1:294b-43: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa nyid kyi
T02D2510-1:295a-3: dkyil 'khor sprul nas rang rang gi snying po rnam
T02D2510-1:295a-4: par snang mdzad nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug
T02D2510-1:295a-5: pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rang
T02D2510-1:295a-6: gi gnas su dgod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:295a-7: de nas zhes bya ba nas rang gi gnas su
T02D2510-1:295a-8: lha thams cad dgod pa'i mthar thug pa bstan pa
T02D2510-1:295a-9: ni / chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal
T02D2510-1:295a-10: po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa
T02D2510-1:295a-13: byin gyis brlabs pa nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-1:295a-14: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog
T02D2510-1:295a-15: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par
T02D2510-1:295a-16: shes par bya'o // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D2510-1:295a-17: rgyal ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i dngos
T02D2510-1:295a-18: shes par bya'o // grub ni / 'jig rten gsum
T02D2510-1:295a-19: las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D2510-1:295a-20: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bsgrub par
T02D2510-1:295a-22: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang /
T02D2510-1:295a-23: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs so //
T02D2510-1:295a-24: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2510-1:295a-25: yang zhes bya ba ni gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pa'o //
T02D2510-1:295a-26: rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes ni rdo rje phra mo ste /
T02D2510-1:295a-27: de'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa ni /
T02D2510-1:295a-28: chos kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o //
T02D2510-1:295a-29: gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa'i rdo rje
T02D2510-1:295a-30: rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rdo rje phra
T02D2510-1:295a-31: mo bsgoms nas bya ba yin pa de'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:295a-32: de nye bar ston pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D2510-1:295a-34: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2510-1:295a-35: rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:295a-36: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:295a-37: gang gi phyir rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D2510-1:295a-38: rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2510-1:295a-39: pas na rdo rje phra mo bsgoms la bya'i /
T02D2510-1:295a-40: gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rgyu de'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:295a-42: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:295a-43: chen por gsungs pa'i cho gas rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2510-1:295a-44: kyi rnal 'byor ji skad gsungs pa dang /
T02D2510-1:295a-46: phyi nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i bcom
T02D2510-1:295b-0: ldan 'das @295b rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya
T02D2510-1:295b-2: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags rnams re re zhing
T02D2510-1:295b-3: yang bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas lha rengs pa'i rig
T02D2510-1:295b-5: de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'am /
T02D2510-1:295b-6: 'og nas 'chad pa'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:295b-7: gyi cho gas sna'i rtse mo dkyil 'khor mtshan ma
T02D2510-1:295b-8: thob kyi bar du bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02D2510-1:295b-9: ting nge 'dzin gsum sngon du 'gro bas rig pa'i
T02D2510-1:295b-10: brtul zhugs ji srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa
T02D2510-1:295b-11: de srid kyi bar du byas la /
T02D2510-1:295b-12: de nas de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:295b-13: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na //
T02D2510-1:295b-14: zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2510-1:295b-15: de'i ming gang yin zhe na /
T02D2510-1:295b-16: khro bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad //
T02D2510-1:295b-18: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni //
T02D2510-1:295b-19: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre //
T02D2510-1:295b-20: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
T02D2510-1:295b-21: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du chos kyi
T02D2510-1:295b-22: dkyil 'khor 'dir thams cad kyang thig gdab par bya'o
T02D2510-1:295b-23: // de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri //
T02D2510-1:295b-24: ye shes rdo rje'i dbus chud pa'o //
T02D2510-1:295b-25: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas
T02D2510-1:295b-26: su seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du rdo rje rtse
T02D2510-1:295b-27: lnga pa 'bar ba chur bsnyal te bris la /
T02D2510-1:295b-28: de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2510-1:295b-29: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa snying ga'i
T02D2510-1:295b-30: phyi rol gyi phyogs su rdo rje phra mo bsnams
T02D2510-1:295b-32: sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du //
T02D2510-1:295b-33: phyag rgya de nyid kun bris shig / ces bya
T02D2510-1:295b-34: ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2510-1:295b-35: dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa bzhin du rdo rje
T02D2510-1:295b-38: las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:295b-39: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal sogs //
T02D2510-1:295b-40: go rims bzhin du dgod par bya //
T02D2510-1:295b-41: zhes bya ba ni skyil mo krung gis bzhugs nas
T02D2510-1:295b-42: rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag gnyis
T02D2510-1:295b-43: kyis phyag mtshan bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:295b-47: las kyi h'um mdzad de rnams kyi phyogs thams cad
T02D2510-1:295b-48: du khor bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa
T02D2510-1:295b-49: bri bar bya'o // ji ltar bri zhe na cho ga bzhin zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-1:295b-50: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa de
T02D2510-1:295b-51: dag thams cad kyang snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge
T02D2510-1:296a-1: gnyis kyi rdo rje bsdams pas rang gi phyag rgya snying gar bsnams pa /
T02D2510-1:296a-2: ye shes rdo rje'i dbus su chud pa la ji
T02D2510-1:296a-3: ltar ye shes rdo rje dbus su chud pa de
T02D2510-1:296a-4: bzhin du 'dir yang bya bas na cho ga bzhin
T02D2510-1:296a-6: de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra
T02D2510-1:296a-7: mo'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:296a-8: 'khor ro // cho ga'i rim pa rgyas par bshad do //
T02D2510-1:296a-9: zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang /
T02D2510-1:296a-10: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D2510-1:296a-11: de la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2510-1:296a-12: dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i tshul gyis ji skad
T02D2510-1:296a-13: bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang
T02D2510-1:296a-14: / rnal 'byor chen po byas la sgo dbye ba dang /
T02D2510-1:296a-15: bum pa gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes
T02D2510-1:296a-16: su spyad nas slob dpon gyis phyag bya ba la
T02D2510-1:296a-17: sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa gzung ba
T02D2510-1:296a-19: de la ji lta ba'i phra mo rdo rje'i dbang
T02D2510-1:296a-20: bskur ba la sogs pa nas dngos grub kyi rdo
T02D2510-1:296a-21: rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi cho ga rjes su
T02D2510-1:296a-22: spyad nas / yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2510-1:296a-23: rang nyid kyi ming nas brjod nas /
T02D2510-1:296a-24: rdo rjes dkyil 'khor gyi las bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:296a-25: de nas bsdu ba byas la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:296a-26: de nas gzhug pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:296a-28: de ring khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2510-1:296a-29: kyi rdo rje khro bo nyid du phyag na rdo
T02D2510-1:296a-30: rjes dbang bskur gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2510-1:296a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo ni h'um mdzad do //
T02D2510-1:296a-32: de'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i rdo rje khro bo ni de'i rdo rje khro bo ste /
T02D2510-1:296a-33: des khyod la dbang bskur gyis zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:296a-34: dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba
T02D2510-1:296a-35: de bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:296a-36: de legs par nan tan du gyis shig ces bya ba ni /
T02D2510-1:296a-37: gang gi phyir bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2510-1:296a-38: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi khro bo'i rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de'i phyir /
T02D2510-1:296a-39: legs par bzung la nan tan du bsgrub par gyis
T02D2510-1:296a-40: shig / sems can thams cad kyang ji skad du
T02D2510-1:296a-41: gsungs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir gyi bar du
T02D2510-1:296a-42: zhes sbyar ro // ma lus shing lus pa med pa ni /
T02D2510-1:296a-43: sems can gyi khams zad par ro //
T02D2510-1:296b-0: yongs su zhes bya ba ni @296b kun nas so //
T02D2510-1:296b-2: ngan song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams bsal ba'i don du'o //
T02D2510-1:296b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa zhes
T02D2510-1:296b-4: bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2510-1:296b-5: pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i bde ba can la
T02D2510-1:296b-6: sogs pa'i zhing khams su skye ba'o //
T02D2510-1:296b-7: bde ba ni tshe 'di las rab tu dga' ba thob pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba'o //
T02D2510-1:296b-8: dam pa 'grub pa ni sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo
T02D2510-1:296b-9: rje 'chang ba la sogs pa de nyid 'thob pa
T02D2510-1:296b-10: ste rnyed pa de'i 'bras bu'i phyir ro //
T02D2510-1:296b-11: rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2510-1:296b-12: khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis h'um mdzad kyi sbyor
T02D2510-1:296b-13: bas sems can thams cad kyang ji srid 'tsho'i bar
T02D2510-1:296b-14: du yongs su sbyor ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi phyir ro
T02D2510-1:296b-15: // bdud byed pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2510-1:296b-16: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'jig rten gyi phan pa dang bde ba yang gzung ngo //
T02D2510-1:296b-17: cho ga lhag ma ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam
T02D2510-1:296b-18: par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad zin par
T02D2510-1:296b-19: shes par bya'o // rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2510-1:296b-20: du lag pa gnyis su sbyin no zhes bya ba
T02D2510-1:296b-21: ni nas 'bras tsam gyi rdo rje phra mo'o //
T02D2510-1:296b-22: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2510-1:296b-23: slob ma 'jug pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2510-1:296b-24: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob par
T02D2510-1:296b-25: gyur pa la slob dpon gyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:296b-26: du gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2510-1:296b-27: phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2510-1:296b-28: rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2510-1:296b-29: ye shes phra mo ni rdo rje phra mo brtan
T02D2510-1:296b-30: par gyur pa sngon du song ba'i ye shes so
T02D2510-1:296b-31: // de yi rdo rje phra mo brtan byas la //
T02D2510-1:296b-33: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2510-1:296b-34: du gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyi phyi
T02D2510-1:296b-35: nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i rang gi
T02D2510-1:296b-36: khro bo'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2510-1:296b-37: rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs
T02D2510-1:296b-38: pa'i cho ga zla ba gsum rdo rje phra mo
T02D2510-1:296b-39: bsgoms la mthar mtshan thog thag byas na rdo rje
T02D2510-1:296b-40: phra mo brtan par byas pa yin no //
T02D2510-1:296b-41: de brtan par byas nas ni /
T02D2510-1:296b-42: rdo rje rang gi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2510-1:296b-44: rang 'dod pa'i khro bo'i rnal 'byor pas yi ge
T02D2510-1:296b-45: h'um gis h'um zhes bya ba bzlas pa la sbyar
T02D2510-1:296b-46: bar bya'o // gang zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba'o //
T02D2510-1:297a-2: zhes bya ba ni de brgyal bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:297a-4: sna'i bu gnas yi ge h'um zhes bya ba'i sbyor
T02D2510-1:297a-5: bas bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du 'bar ba'i rdo
T02D2510-1:297a-6: rje ltung ba des 'di sems med par 'gyur ro
T02D2510-1:297a-7: // rdo rje phra mo brtan byas te //
T02D2510-1:297a-8: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2510-1:297a-9: cho ga bzhin du mched pa ni /
T02D2510-1:297a-10: sna'i rtse mor rdo rje phra mo brtan par byas la /
T02D2510-1:297a-11: rdo rje de las rdo rje phra mo'i rlung gi
T02D2510-1:297a-12: dkyil 'khor sprul pa des thams cad bkug nas des
T02D2510-1:297a-13: bsgrub par bya ba rtsa'i sbur ma bzhin du khyer
T02D2510-1:297a-14: bar bsams la / ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su bsgyur bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297a-15: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la //
T02D2510-1:297a-16: zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du rdo rje
T02D2510-1:297a-17: phra mo bsgom pa byas la phyir spro bar bya'o
T02D2510-1:297a-18: // khro bor ldan pa zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D2510-1:297a-19: gi khro bo dang ldan pa'i rdo rje phra mo
T02D2510-1:297a-20: sna'i rtse mor gnas par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297a-21: ji srid mched ces bya ba ni rgyas par te /
T02D2510-1:297a-22: kha ba dang char gyi rgyun bzhin du spro ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2510-1:297a-23: 'di skad du ston pa yin te /
T02D2510-1:297a-24: khro bo'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya ba'i yul du khyab par byas la /
T02D2510-1:297a-25: de nas bsgrub par bya ba brgyal ba dang ltung bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297a-26: de bzhin de ni bsdu ba yang //
T02D2510-1:297a-28: de lta bu'i sbyor ba rnam pa gsum las gang
T02D2510-1:297a-29: yang rung ba'i sbyor bas gdug pa gzhom par byas
T02D2510-1:297a-30: nas / gang gi tshe sdig pa gzhom par nus
T02D2510-1:297a-31: pa de'i tshe sbyor bas 'dir bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis
T02D2510-1:297a-32: de la zhi ba'i las bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297a-33: de ltar sbyor ba des rdo rje phra mo'i rnal
T02D2510-1:297a-34: 'byor 'di rab tu sbyar ba de bzhin du rang
T02D2510-1:297a-35: gi sna'i rtse mor bsdus la /
T02D2510-1:297a-36: de nas rang gi snying gar gzhag cing brtan par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297a-37: sems can gang gis dgra la ni //
T02D2510-1:297a-38: lhan cig gyur pas cher brtan pa //
T02D2510-1:297a-40: gang gi sems can rnams dgra bo dang bcas pa'i
T02D2510-1:297a-41: rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms pas cher brtan par 'gyur ro
T02D2510-1:297a-42: // byams pa mched pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2510-1:297a-43: zhes bya ba ni dper na byams pa rim gyis
T02D2510-1:297a-44: spro bar bshad pa de bzhin du seng ge dang
T02D2510-1:297a-48: srin po rnams kyi rigs kyis bsgrub par bya ba zos par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297a-49: dgra bo spro bas gzhig par bya //
T02D2510-1:297a-50: zhes bya ba ni de ltar dgra bo spro ba'i
T02D2510-1:297a-51: rim pa sbyor ba de bzhin du gdug pa rnams
T02D2510-1:297a-52: gzer nad dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-1: dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa'i sdig pa
T02D2510-1:297b-2: can du gyur pa'i sems can mthong na snying rje
T02D2510-1:297b-3: bskyed de / de dag gzir bar bya ba'i sbyor bas de gsad par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-4: chos sam yang na chos min pa //
T02D2510-1:297b-5: zhes bya bas chos ni dge ba bcu'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-6: chos ma yin pa ni mi dge ba bcu'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-7: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba
T02D2510-1:297b-8: zhes bya ba ni mngon du byas shing dga' ba
T02D2510-1:297b-9: ste / der snang ba tsam du bsgrub par bya ba bsams nas /
T02D2510-1:297b-10: snang ba tsam de h'um zhes bya ba bsgoms pa'i rdo rjes gzhig par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-11: gdul dka' ba'i sems can gang zhes bya ba ni
T02D2510-1:297b-12: yid kyi mngon par 'du byed pa'i btang snyoms kyis
T02D2510-1:297b-13: gzir bar bya ba bstan to //
T02D2510-1:297b-14: sbyor ba bzhi po de yang rdo rje phra mo brtan par byas la /
T02D2510-1:297b-16: rdo rje dbyibs ni bris nas kyang //
T02D2510-1:297b-18: nam mkha'i phyogs su bsgom par bya ba nyid ni go sla'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-19: de bzhin phra mo'i cho ga yis //
T02D2510-1:297b-20: snying po rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang //
T02D2510-1:297b-21: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo bsgoms la 'di bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2510-1:297b-22: snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' la sogs pa'i phyogs su bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2510-1:297b-24: de ltar phyag na rdo rje bsgoms pas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:297b-25: sangs rgyas su bsgoms pas kyang ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:297b-26: rdo rje phra mo rab sbyar ba //
T02D2510-1:297b-27: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo bsgom par
T02D2510-1:297b-28: byas la phyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid
T02D2510-1:297b-29: bsgoms nas bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du ltung bar
T02D2510-1:297b-30: bya'o // bdag nyid zla ba'i rdo rjer bsams nas /
T02D2510-1:297b-31: gang gi steng du ltung ba der ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:297b-32: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsgoms nas gang gi steng du ltung ba der ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:297b-33: bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsgoms nas /
T02D2510-1:297b-34: gang gi steng du ltung ba der ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2510-1:297b-35: de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po //
T02D2510-1:297b-36: rdo rje khro bo snyoms zhugs pas //
T02D2510-1:297b-38: rang gi khro bo snyoms par zhugs te gnas pa'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-39: yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la bdag nyid zhugs la /
T02D2510-1:297b-40: rang gi lus kyis yongs su bskor bar bse bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:297b-41: bsgrub par bya ba gang gi ming nas bzung bas
T02D2510-1:297b-42: rdo rje h'um zhes brjod cing rang gi lus kyis
T02D2510-1:297b-43: 'khyud pas gang gi ming smos pa de 'chi bar
T02D2510-1:298a-3: h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje phra mo sna'i rtse mor brtan par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298a-4: sna nas phra ba thang cig min //
T02D2510-1:298a-5: zhes bya ba ni phra ba rdo rje phra mo'o //
T02D2510-1:298a-6: sna nas ni de'i sna'i rtse mor ro //
T02D2510-1:298a-7: thang cig min zhes bya ba ni yang yang ngo //
T02D2510-1:298a-8: dbugs btang h'um zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni dbugs btang ba dang /
T02D2510-1:298a-9: yi ge h'um gi tshul du ni dbugs btang ba'i
T02D2510-1:298a-10: yi ge h'um gi tshul gyis 'jig rten gsum yang
T02D2510-1:298a-13: rdo rje phra mo sna'i rtse mor bstan par byas la /
T02D2510-1:298a-14: h'um zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis gang gi steng du ltung ba de ltung bar byed do //
T02D2510-1:298a-15: rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la //
T02D2510-1:298a-16: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje phra mo bsgom pa byas la'o //
T02D2510-1:298a-17: khros nas rdo rje lta ba yis //
T02D2510-1:298a-18: zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i cha byad du gyur
T02D2510-1:298a-19: pa'i rdo rje lta bas sems can gang bltas pa
T02D2510-1:298a-22: khro bo'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas nas /
T02D2510-1:298a-23: khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul gyis rang gi mig gnyis su bsgoms la /
T02D2510-1:298a-24: des bsgrub par bya ba gang la bltas pa de des khro bo'i kha lta ba'i tshul gyis /
T02D2510-1:298a-25: bsgrub par bya ba'i mig bcom zhing bsgrub par bya ba thal bar byas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298a-26: bu ga nas ni zhugs na ni //
T02D2510-1:298a-27: zhes bya ba ni rang gi khro bo'i rnal 'byor
T02D2510-1:298a-28: byas la bsgrub par bya ba'i lus ji skad bshad
T02D2510-1:298a-29: pa'i phyogs nas yid kyis 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298a-30: de nas de'i snying gi padma drangs te rang gi
T02D2510-1:298a-31: snying la bsres pas des de dbang du 'gyur ro
T02D2510-1:298a-33: thams cad kyang 'dir rdo rje phra mo bsgom par byas nas /
T02D2510-1:298a-34: rang khro bo'i rnal 'byor gyis las bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298a-35: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos nyid
T02D2510-1:298a-36: kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni
T02D2510-1:298a-37: / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil
T02D2510-1:298a-38: 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal
T02D2510-1:298a-39: 'byor byas la phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas /
T02D2510-1:298a-40: phyis chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bcings te /
T02D2510-1:298a-42: mdun du yang chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i /
T02D2510-1:298a-43: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis bsgrub par bya ba'i lha
T02D2510-1:298a-44: la rgyas btab la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i
T02D2510-1:298a-45: phyir / de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi
T02D2510-1:298b-0: phyag rgya'i ye @298b shes la bslab pa'o zhes gsungs
T02D2510-1:298b-1: phyir / so // rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:298b-2: phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:298b-6: rdo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis //
T02D2510-1:298b-7: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings su gsungs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas so //
T02D2510-1:298b-9: ces bya ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298b-11: seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa rnams su zla ba'i
T02D2510-1:298b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2510-1:298b-14: de'i steng du phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pa
T02D2510-1:298b-15: bcing nas ting nge 'dzin gyis bzhugs pa snying gar
T02D2510-1:298b-16: rang gi phyag rgya 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i
T02D2510-1:298b-17: 'od mnga' ba / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa nas /
T02D2510-1:298b-18: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298b-19: rnam par snang mdzad ni rdo rje dbyings kyi chos
T02D2510-1:298b-20: kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par
T02D2510-1:298b-21: bya'o // de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi
T02D2510-1:298b-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po zhes
T02D2510-1:298b-23: bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dkyil
T02D2510-1:298b-24: 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje
T02D2510-1:298b-25: rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste
T02D2510-1:298b-26: bya'o // / de rnams kyi ye shes la bslab par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298b-27: ting 'dzin dam tshig ye shes las //
T02D2510-1:298b-28: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi chos kyi
T02D2510-1:298b-29: dkyil 'khor der rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i
T02D2510-1:298b-30: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji skad bshad pa ni
T02D2510-1:298b-32: h'um zhes bya ba gnyis dang ldan //
T02D2510-1:298b-33: zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rdo rje sdigs
T02D2510-1:298b-34: mdzub gnyis bsgrengs nas so sor khab ltar byas te
T02D2510-1:298b-35: / rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa gang yin pa'i bzlas brjod byas la sdigs mdzub bya'o //
T02D2510-1:298b-36: ci rigs gnas su bzhag nas ni //
T02D2510-1:298b-38: skyil mo krung 'dug gan rkyal du //
T02D2510-1:298b-39: g-yas gcus de bzhin slar gcus pa //
T02D2510-1:298b-40: snying gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste //
T02D2510-1:298b-41: rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2510-1:298b-42: dpral bar gzhag dang ltag pa dang //
T02D2510-1:298b-43: phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar //
T02D2510-1:298b-44: khar gzhag snying gar ral gri dang //
T02D2510-1:298b-45: snying gar gzhag dang kha nas dbyung //
T02D2510-1:298b-46: spyi bo thong ga khar gzhag la //
T02D2510-1:298b-47: mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin //
T02D2510-1:298b-48: zhes bya ba de dag ni khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas /
T02D2510-1:299a-0: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi @299a * //
T02D2510-1:299a-1: mthar thug pa ji lta ba'i rim gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-2: lhag ma ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D2510-1:299a-3: ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsungs pa'i dam tshig
T02D2510-1:299a-4: gi phyag rgya nyid yin no //
T02D2510-1:299a-5: de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig
T02D2510-1:299a-6: ni chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa'o zhes
T02D2510-1:299a-7: bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam
T02D2510-1:299a-8: tshig ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2510-1:299a-9: de'i ye shes bslab cing bstan pa'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-10: phat ces bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i ljags la dgod par bya'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-11: shat ces bya ba ni rgyal po'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-12: mat ces bya ba ni chags pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-13: sat ces bya ba ni legs pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-14: rat ces bya ba ni rin chen gyi'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-15: tat ces bya ba ni nyi ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-16: dhat ces bya ba ni dpal gyi'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-17: hat ces bya ba ni bzhad pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-18: dhet ces bya ban ni chos kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-19: hat ces bya ba ni rnon po'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-20: phat ces bya ba ni rgyu'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-21: dhat ces bya ba ni gsungs pa'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-22: dhat ces bya ba ni las kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-23: bhat ces bya ba ni srung ba'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-24: grit ces bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-25: rit ces bya ba ni khu tshur gyi'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-26: lhag ma ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D2510-1:299a-27: ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa gzung bar bya'o
T02D2510-1:299a-28: // de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam
T02D2510-1:299a-29: tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa'o
T02D2510-1:299a-30: // // chos kyi khu tshur gnyis byas te //
T02D2510-1:299a-31: zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs
T02D2510-1:299a-32: pa'i khro bo las kyi phyag rgya rdo rje khu
T02D2510-1:299a-33: tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni chos kyi
T02D2510-1:299a-34: khu tshur te / de nyid du bshad pa 'di'i yang yin no //
T02D2510-1:299a-35: de nyid gnyis su byas nas /
T02D2510-1:299a-36: las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-38: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2510-1:299a-39: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2510-1:299a-40: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-41: bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02D2510-1:299a-43: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2510-1:299a-44: khro bo rdo rje sems ma'i'o //
T02D2510-1:299a-45: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa ni //
